duas.en_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.
duas.ar_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection
duas.fr_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection
duas.id_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection
duas.ms_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.
duas.es_translation: All praise is for Allah who gave us life after having taken it from us and unto Him is the resurrection.
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُلِلّٰہِ الَّذِیْ اَحْیَانَا بَعْدَ مَااَمَاتَنَا وَاِلَیْہِ النُّشُوْرُ ۔
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee ahyana baAAda ma amatana wa-ilayhin-nushoor.

duas.ms_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.es_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.ar_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.fr_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.id_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.en_translation: All praise is for Allah who restored to me my health and returned my soul and has allowed me to remember Him.
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ الَّذِيْ عَافَانِيْ فِيْ جَسَدِيْ وَرَدَّ عَلَيَّ رُوْحِيْ وَأَذِنَ لِيْ بِذِكْرِهِ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee AAafanee fee jasadee waradda AAalayya roohee wa-athina lee bithikrih.

duas.ms_translation:
The Prophet said : ‘Whoever awakes at night and then says:
‘None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without associate, to Him belongs sovereignty and praise and He is over all things wholly capable. How perfect Allah is, and all praise is for Allah, and none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, Allah is the greatest and there is no power nor might except with Allah, The Most High, The Supreme.
and then supplicates:
‘O my Lord forgive me.’ …will be forgiven’ 
'or he said: ‘and then asks, he will be answered.If he then performs ablution and prays, his prayer will be accepted’.

and then supplicates:
‘O my Lord forgive me.’ …will be forgiven’ 
'or he said: ‘and then asks, he will be answered.If he then performs ablution and prays, his prayer will be accepted’.

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ ، سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلهِ ، وَلَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَاللهُ أَكْـبَرُ ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ الْعَلِيِّ الْعَظِيمِ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.transliteration:
La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer, subhanal-lah, walhamdu lillah, wala ilaha illal-lah wallahu akbar, wala hawla wala quwwata illa billahil-AAaliyyil AAatheem. 
Rabbigh-fir lee

duas.ms_translation: In Your name my Lord, I lie down and in Your name I rise, so if You should take my soul then have mercy upon it, and if You should return my soul then protect it in the manner You do so with Your righteous servants.

duas.id_translation: In Your name my Lord, I lie down and in Your name I rise, so if You should take my soul then have mercy upon it, and if You should return my soul then protect it in the manner You do so with Your righteous servants.
duas.en_translation: In Your name my Lord, I lie down and in Your name I rise, so if You should take my soul then have mercy upon it, and if You should return my soul then protect it in the manner You do so with Your righteous servants.
duas.arabic: بِاسْمِكَ رَبِّي وَضَعْتُ جَنْبِي، وَبِكَ أَرْفَعُهُ، فَإِنْ أَمْسَكْتَ نَفْسِي فَارْحَمْهَا، وَإِنْ أَرْسَلْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا، بِمَا تَحْفَظُ بِهِ عِبَادَكَ الصَّالِحِينَ.
duas.transliteration: Bismika rabbee wadaAAtu janbee wabika arfaAAuh, fa-in amsakta nafsee farhamha, wa-in arsaltaha fahfathha bima tahfathu bihi AAibadakas-saliheen.

duas.ms_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.
duas.ar_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, verily You have created my soul and You shall take its life, to You belongs its life and death. If You should keep my soul alive then protect it, and if You should take its life then forgive it. O Allah, I ask You to grant me good health.’
duas.arabic: اللَّهمَّ إِنَّكَ خَلَقْتَ نَفْسِي وَأَنْتَ تَوَفَّاهَا لَكَ مَمَاتُهَا وَمَحْيَاهَا، إِنْ أَحْيَيْتَهَا فَاحْفَظْهَا، وَإِنْ أَمَتَّهَا فَاغْفِرْ لَهَا. اللَّهمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ العَافِيَةَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innaka khalaqta nafsee wa-anta tawaffaha, laka mamatuha wamahyaha in ahyaytaha fahfathha, wa-in amattaha faghfir laha. Allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafiyah.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, protect me from Your punishment on the day Your servants are resurrected.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma qinee AAathabaka yawma tabAAathu AAibadak.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات. عندما كان يُريد النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) أن يرقد لينام، أعتاد أن يضع يده اليمنى تحت خده ويقول هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois. Quand le Prophète (SAW) voulait s'allonger pour dormir, il plaçait sa main droite sous sa joue et récitait cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali. Ketika Rasululloh (SAW) berbaring untuk tidur, beliau biasanya menaruh tangan kanan dibawah pipinya dan membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits:
Recite this dua three times.
When Prophet (SAW) wanted to lie down to sleep, he used to place his right hand under his cheek and recite this dua.
duas.ms_benefits:
Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali. 
Semasa Nabi (SAW) hendak baring untuk tidur, Baginda akan meletakkan tangan kanannya di bawah pipinya dan membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits:
Recita esta súplica (dua) tres veces.
Cuando el Profeta (SAW) quiso acostarse para dormir, estaba acostumbrado a poner su mano derecha debajo de su mejilla y recita esta dua.

duas.ar_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.fr_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.id_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.en_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.ms_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.es_translation: In Your name O Allah, I live and die.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰھُمَّ بِاسْمِکَ اَمُوْتُ وَاَحْیٰی۔
duas.transliteration: al-lahumma Bismika amootu wa-ahya.

duas.ar_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.ms_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.es_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.fr_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.id_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.en_translation: All praise is for Allah, Who fed us and gave us drink, and Who is sufficient for us and has sheltered us, for how many have none to suffice them or shelter them.
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا، وَكَفَانَا، وَآوَانَا، فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لا كَافِيَ لَه ُُ وَلا مُؤْوِي.
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee atAAamana wasaqana, wakafana, wa-awana, fakam mimman la kafiya lahu wala mu/wee.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, Knower of the seen and the unseen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.’ shirk: to associate others with Allah in those things which are specific to Him. This can occur in (1) belief, e.g. to believe that other than Allah has the power to benefit or harm, (2) speech, e.g. to swear by other than Allah and (3) action, e.g. to bow or prostrate to other than Allah.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, Knower of the seen and the unseen, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.’ shirk: to associate others with Allah in those things which are specific to Him. This can occur in (1) belief, e.g. to believe that other than Allah has the power to benefit or harm, (2) speech, e.g. to swear by other than Allah and (3) action, e.g. to bow or prostrate to other than Allah.

duas.arabic: اللَّهمَّ عَالِمَ الغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضِ رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيء ٍ وَمَلِيْكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لا إِلَهََ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِي سُوْءاً أَوْ أَجُرَّهُ~ُ إِلَى مُسْلِم.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma AAalimal-ghaybi washshahadah, fatiras-samawati wal-ard, rabba kulli shayin wamaleekah, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, aAAoothu bika min sharri nafsee wamin sharrish-shaytani washirkih, wa-an aqtarifa AAala nafsee soo-an aw ajurrahu ila muslim.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I submit my soul unto You, and I entrust my affair unto You, and I turn my face towards You, and I totally rely on You, in hope and fear of You. Verily there is no refuge nor safe haven from You except with You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I submit my soul unto You, and I entrust my affair unto You, and I turn my face towards You, and I totally rely on You, in hope and fear of You. Verily there is no refuge nor safe haven from You except with You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.

Verily there is no refuge nor safe haven from You except with You. I believe in Your Book which You have revealed and in Your Prophet whom You have sent.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَسْلَمْتُ نَفْسِي إِلَيْكَ، وَفَوَّضْتُ أَمْرِي إِلَيْكَ، وَوَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِي إِلَيْكَ، وَأَلْجَأْتُ ظَهْرِي إِلَيْكَ، رَغْبَةً وَرَهْبَةً إِلَيْكَ، لَا مَلْجَأَ وَلّا مَنْجَا مِنْكَ إِلَّا إِلَيْكَ، آمَنْتُ بِكِتَابِكَ وَبِنَبِيِّكَ الَّذِي أَرْسَلْتَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma aslamtu nafsee ilayk, wafawwadtu amree ilayk, wawajjahtu wajhee ilayk, wa-alja/tu thahree ilayk, raghbatan warahbatan ilayk, la maljaa wala manja minka illa ilayk, amantu bikitabikal-lathee anzalt, wabinabiyyikal-lathee arsalt.

duas.ar_translation: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.arabic: اللهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لَا تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلَا نَوْمٌ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الْأَرْضِ مَنْ ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلَّا بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلَا يُحِيطُونَ بِشَيْءٍ مِنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلَّا بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَلَا يَئُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu laa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyoom, laa ta'khuthuhu sinatun wa laa nawm, lahu maa fis-samaawaati wa maafil-'ardh, man thal-lathee yashfa'u 'indahu 'illaa bi'ithnih, ya'lamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum, wa laa yuheetoona bishay'im-min 'ilmihi 'illaa bimaa shaa'a, wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samaawaati wal'ardh, wa laa ya'ooduhu hifdhuhumaa, wa Huwal-'Aliyyul- 'Adheem
duas.ar_benefits: قال رسول الله (صلى الله عليه وسلم): عندما تُقبل على النوم، اقرأ آية الكرسي لتكون لك حماية من الله ولن يقترب منك أي شيطان حتى الصباح.
duas.fr_benefits: Le Prophète (SAW) a dit: Quand vous êtes sur le point de dormir, récitez Ayatul Kursi jusqu' à la fin du verset, car il restera sur vous une protection contre Allah et aucun diable ne s'approchera de vous jusqu'au matin.
duas.id_benefits: Rasulloh (SAW) bersabda: Ketika kamu akan tertidur, bacalah ayat kursi hingga selesai agar mendapatkan perlindungan Alloh dan tidak ada setan yang berani mendekatimu hingga pagi hari.
duas.en_benefits: The Prophet (SAW) said: 'When you are about to sleep, recite Ayatul Kursi till the end of the verse for there will remain over you a protection from Allah and no devil will draw near to you until morning'.
duas.ms_benefits: Nabi (SAW) bersabda: 'Apabila kamu hendak tidur, baca Ayat Kursi sehingga penghujung ayat kerana di dalamnya ada perlindungan dari Allah untukmu dan tiada syaitan yang akan menghampirimu sehingga pagi.'
duas.es_benefits: El Profeta (Salallahu aleihi wa salam) dijo: "cuando estés a punto de dormir, recita la aleya del trono (Kursi) hasta el final del versículo y Dios te protegerá, y ningún demonio podrá acercarse a ti hasta que llegue la mañana"
duas.ar_description: أطلب المُساعدة والحماية من الله بهذا الدُعاء!
duas.fr_description: Cherchez l'aide et la protection d'Allah avec cette Dua!
duas.id_description: Raihlah pertolongan dan perlindungan Alloh dengan doa ini!
duas.en_description: Seek Allah's help and protection with this Dua!
duas.ms_description: Dapatkan pertolongan Allah dengan doa ini!
duas.es_description: ¡Pide la ayuda y protección de Dios con esta Dua!

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰہُمَّ اِنِّیْ اَعُوْذُبِکَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَآئِثِ۔
duas.transliteration: allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-khubthi wal-khaba-ith

duas.ar_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.fr_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.ms_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.es_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.id_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.en_translation: I ask You (Allah) for forgiveness.
duas.arabic: غُفْرَانَكَ.
duas.transliteration: Ghufranak

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lah

duas.ar_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.ms_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.es_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.fr_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.id_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.en_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone without partner, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and Messenger.
duas.arabic: اَشْھَدُاَنْ لَّا اِلٰہَ اِلَّا اللّٰہُ وَحْدَہ لَاشَرِیْکَ لَہ وَاَشْھَدُ اَ نَّ مُحَمَّدًا عَبْدُہ وَرَسُوْلُہ
duas.transliteration: Ashhadu an la ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, wa-ashhadu anna Muhammadan AAabduhu warasooluh.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, make me of those who return to You often in repentance and make me of those who remain clean and pure.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰہُمَّ اجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِیْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِیْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَھِّرِیْنَ۔
duas.transliteration: Allahummaj-AAalnee minat-tawwabeena wajAAalnee minal-mutatahhireen.

duas.ar_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.fr_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.id_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.en_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.ms_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.es_translation: How perfect You are O Allah, and I praise You, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You, I seek Your forgiveness and turn in repentance to You.
duas.arabic: سُبْحـَانَكَ اللَّهُـمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَـيْكَ.
duas.transliteration: Subhanakal-lahumma wabihamdika ashhadu an la ilaha illa anta astaghfiruka wa-atoobu ilayk.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, place within my heart light, and upon my tongue light, and within my ears light, and within my eyes light, and place behind me light and in front of me light and above me light and beneath me light. O Allah, bestow upon me light.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ اجْعَـلْ في قَلْبـي نورا ، وَفي لِسـاني نورا، وَاجْعَـلْ في سَمْعي نورا، وَاجْعَـلْ في بَصَري نورا، وَاجْعَـلْ مِنْ خَلْفي نورا، وَمِنْ أَمامـي نورا، وَاجْعَـلْ مِنْ فَوْقـي نورا ، وَمِن تَحْتـي نورا .اللّهُـمَّ أَعْطِنـي نورا.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ijAAal fee qalbee noora, wafee lisanee noora, wajAAal fee samAAee noora,wajAAal fee basaree noora, wajAAal min khalfee noora, wamin amamee noora ,wajAAal min fawqee noora, wamin tahtee noora, allahumma aAAtinee noora.

duas.ar_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.fr_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.ms_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.es_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.id_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.en_translation: I take refuge with Allah, The Supreme and with His Noble Face, and His eternal authority from the accursed devil. In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me.
duas.arabic: أَعوذُ بِاللّهِ العَظِيـمِ، وَبِوَجْهِـهِ الكَرِيـمِ وَسُلْطـَانِه القَدِيـمِ، مِنَ الشَّيْـطَانِ الرَّجِـيمِ، [ بِسْـمِ اللّهِ وَالصَّلَاةُ ] [وَالسَّلامُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللّهِ]، اَللَّهُـمَّ افْتَـحْ لِي أَبْوَابَ رَحْمَتـِكَ.
duas.transliteration: aAAoothu billahil-AAatheem wabiwajhihil-kareem wasultanihil-qadeem minash-shaytanir-rajeem, [bismil-lah, wassalatu] [wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah] , allahumma iftah lee abwaba rahmatik.

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah, and prayers and peace be upon the Messenger of Allah. O Allah, I ask You from Your favour. O Allah, guard me from the accursed devil.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّهِ وَالصَّلاَةُ وَالسَّلاَمُ عَلَى رَسُولِ اللّهِ، اَللَّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْـلِكَ، اَللَّهُـمَّ اعْصِمْنِـي مِنَ الشَّيْـطَانِ الرَّجِـيمِ.
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lah wassalatu wassalamu AAala rasoolil-lah, allahumma innee as-aluka min fadlik, allahumma iAAsimnee minash-shaytanir-rajeem.

duas.ar_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.fr_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.id_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.ms_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.es_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.en_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
duas.transliteration: Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah
duas.ar_benefits: ردد ما يقوله المؤذن، ماعدا قوله: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ، بعدها يُمكنك قول هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Répétez ce que dit le Mu'aththin, sauf quand il dit: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ, puis vous pourrez réciter cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Ulangi ketika Muazin mengumandangkan adzan, kecuali ketika dia mengucapkan: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ, lalu kamu dapat membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Repeat what the Mu'aththin says, except for when he says: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ, then you can recite this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Ulang apa yang dikatakan oleh Mu'aththin, kecuali semasa dia menyebut: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ, kemudian anda boleh membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: Repite lo que dice Almuédano salvo cuando él dice: حَيَّ عَلَى الصَّلاَةِ وَحَيَّ عَلَى الْفَلَاحِ, luego puedes recitar esta súplica.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.fr_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.ms_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.es_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.id_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.en_translation: O Allah , Lord of this perfect call and established prayer. Grant Muhammad the intercession and favor, and raise him to the honored station You have promised him, [verily You do not neglect promises].
duas.arabic: اَللّٰہُمَّ رَبَّ ھٰذِہِ الدَّعْوَةِ التَّآمَّةِ وَالصَّلٰوةِ الْقَآئِمَةِ اٰتِ مُحَمَّدَنِ الْوَسِیْلَةَ وَالْفَضِیْلَةَ وَابْعَثْہُ مَقَامًا مَّحْمُوْدَنِ الَّذِیْ وَعَدْتَّہ ۔ إَنَّكَ لَا تُخْلِفُ الْمِيعَادَ.
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma Rabba haathid - da'watit - taammati wassalaatil-qaa'imati, 'aati Muhammadanil-waseelata walfadheelata, wab 'ath-hu maqaamam-mahmoodanil-lathee wa'adtahu, 'innaka laa tukhliful-mee'aad
duas.ar_benefits: أدعو الله بين الأذان والإقامة لأن الأدعية في ذلك الوقت لا تُرد من الله.
duas.fr_benefits: Effectuez vos duas entre le adhaan et l'iqamah car les duas demandées à ce moment ne sont pas rejetées par Allah.
duas.id_benefits: Panjatkan doa diantara adzan dan iqomah karena doa yang dipanjatkan pada waktu ini tidak akan ditolak oleh Alloh.
duas.en_benefits: Ask dua between adhaan and iqamah as duas asked at this time are not rejected by Allah.
duas.ms_benefits: Berdoa di antara azan dan iqamah kerana doa yang dipohon pada waktu ini tidak akan ditolak oleh Allah.
duas.es_benefits: Haz una dua entre el adhán y la iqámah, ya que las súplicas que se dijeron en este momento no son rechazadas por Dios

duas.ar_translation: I have turned my face sincerely towards He who has brought forth the heavens and the Earth and I am not of those who associate (others with Allah). Indeed my prayer, my sacrifice, my life and my death are for Allah, Lord of the worlds, no partner has He, with this I am commanded and I am of the Muslims. O Allah, You are the Sovereign, none has the right to be worshipped except You. You are my Lord and I am Your servant, I have wronged my own soul and have acknowledged my sin, so forgive me all my sins for no one forgives sins except You. Guide me to the best of characters for none can guide to it other than You, and deliver me from the worst of characters for none can deliver me from it other than You. Here I am, in answer to Your call, happy to serve you. All good is within Your hands and evil does not stem from You. I exist by your will and will return to you. Blessed and High are You, I seek Your forgiveness and repent unto You

duas.arabic: وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ السَّموَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ حَنِيفاً وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ، إِنَّ صَلَاتِي، وَنُسُكِي، وَمَحْيَايَ، وَمَمَاتِي للهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ، لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ وَبِذَلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ. اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ الْمَلِكُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَنْتَ رَبِّي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي وَاعْتَرَفْتُ بَذَنْبِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي ذُنُوبِي جَمِيعاً إِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، وَاهْدِنِي لأّحْسَنِ الْأَخْلَاقِ لَا يَهْدِي لأَحْسَنِهَا إِلَّا أَنْتَ، وَاصْرِفْ عَنِّي سَيِّئَهَا لَا يَصْرِفُ عَنِّي سَيِّئَهَا إِلَّا أَنْتَ، لَبَّيْكَ وَسَعْدَيْكَ، وَالْخَيْرُ كُلُّهُ بِيَدَيْكَ، وَالشَّرُّ لَيْسَ إِلَيْكَ، أَنَا بِكَ وَإِلَيْكَ، تَبَارَكْتَ وَتَعَالَيْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
duas.transliteration: Wajjahtu wajhiya lillathee fataras-samawati wal-arda haneefan wama ana minal-mushrikeen, inna salatee wanusukee wamahyaya wamamatee lillahi rabbil-AAalameen, la shareeka lahu wabithalika omirtu wa-ana minal-muslimeen. Allahumma antal-maliku la ilaha illa ant. anta rabbee wa-ana AAabduk, thalamtu nafsee waAAtaraftu bithanbee faghfir lee thunoobee jameeAAan innahu la yaghfiruth-thunooba illa ant.wahdinee li-ahsanil-akhlaqi la yahdee li-ahsaniha illa ant, wasrif AAannee sayyi-aha la yasrifu AAannee sayyi-aha illa ant, labbayka wasaAAdayk,walkhayru kulluhu biyadayk, washsharru laysa ilayk, ana bika wa-ilayk, tabarakta wataAAalayt, astaghfiruka wa-atoobu ilayk

duas.ar_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.es_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.id_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.en_translation: O Allah! separate me from my sins as You have separated the East from the West. O Allah, cleanse me of my transgressions as the white garment is cleansed of stains. O Allah! wash away my sins with ice and water and frost.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بَاعِدْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَ خَطَايَايَ كَمَا بَاعَدْتَ بَيْنَ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ، اللَّهُمَّ نَقِّنِي مِنْ خَطَايَايَ، كَمَا يُنَقَّى الثَّوْبُ الْأَ بْيَضُ مِنَ الدَّنَسِ، اللَّهُمَّ اغْسِلْنِي مِنْ خَطَايَايَ بِالثَّلْجِ وّالْمَاءِ وَالْبَرَدِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma baa'id baynee wa bayna khataayaaya kamaa baa'adta baynal-mashriqi walmaghribi, Allaahumma naqqinee min khataayaaya kamaa yunaqqath-thawbul-'abyadhu minad-danasi, Allaahum-maghsilnee min khataayaaya, bith-thalji walmaa'i walbarad

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to You O Allah, and praise. Blessed is Your Name and Exalted is Your Majesty. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، وَتَبَارَكَ اسْمُكَ، وَتَعَالَى جَدُّكَ، وَلَا إِلَهَ غَيْرُكَ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma wa bihamdika, wa tabaarakasmuka, wa ta'aalaa jadduka, wa laa 'ilaaha ghayruka

duas.ar_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.fr_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.id_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.ms_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.es_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.en_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaana Rabbiyal-'Adheem

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.

duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma Rabbanaa wa bihamdika Allaahum-maghfir lee

duas.ar_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.fr_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.id_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.

duas.arabic: سُبُّوحٌ، قُدُوسٌ، رَبُّ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ
duas.transliteration: Subboohun, Quddoosun, Rabbul-malaa'ikati warrooh

duas.ar_translation: O Allah! to You I bow (in prayer) and in You I believe and to You I have submitted. Before You my hearing is humbled, as is my sight, my mind, my bones, my nerves and what my feet have mounted upon (for travel).
duas.fr_translation: O Allah! to You I bow (in prayer) and in You I believe and to You I have submitted. Before You my hearing is humbled, as is my sight, my mind, my bones, my nerves and what my feet have mounted upon (for travel).

duas.es_translation: O Allah! to You I bow (in prayer) and in You I believe and to You I have submitted. Before You my hearing is humbled, as is my sight, my mind, my bones, my nerves and what my feet have mounted upon (for travel).

duas.en_translation: O Allah! to You I bow (in prayer) and in You I believe and to You I have submitted. Before You my hearing is humbled, as is my sight, my mind, my bones, my nerves and what my feet have mounted upon (for travel).
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ لَكَ رَكَعْتُ، وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ، وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ خَشَعَ لَكَ سَمْعِي، وَبَصَرِي وَمُخِّي، وَعَظْمِي، وَعَصَبِي، وَمَا اسْتَقَلَّ بِهِ قَدَمِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma laka raka'tu, wa bika 'aamantu, wa laka 'aslamtu khasha'a laka sam'ee, wa basaree, wa mukhkhee, wa 'adhmee, wa 'asabee, wa mastaqalla bihi qadamee

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوتِ، وَالْمَلَكُوتِ، وَالْكِبْرِيَاءِ، وَالْعَظَمَةِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaana thil-jabarooti, walmalakooti, walkibriyaa'i, wal'adhamati

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الأَعْلَى
duas.transliteration: Subhaana Rabbiyal-A 'laa

duas.transliteration: Subboohun, Quddoosun, Rabbul-malaa'ikati warrooh

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.

duas.es_translation: O Allah, to You I prostrate myself and in You I believe. To You I have submitted. My face is prostrated to the One Who created it, fashioned it, and gave it hearing and sight. Blessed is Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ لَكَ سَجَدْتُ وَبِكَ آمَنْتُ وَلَكَ أَسْلَمْتُ وَأَنْتَ رَبِّيْ سَجَدَ وَجْهِيْ لِلَّذِيْ خَلَقَهُ وَصَوَّرَهُ وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبصَرَهُ تَبَارَكَ اللهُ أَحْسَنُ الخَالِقِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma laka sajadtu wa bika 'aamantu, wa laka 'aslamtu, sajada wajhiya lillathee khalaqahu, wa sawwarahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu, tabaarakallaahu 'ahsanul-khaaliqeen

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوتِ، وَالْمَلَكُوتِ، وَالْكِبْرِيَاءِ، وَالْعَظَمَةِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaana thil-jabarooti, walmalakooti, walkibriyaa'i, wal'adhamati

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.

duas.en_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.

duas.es_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَعُوْذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مِنْ عُقُوْبَتِكَ وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ لَا أُحْصِيْ ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكََ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu biridhaaka min sakhatika, wa bimu'aafaatika min 'uqoobatika wa 'a'oothu bika minka, laa 'uhsee thanaa'an 'alayka 'Anta kamaa 'athnayta 'alaa nafsika

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee thanbee kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa 'awwalahu wa 'aakhirahu wa 'alaaniyata hu wa sirrahu

duas.ar_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.id_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.en_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.ms_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.es_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.transliteration: Rabbighfir lee, Rabbighfir lee

duas.ar_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.id_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.en_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.es_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee

duas.ar_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.fr_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.id_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.en_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.ms_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.es_translation: I have prostrated my face to the One Who created it, and gave it hearing and sight by His might and His power. Glory is to Allah, the Best of creators.
duas.arabic: سَجَدَ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي خَلَقَهُ، وَشَقَّ سَمْعَهُ وَبَصَرَهُ، بِحَوْلِهِ وَقُوَّتِهِ، فَتَبَارَكَ اللَّهُ أَحسَنُ الْخَالِقِينَ
duas.transliteration: Sajada wajhiya lillathee khalaqahu, wa shaqqa sam'ahu wa basarahu bihawlihi wa quwwatihi. Fatabaarakallaahu 'ahsanul-khaaliqeen.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, write it as a reward for me, and release me from a burden for it, and make it a I treasure for me in Paradise. Accept it from me as You accepted it from your servant Dawud.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْتُبْ لِي بِهَا عِنْدَكَ أَجْراً، وَضَعْ عَنِّي بِهَا وِزْراً، وَاجْعَلْهَا لِي عِنْدَكَ ذُخْراً، وَتَقَبَّلْهَا مِنِّي كَمَا تَقَبَّلْتَهَا مِنْ عَبْدِكَ دَاوُدَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maktub lee bihaa 'indaka 'ajran, wa aha' 'annee bihaa wizran, waj'alhaa lee 'indaka thukhran, wa taqabbalhaa minnee kamaa taqabbaltahaa min'abdika Daawooda.

duas.ar_translation: All greetings of humility are for Allah, and all prayers and goodness. Peace be upon you, O Prophet, and the mercy of Allah and His blessings. Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.

Peace be upon us and upon the righteous slaves of Allah. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.

duas.arabic: التَّحِيَّاتُ للهِ، وَالصَّلَوَاتُ، وَالطَّيِّبَاتُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكَ أَيُّهَا النَّبِيُّ وَرَحْمَةُ اللهِ وَبَرَكَاتُهُ، السَّلَامُ عَلَيْنَا وَعَلَى عِبَادِ اللهِ الصَّالِحِينَ. أّشَْدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
duas.transliteration: Attahiyyaatu lillaahi wassalawaatu , wattayyibaatu , assalaamu 'alayka 'ayyuhan-Nabiyyu wa rahmatullaahi wa barakaatuhu, assalaamu 'alaynaa wa 'alaa 'ibaadillaahis-saaliheen. 'Ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wa 'ash-hadu 'anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa Rasooluhu

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on Ibrahim and on the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, bestow Your favor on Muhammad and on the family of Muhammad as You have bestowed Your favor on Ibrahim and on the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious. O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious.

O Allah, bless Muhammad and the family of Muhammad as You have blessed Ibrahim and the family of Ibrahim, You are Praiseworthy, Most Glorious.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ كَمَا صَلَّيْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمٌَ إِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.اللَّهُمَّ بَارِكْ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ، وَعَلَى آلِ مُحَمَّدٍكَمَا بَارَكْتَ عَلَى إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَعَلَى آلِ إِبْرَاهِيمَإِنَّكَ حَمِيدٌ مَجِيدٌ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma salli ala muhammadiw wa ala aali muhammadin kamaa sallaita ala ibrahima wa ala aali ibrahima innaka hamidum majid. Allahumma baarik ala muhammadiw wa ala aali muhammadin kamaa baarakta ala ibrahima wa ala aali ibrahima innaka hamidum majid.
duas.ar_description: أرسل البركات للنبي المحبوب (صلى الله عليه وسلم) عنما تضغط هنا.
duas.fr_description: Envoyez des bénédictions pour votre bien-aimé Prophète SAW en cliquant ici.
duas.id_description: Kirim doa kepada Rasulullah SAW tercinta dengan mengklik disini.
duas.en_description: Send blessings on your beloved Prophet SAW by clicking here.
duas.ms_description: Sampaikan salam kepada Rasulullah SAW yang disayangai dengan mengklik di sini.
duas.es_description: Pedir bendiciones por tu amado Profeta (saw) a través de hacer clic aquí.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ. اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْمَأْثَمِ وَالْمَغْرَمِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika min 'athaabil-qabri, wa 'a'oothu bika min fitnatil-maseehid-dajjaali, wa 'a'oothu bika min fitnatil-mahyaa walmamaati. Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika minal-ma'thami walmaghrami

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْماً كَثِيراً، وَلَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ وَارْحَمْنِي إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee dhalamtu nafsee dhulman katheeran, wa laa yaghfiruth-thunooba 'illaa 'Anta, faghfir lee maghfiratan min 'indika warhamnee 'innaka 'Antal-Ghafoorur-Raheem

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess , and what You are better aware of than I . You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess , and what You are better aware of than I . You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess , and what You are better aware of than I . You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess , and what You are better aware of than I . You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, forgive me what I have sent before me and what I have left behind me, what I have concealed and what I have done openly, what I have done in excess , and what You are better aware of than I . You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.

You are the One Who sends forth and You are the One Who delays . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي مَا قَدَّمْتُ وَمَا أَخَّرْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَرْتُ، وَمَا أَعْلَنْتُ، وَمَا أَسْرَفْتُ، وَمَا أَنْتَ أَعْلَمُ بِهِ مِنِّي. أَنْتَ الْمُقَدِّمُ، وَأَنْتَ الْمُؤَخِّرُ لَا إِلهَ إِلَاَّ أَنْتَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee maa qaddamtu, wa maa 'akhkhartu, wa maa 'asrartu, wa maa 'a'lantu, wa maa 'asraftu, wa maa 'Anta 'a'lamu bihi minnee. 'Antal-Muqaddimu, wa 'Antal-Mu'akhkhiru laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta

duas.ar_translation: O Allah! We implore You for help and beg forgiveness of You and believe in You and rely on You and extol You and we are thankful to You and are not ungrateful to You and we alienate and forsake those who disobey You. O Allah! You alone do we worship and for You do we pray and prostrate and we betake to please You and present ourselves for the service in Your cause and we hope for Your mercy and fear Your chastisement. Undoubtedly, Your torment is going to overtake infidels O Allah!
duas.fr_translation: O Allah! We implore You for help and beg forgiveness of You and believe in You and rely on You and extol You and we are thankful to You and are not ungrateful to You and we alienate and forsake those who disobey You. You alone do we worship and for You do we pray and prostrate and we betake to please You and present ourselves for the service in Your cause and we hope for Your mercy and fear Your chastisement. duas.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ إنا نَسْتَعِينُكَ وَنَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَنُؤْمِنُ بِكَ وَنَتَوَكَّلُ عَلَيْكَ وَنُثْنِئْ عَلَيْكَ الخَيْرَ وَنَشْكُرُكَ وَلَا نَكْفُرُكَ وَنَخْلَعُ وَنَتْرُكُ مَنْ ئَّفْجُرُكَ اَللَّهُمَّ إِيَّاكَ نَعْبُدُ وَلَكَ نُصَلِّئ وَنَسْجُدُ وَإِلَيْكَ نَسْعأئ وَنَحْفِدُ وَنَرْجُو رَحْمَتَكَ وَنَخْشآئ عَذَابَكَ إِنَّ عَذَابَكَ بِالكُفَّارِ مُلْحَقٌ
duas.transliteration: Allah humma inna nasta-eenoka wa nastaghfiruka wa nu'minu bika wa natawakkalu alaika wa nusni alaikal khair, wa nashkuruka wala nakfuruka wa nakhla-oo wa natruku mai yafjuruka, Allah humma iyyaka na'budu wa laka nusalli wa nasjud wa ilaika nas aaa wa nahfizu wa narju rahma taka wa nakhshaa azaabaka inna azaabaka bil kuffari mulhik
duas.ar_benefits: اقرأ هذا في الرقعة الثالثة لصلاة الوتر بعد صلاة العشاء
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez ceci dans le troisième rakat de Salat Witr après la prière du Icha
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah ini pada rakaat ketiga Sholat Witir setelah Sholat Isya
duas.en_benefits: Recite this in the third rakat of Witr Salaah after Isha Prayer
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini dalam rakaat ketiga Solat Witir selepas Solat Isyak
duas.es_benefits: Recita ésta en la tercera raka’a de oración impar (wítr) después de la oración de Isha’a

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ تَوَکَّلْتُ عَلَی اللّٰہِ لَاحَوْلَ وَلَاقُوَّةَ اِلَّابِاللّٰہِ۔
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lah, tawakkaltu AAalal-lah, wala hawla wala quwwata illa billah.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I take refuge with You lest I should stray or be led astray, or slip or be tripped, or oppress or be oppressed, or behave foolishly or be treated foolishly.’ slip: i.e. to commit a sin unintentionally
duas.arabic: اَللَّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعُـوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِـلَّ أَوْ أُضَـلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِـمَ أَوْ أَُظْلَـمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ أَوْ يُـجْهَلَ عَلَـيَّ .
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika an adilla aw odal, aw azilla aw ozall, aw athlima aw othlam, aw ajhala aw yujhala AAalay.

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ وَلَجْنَا وَبِسْمِ اللّٰہِ خَرَجْنَا وَعَلَی اللّٰہِ رَبِّنَا تَوَکَّلْنَا ۔
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lahi walajna, wabismil-lahi kharajna, waAAala rabbina tawakkalna.

duas.ar_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.fr_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.id_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.en_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.ms_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.es_translation: All Praise is for Allah who has clothed me with this garment and provided it for me, with no power or might from myself.
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰہِ الَّذِیْ کَسَانِیْ ھٰذَا وَرَزَقَنِیْہِ مِنْ غَیْرِ حَوْلٍ مِّنِّیْ وَلَاقُوَّةٍ۔
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahil-lathee kasanee hatha warazaqaneehi min ghayri hawlin minnee wala quwwah.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, praise is to You. You have clothed me. I ask You for its goodness and the goodness of what it has been made for, and I seek Your protection from the evil of it and the evil of what it has been made for.
duas.arabic: اَلَّلهُمَّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ أَنْتَ كَسَوْتَنِيْهِ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَهُ وَخَيْرَ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّهِ وَشَرِّ مَا صُنِعَ لَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma lakal-hamdu 'Anta kasawtaneehi, 'as'aluka min khayrihi wa khayri maa suni'a lahu, wa 'a'oothu bika min sharrihi wa sharri ma suni'a lahu

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, just as You have made my external features beautiful, make my character beautiful as well.
duas.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ حَسَّنْتَ خَلْقِي فَحَسِّنْ خُلُقِي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma antha hasantha khalqi fa hasintha khulqi

duas.ar_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.fr_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.id_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.en_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.ms_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.es_translation: Glory unto Him Who created this transportation, for us, though we were unable to create it on our own. And unto our Lord we shall return.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنقَلِبُونَ
duas.transliteration: Subhana-alladhi sakh-khara la-na hadha wa ma kunna la-hu muqrinin. Wa inna ila Rabbi-na la munqalibun.
duas.ar_description: هل تُسافر الى مكان ما؟ قم بقراءة هذا الدُعاء لرحلة آمنة.
duas.fr_description: Vous voyagez quelque part? Récitez cette dua pour un bon voyage.
duas.id_description: Melakukan perjalanan? Bacalah doa ini untuk perjalanan yang aman
duas.en_description: Travelling somewhere? Recite this Dua for a safe journey.
duas.ms_description: Hendak berjalan ke suatu tempat? Baca doa ini untuk perjalanan yang selamat.
duas.es_description: ¿ Cuándo viajas a cualquier lugar? Recita esta súplica para un viaje seguro

duas.ar_translation:
Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.
None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord. Allah fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant, and single-handedly defeated the allies.

duas.es_translation:
Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest.
None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. We return, repent, worship and praise our Lord. Allah fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant, and single-handedly defeated the allies.
duas.arabic: ا للهُ أَكْـبَر، ا للهُ أَكْـبَر، ا للهُ أَكْـبَر،لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَحْـدَهُ لا شريكَ لهُ، لهُ الملكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، وهُوَ على كُلّ شَيءٍ قَـدير، آيِبـونَ تائِبـونَ عابِـدونَ لِرَبِّـنا حـامِـدون، صَدَقَ اللهُ وَعْـدَه، وَنَصَـرَ عَبْـدَه، وَهَزَمَ الأَحْـزابَ وَحْـدَه.
duas.transliteration: Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar, Allahu Akbar, Laa ilaaha illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku, wa lahul-hamdu, wa Huwa alaa kulli shay in Qadeer, aaiboona, taaiboona, aabidoona, lirabbinaa haamidoona, sadaqallaahu wadahu, wa nasara abdahu, wa hazamal-ahzaaba wahdahu.

duas.ar_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.fr_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.id_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.en_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.ms_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.es_translation: My Lord! Let my entry (to the city of Al-Madinah) be good, and likewise my exit (from the city of Makkah) be good. And grant me from You an authority to help me (or a firm sign or a proof).
duas.arabic: رَّبِّ اَدْخِلْنِيْ مُدْخَلَ صِدْقٍ وَّاَخْرِجْنِيْ مُخْــرَجَ صِدْقٍ وَّاجْعَلْ لِّيْ مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ سُلْطٰنًا نَّصِيْرًا
duas.transliteration: Rabbi Adkhilnee Mudkhala S’idqiw Wa Akhrijnee Mukhraja S’diqiw Waj-a’l Lee Mil Ladunkaa Sult’aanan Nas’eeraa
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء للحماية عند الذهاب لرحلة ليلاً.  علّم الله هذا الدُعاء للنبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم).
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua pour vous protéger quand vous partez en voyage la nuit. Allah a enseigné cette dua au Prophète (SAW).
duas.id_benefits: Bac doa ini untuk mendapatkan perlindungan ketika akan pergi di malam hari.  Alloh mengajarkan doa ini kepada Rasululloh (SAW).
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua for protection when going on a journey at night. Allah taught this dua to Prophet (SAW).
duas.ms_benefits: Baca do ini untuk perlindungan ketika bermusafir di malam hari. Allah mengajarkan doa ini kepada Nabi (SAW).
duas.es_benefits: Leer esta dua'a para la protección cuando ir en un viaje por la nocheDios enseñó esta dua’a al Profeta (SAW)
duas.ar_description: هل تنوي السفر ليلاً؟ أقرأ هذا الدعاء لرحلة آمنة
duas.fr_description: Vous voyagez la nuit? Lisez cette dua pour un voyage de nuit en toute sécurité
duas.id_description: Melakukan perjalanan pada malam hari? Baca doa ini agar perjalanan malammu aman
duas.en_description: Travelling at night? Read this dua for a safe journey!
duas.ms_description: Bermusafir di malam hari? Baca doa ini untuk perjalanan yang!
duas.es_description: ¿ Cuándo viajas por la noche? ¡lee esta súplica para un viaje seguro!

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.id_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.en_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.es_translation: My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].
duas.arabic: رَّبِّ أَنزِلْنِي مُنزَلًا مُّبَارَكًا وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الْمُنزِلِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi anzilnee munzalan mubarakanwaanta khayru almunzileen
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء إذا كُنت تواجه مُشكلة إيجاد مكان لتعيش فيه.  قام نوح (عليه السلام) بإقامة الصلاة شكراً لله عندما رَست سفينته بمكان جديد بعد الفيضانات.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua si vous avez du mal à trouver un logement. Le prophète Nooh(AS) a prié Allah quand son navire a débarqué dans un nouvel endroit après les inondations.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini jika kamu kesulitan menemukan tempat tinggal. Nabi Nuh (AS) berdoa kepada Alloh ketika kapalnya mendarat di tempat baru setelah banjir.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua if you're having trouble finding a place to live. Prophet Nooh (AS) prayed to Allah when his ship landed in a new place after the floods.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini jika anda menghadapi masalah mencari tempat tinggal. Nabi Nuh (AS) berdoa kepada Allah ketika kapalnya mendarat di tempat baru selepas banjir.
duas.es_benefits: Lee esta dua’a si tienes un problema para encontrar un lugar para vivir.El Profeta Noé (AS) rezó a Dios cuando su barco desembarcó en un lugar nuevo después de las inundaciones

duas.ar_translation: Praise be to Allah Who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims.
duas.fr_translation: Praise be to Allah Who has fed us and given us drink and made us Muslims.

duas.transliteration: Alhamdulilahil ladhi at’amana, wasaqana, waj’alna min-al Muslimeen

duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'at'im man 'at'amanee wasqi man saqaanee

duas.ar_translation: I intend to keep the fast for tomorrow in the month of Ramadan.

duas.transliteration: Wa bisawmi ghadinn nawaiytu min shahri ramadan

duas.ar_translation: O Allah! I fasted for You and I believe in You and I put my trust in You and I break my fast with Your sustenance.

duas.ar_translation: With you, those who are fasting have broken their fast, you have fed those who are righteous, and the angels recite their prayers upon you.

duas.arabic:
سُبْحَانَ اللَّه (33 times)
اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّه (33 times)
اَللَّهُ أَكْبَر (34 times)
duas.transliteration:
Subhana-Allah (33 times)
Alhamdulillah (33 times)
Allahu Akbar (34 times)
duas.ar_benefits: قُل سُبحان الله والحمد لله 33 مرة والله أكبر 34 مرة
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez Subhana-Allah et Alhamdulillah 33 fois et Allahu Akbar 34 fois
duas.id_benefits: Ucapkan Subhanalloh dan Alhamdulillag sebanyak 33 kali dan Allohuakbar sebanyak 34 kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite Subhana-Allah and Alhamdulillah 33 times and Allahu Akbar 34 times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca Subhanallah dan Alhamdulillah sebanyak 33 kali dan Allahu Akhbar sebanyak 34 kali

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْماً نَافِعاً، وَرِزْقاً طَيِّباً، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka 'ilman naafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan

duas.ar_translation: O Allah , I ask You for Paradise and seek Your protection from the Fire.

duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'alukal-jannata wa 'a'oothu bika minan-naar

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!

duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta subhaanaka 'innee kuntu minadh-dhaalimeen
