duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah , the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللّٰہِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ
duas.transliteration: Bismi-llāhi r-raḥmāni r-raḥīm
duas.ar_description: يجب أن تقول هذا الدُعاء لتُضيف البركة الى انشطتُك اليومية
duas.fr_description: Vous devriez réciter cette dua pour ajouter de la Barakah à vos actions quotidiennes
duas.id_description: Kamu harus membaca doa ini untuk menambah keberkahan dalam keseharianmu
duas.en_description: You should recite this dua to add Barakah to your daily tasks
duas.ms_description: Anda perlu membaca doa ini untuk menambah keberkatan pada urusan harian anda.
duas.es_description: Debes recitar esta súplica (Dua) para bendecir tus tareas diarias.

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Give us in this world that which is good and in the Hereafter that which is good, and save us from the torment of the Fire!
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَآ اٰتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَّفِي الْاٰخِرَةِ حَسَـنَةً وَّقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Aatinaa Fiddunyaa H’asanata Wa Fil Aakhirati H’asanata Wa Qinaa A’d’aaban Naar
duas.ar_benefits: هذا هو الدُعاء الذي كان يتضرع به النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) دائماً والذي يتضمن كُل ما نحتاجه في الحياة الدُنيا والآخرة.  يُمكنك أن تقول هذا الدُعاء في جميع الأوقات
duas.fr_benefits: C'est la supplication la plus lue du Prophète (SAW) à Allah. C'est une dua complète qui contient tout ce dont nous avons besoin pour ce monde et l'au-delà. On peut réciter cette dua à tout moment.
duas.id_benefits: Ini adalah doa yang paling sering dipanjatkan oleh Rasululloh (SAW) kepada Alloh. Ini adalah doa yang komprehensif yang berisi semua kebutuhan kita di dunia dan akhirat. Kita dapat membaca doa ini setiap saat.
duas.en_benefits: This is the Prophet's (SAW) most read supplication to Allah. It is a comprehensive dua which contains everything we need for this world and the hereafter. We can recite this dua at all times.
duas.ms_benefits: Ini doa yang sering dibaca oleh  Nabi (SAW) kepada Allah. Ia doa komprehensif yang mengandungi semua yang kita perlukan di dunia dan di akhirat. Kita boleh membaca doa ini pada bila-bila masa.
duas.es_benefits: Esta es la súplica más leída del profeta (SAW) a Alá. Es un dua integral que contiene todo lo que necesitamos para este mundo y el más allá. Podemos recitar siempre esta dua’a
duas.ar_description: خُذ دقيقة مِن وقتِك حتى تُصلي ليحفظك الله في الدُنيا والآخرة
duas.fr_description: Take a minute to pray for protection in this world and the hereafter
duas.id_description: Luangkan waktumu untuk berdoa memohon perlindungan dunia dan akhirat
duas.en_description: Take a minute to pray for protection in this world and the hereafter
duas.ms_description: Ambil masa sekejap berdoa untuk perlindungan di dunia dan di akhirat.
duas.es_description: Tómate un minuto para que ores para la protección en este mundo y el más allá

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord, surely You will gather the people for a Day about which there is no doubt. Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا إِنَّكَ جَامِعُ النَّاسِ لِيَوْمٍ لاَّ رَيْبَ فِيهِ إِنَّ اللّهَ لاَ يُخْلِفُ الْمِيعَادَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana innaka jami'unnasi li-Yawmil la rayba fi innAllaha la yukhliful mi'aad

duas.ar_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.fr_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.id_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.en_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.ms_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.es_translation: He is Allah (the) One. The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He begets not nor was He begotten, and there is none equal to Him.
duas.arabic:
قُلْ هُوَ اللهُ أَحَدٌ 
اللهُ الصَّمَدُ لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
duas.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul Huwallaahu 'Ahad. Allaahus-Samad. Lam yalid wa lam yoolad. Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan 'ahad
duas.ar_benefits: يقال مرة بعد صلاة الظهر، والعصر، والعشاء.  يقال 3 مرات بعد صلاة الفجر والمغرب.
duas.fr_benefits: Recite this dua to seek Allah's guidance before taking a decision. Recite once after Dhuhr, Asr and Isha prayers and thrice after Fajr & Maghrib prayers.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk memohon bimbingan Alloh sebelum mengambil keputusan.  Bacalah sekali setelah sholat Dzuhur, Ashar, dan Isya serta tiga kali setelah sholat Subuh dan Magrib.
duas.en_benefits: Recite once after Dhuhr, Asr and Isha prayers. Recite thrice after Fajr & Maghrib prayers.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca sekali selepas solat Zohor, Asar dan Isyak. Baca tiga kali selepas solat Subuh dan Maghrib.
duas.es_benefits: Recita una vez después de las oraciones de Dhuhr, Asr y Isha’a. Recita tres veces después de las oraciones de Fajr y Maghrib.

duas.ar_translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this day and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil of what follows it. My Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and senility. My Lord, I take refuge in You from torment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.

duas.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِيْ هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَوْمِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ، وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِيْ النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِيْ الْقَبْرِ.
duas.transliteration: Asbahna wa-asbahal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah la ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer, rabbi as-aluka khayra ma fee hatha-alyawmi, wakhayra ma baAAdaho, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri hatha-alyawmi, washarri ma baAAdaho, rabbi aAAoothu bika minal-kasal, wasoo-il kibar, rabbi aAAoothu bika min AAathabin fin-nar, waAAathabin fil-qabr.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, by your leave we have reached the morning and by Your leave we have reached the evening, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our resurrection.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ، وَإِلَيْكَ النُّشُورُ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma bika asbahna wabika amsayna, wabika nahya ,wabika namootu wa-ilaykan-nushoor.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَّا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِر لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbee la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtanee wa-ana AAabduk, wa-ana AAala AAahdika wawaAAdika mas-tataAAt, aAAoothu bika min sharri ma sanaAAt, aboo-o laka biniAAmatika AAalay, wa-aboo-o bithanbee, faghfir lee fa-innahu la yaghfiruth-thunooba illa ant.
duas.ar_benefits: من قال هذا ليلاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في تلك الليلة وجب عليه دخول الجنة، ومن قال هذا صباحاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في ذلك اليوم وجب عليه دخول الجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui la récite avec conviction le soir et meurt durant cette nuit-là entrera dans le Paradis, et celui qui la récite avec conviction le matin et meurt durant ce jour-là entrera dans le Paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada malam hari dan meninggal pada malam harinya akan masuk surga, dan siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada pagi hari dan meninggal pada siang harinya akan masuk surga.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this with conviction in the evening and dies during that night shall enter Paradise, and whoever recites it with conviction in the morning and dies during that day shall enter Paradise.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini dengan keyakinan pada waktu petang dan meninggal dunia pada waktu malam, akan memasuki syurga, dan barangsiapa yang membacanya dengan keyakinan pada waktu pagi dan meninggal dunia pada siang harinya akan dapat memasuki syurga.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite ésta con convicción por la tarde y muere durante esta noche entrará al Paraíso y quien la recita con convicción por la mañana y muere durante este día entrará al Paraíso

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).

(four times).

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَصْبَحْتُ أُشْهِدُكَ وَأُشْهِدُ حَمَلَةَ عَرْشِكَ، وَمَلَائِكَتَكَ وَجَمِيعَ خَلْقِكَ، أَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ ( (4 times)أربع مرات)
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee asbahtu oshhiduk, wa-oshhidu hamalata AAarshik, wamala-ikatak, wajameeAAa khalqik, annaka antal-lahu la ilaha illa ant, wahdaka la shareeka lak, wa-anna Muhammadan AAabduka warasooluk (four times).
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء أربع مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua quatre fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak empat kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua four times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak empat kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua cuatro veces

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أَصْبَحَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ma asbaha bee min niAAmatin, aw bi-ahadin min khalqik, faminka wahdaka la shareeka lak, falakal-hamdu walakash-shukr.

duas.ar_translation:
O Allah, grant my body health, O Allah, grant my hearing health, O Allah, grant my sight health. None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times)
O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)

O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)
duas.arabic:
اللَّهُمَّ عَافِـني فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِـنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي، لَا إِلَهَ إلاَّ أَنْتَ.(ثلاثاً*3) 
اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْر، وَالفَقْرِ، وَأَعُوذُبِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ ، لَا إلَهَ إلاَّ أَنْتَ. (3*ثلاثاً).
duas.transliteration:
Allahumma AAafinee fee badanee, allahumma AAafinee fee samAAee, allahumma AAafinee fee basaree, la ilaha illa ant.(three times).
Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-kufr, walfaqr, wa-aAAoothu bika min AAathabil-qabr, la ilaha illa ant (three times).
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua tres veces

duas.ar_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.fr_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.id_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.en_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.ms_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.es_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَآ إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ. (سبع مَرّات حينَحينَ يصْبِح و وَيمسي * 7 timeي)
duas.transliteration: Hasbiyal-lahu la ilaha illa huwa, AAalayhi tawakkalt, wahuwa rabbul-AAarshil-AAatheem
duas.ar_benefits: علّم الله النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) أن يقول هذا الدُعاء. سيتولى الله جميع مسؤولياتك وسيساعدك في التغلب على حُزنك عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء 7 مرات في الصباح وفي المساء. الحديث رواه أبو ذر (رحمه الله).
duas.fr_benefits: Allah enseigna au prophète (SAW) à réciter cette dua. Allah prendra la responsabilité et vous aidera à surmonter votre tristesse si vous récitez cette dua 7 fois le matin et le soir. Hadith narré par Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.id_benefits: Alloh mengajarkan Rasululloh (SAW) untuk membaca doa ini. Alloh akan bertanggung jawab dan menolongmu menghadapi rasa sedih jika kamu membaca doa ini sebanyak 7 kali pada pagi hari dan malam. Hadist ini diriwayatkan oleh Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.en_benefits: Allah taught prophet (SAW) to recite this dua. Allah will take responsibility and would help you overcome your sadness if you recite this dua 7 times in the morning and evening. Hadith narrated by Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.ms_benefits: Allah taught prophet (SAW) to recite this dua. Allah will take responsibility and would help you overcome your sadness if you recite this dua 7 times in the morning and evening. Hadith narrated by Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.es_benefits: Dios enseñó al Profeta (SAW) a recitar esta dua. Dios asumirá la responsabilidad y te ayudará a superar tu tristeza si recita esta dua 7 veces por la mañana y por la tarde. Hadiz narrado por Abu-Dhar (que Alá esté complacido con él)

duas.ar_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.fr_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.id_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.en_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.ms_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.es_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ. (ثلاثاً إِذا أمسى*3 Times)
duas.transliteration: aAAoothu bikalimatil-lahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي، وَدُنْيَايَ، وَأَهْلِي، وَمَالِي، اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِي، وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِي، اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِيَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah, fid-dunya wal-akhirah, allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah fee deenee, wadunyaya wa-ahlee, wamalee, allahummas-tur AAawratee, wa-amin rawAAatee, allahummah-fathnee min bayni yaday, wamin khalfee, waAAan yameenee, waAAan shimalee, wamin fawqee, wa-aAAoothu biAAathamatika an oghtala min tahtee.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّماوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِي سُوءاً أَوْ أَجُرَّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma AAalimal-ghaybi washshahadah, fatiras-samawati wal-ard, rabba kulli shayin wamaleekah, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, aAAoothu bika min sharri nafsee wamin sharrish-shaytani washirkih, waan aqtarifa AAala nafsee soo-an aw ajurrahu ila muslim.

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الَْأرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ. (ثلاثاً *3 Times)
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lahil-lathee la yadurru maAAas-mihi shay-on fil-ardi wala fis-sama-i wahuwas-sameeAAul-AAaleem.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua tres veces

duas.ar_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.id_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.en_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.ms_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.es_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.arabic: رَضِيتُ باللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِيناً، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَى اللَّهُ عَلِيهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيَّاً. (ثلاثاً*3 Times)
duas.transliteration: Radeetu billahi rabban wabil-islami deenan wabiMuhammadin peace be upon to him nabiyya.
duas.ar_benefits: أجعل من عادتك أن تقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء! قد وعد الله بأن يُسعد يوم القيامة من يقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء.
duas.fr_benefits: Prenez l'habitude de réciter cette dua 3 fois chaque matin ou chaque soir! Allah a promis que, quiconque dit cela trois fois chaque matin ou chaque soir, sera content le jour de la Résurrection.
duas.id_benefits: Biasakanlah untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak 3 kali di pagi dan malam hari!  Alloh berjanji bahwa siapapun yang memanjatkannya sebanyak tiga kali di pagi dan malam hari akan berbahagia di Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.en_benefits: Make it a habit to recite this dua 3 times every morning or evening! Allah has promised that anyone who says this three times every morning or evening will be pleased on the Day of Resurrection.
duas.ms_benefits: Jadikan ia rutin untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak 3 kali setiap pagi atau petang! Allah berjanji bahawa sesiapa yang membacanya sebanyak tiga kali pada waktu pagi atau petang akan berbahagia pada Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Haz un hábito recitar esta dua 3 veces cada mañana o tarde! Alá he prometido que quien diga ésta tres veces cada mañana o tarde serás complacido en el Día de Resurrección

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.id_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.en_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.ms_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.es_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ، وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ، وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ . (ثلاثاً*3 Times)
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-lahi wabihamdih, AAadada khalqihi warida nafsih, wazinata AAarshih, wamidada kalimatih.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua tres veces

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.id_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.en_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.ms_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.es_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ . 100Times(مائة مرة)
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-lahi wabihamdih.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء مائة مرة في اليوم وسيغفر الله لك ذنوبك ولو كانت مثل زبد البحر.  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم في الصباح وفي المساء، لن يأتي أحداً يوم القيامة أفضل من الذي قالها أو قال أكثر منها.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette Dua cent fois par jour et vous verrez vos péchés pardonnés même s'ils sont comme l'écume de la mer. Le Prophète (SAW) dit:Quiconque dira ce jour le matin et le soir (100 fois), nul ne viendra au Jour de la Résurrection avec quoi que ce soit de mieux, si ce n'est quelqu'un qui a dit la même chose ou même plus.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari dan dosa-dosamu akan diampuni bahkan jika bagaikan buih di lautan. Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Siapapun yang membacanya pada pagi dan malam hari (100 kali), tidak akan datang di Hari Kebangkitan dengan yang lebih baik daripada seseorang yang telah sama-sama memanjatkannya atau bahkan lebih lagi.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this Dua one hundred times a day and you will have your sins forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea. The Prophet (SAW) said: whoever say this day at morning & evening (100 times), none shall come on the Day of Ressurection with anything better except someonewho has said the same or even more.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari dan dosa anda akan diampunkan walaupun jika ia sebanyak buih di lautan. Nabi (SAW) bersabda: Barangsiapa yang menyebutnya pada waktu pagi dan petang (100 kali), tiada yang akan datang pada Hari Kebangkitan dengan yang lebih baik melainkan mereka yang telah menyebutnya sebanyak jumlah tersebut atau lebih.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta Dua cien veces en un día y tus pecados serán borrados aún si fueran como la espuma del mar. El Profeta (SAW) dijo: quien dice en un día por la mañana & por la tarde (100 veces), nadie vendrá en el Día de Resurrección con algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho excepto quien dice lo mismo o más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.fr_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.id_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.ms_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.es_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.en_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.arabic: يَاحَيُّ، يَا قَيُّومُ، بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ، أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ، وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ.
duas.transliteration: Ya hayyu ya qayyoom, birahmatika astagheeth, aslih lee sha/nee kullah, wala takilnee ila nafsee tarfata AAayn.

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.id_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.en_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.ms_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.es_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ . 100/10 Times(مائة مرة)
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer.
duas.ar_benefits: من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم سيُجزي بأجر تحرير عشرة من العبيد. سيُكتب له مائة حسنة ويُمحى عنه مائة سيئة. وسيكون في عصمة من الشيطان حتى المساء. لن يستطيع أحداً تقديم أفضل من ذلك فيما عدا الشخص الذي قالها أكثر من ذلك.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui récite cela cent fois par jour aura la récompense de libérer dix esclaves. Cent Hasanaat (récompenses) seront écrites pour lui et cent méfaits seront effacés. Il sera protégé de Satan jusqu'au soir. Personne ne pourra rien présenter de mieux que cela, sauf quelqu'un qui a récité plus que cela.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari akan mendapatkan hasanah (pahala) sebesar membebaskan sepuluh budak. Seratus pahala akan dicatat untuknya dan seratus perbuatan buruk akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi dari setan hingga malam hari. Tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat mempersembahkan apapun lebih baik dari ini kecuali seseorang yang membacanya lebih dari ini.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this one hundred times a day will have the reward of freeing ten slaves. One hundred Hasanaat (rewards) will be written for him and one hundred misdeeds will be washed away. He will be shielded from Satan until the evening. No one will be able to present anything better than this except for someone who has recited more than this.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari akan mendapat ganjaran membebaskan sepuluh hamba. Satu ratus Hasanaat (pahala) akan tertulis untuknya dan satu ratus keburukan akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi daripada Syaitan sehingga petang hari. Tiada siapa akan mampu menghadiahkan yang lebih baik daripada ini kecuali seseorang yang membaca lebih darilada ini.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite esta cien veces en un día, tendrá una recompensa equivalente a la de liberar diez esclavos, se le registrarán cien bendiciones (hasanat, buenas obras), y se le borrarán cien malas obras (sai’át), estará protegido de Satanás por eso hasta que la tarde llegue. Nadie puede hacer algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho, excepto quien hace más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.
duas.fr_translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.
duas.id_translation: We have reached the morning and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.
duas.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّـي أَسْأَلُكَ خَـيْرَ هَذَا الْـيَوْمِ ، فَتْحَهُ، وَنَصْرَهُ، وَنُورَهُ وَبَرَكَتَهُ، وَهُدَاهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِيهِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ.
duas.transliteration: Asbahna wa-asbahal-mulku lillahi rabbil-AAalameen, allahumma innee as-aluka khayra hathal-yawm, fat-hahu, wanasrahu, wanoorahu, wabarakatahu, wahudahu, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri ma feehi, washarri ma baAAdah.

duas.ar_translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what follows it. My Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and senility. My Lord, I take refuge in You from torment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.
duas.fr_translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time unto Allah belongs all sovereignty, and all praise is for Allah. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. My Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what follows it. My Lord, I take refuge in You from laziness and senility. My Lord, I take refuge in You from torment in the Fire and punishment in the grave.

My Lord, I ask You for the good of this night and the good of what follows it and I take refuge in You from the evil of this night and the evil of what follows it. duas.arabic: اَمْسَيْنَا وَاَمْسَ الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، رَبِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِيْ هَذَا اللَّيْلَةِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا اللَّيْلَةِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ، وَسُوءِ الْكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِيْ النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِيْ الْقَبْرِ.
duas.transliteration: Amsayna wa-amsal-mulku lillah walhamdu lillah la ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer, rabbi as-aluka khayra ma fee hathihil-laylah, wakhayra ma baAAdaha, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri hathihil-laylah, washarri ma baAAdaha, rabbi aAAoothu bika minal-kasal, wasoo-il kibar, rabbi aAAoothu bika min AAathabin fin-nar, waAAathabin fil-qabr.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, by Your leave we have reached the evening and by Your leave we have reached the morning, by Your leave we live and die and unto You is our return.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ بِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا، وَبِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا، وَبِكَ نَحْيَا، وَبِكَ نَمُوتُ وَإِلَـيْكَ المَصِيْر.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma bika amsayna, wabika asbahna, wabika nahya wabika namootu wa-ilaykal-maseer.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.

I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَّا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِر لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbee la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtanee wa-ana AAabduk, wa-ana AAala AAahdika wawaAAdika mas-tataAAt, aAAoothu bika min sharri ma sanaAAt, aboo-o laka biniAAmatika AAalay, wa-aboo-o bithanbee, faghfir lee fa-innahu la yaghfiruth-thunooba illa ant.
duas.ar_benefits: من قال هذا ليلاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في تلك الليلة وجب عليه دخول الجنة، ومن قال هذا صباحاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في ذلك اليوم وجب عليه دخول الجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui la récite avec conviction le soir et meurt durant cette nuit-là entrera dans le Paradis, et celui qui la récite avec conviction le matin et meurt durant ce jour-là entrera dans le Paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada malam hari dan meninggal pada malam harinya akan masuk surga, dan siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada pagi hari dan meninggal pada siang harinya akan masuk surga.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this with conviction in the evening and dies during that night shall enter Paradise, and whoever recites it with conviction in the morning and dies during that day shall enter Paradise.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini dengan keyakinan pada waktu petang dan meninggal dunia pada waktu malam, akan memasuki syurga, dan barangsiapa yang membacanya dengan keyakinan pada waktu pagi dan meninggal dunia pada siang harinya akan dapat memasuki syurga.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite esta con convicción por la tarde y muere en esta noche entrará al Paraíso, y quien la recite con convicción por la mañana y muere en este día entrará al Paraíso.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.id_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.en_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.es_translation: O Allah, verily I have reached the morning and call on You, the bearers of Your throne, Your angles, and all of Your creation to witness that You are Allah, none has the right to be worshipped except You, alone, without partner and that Muhammad is Your Servant and Messenger. (four times).
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أمسيت أُشْهِدُكَ وَأُشْهِدُ حَمَلَةَ عَرْشِكَ، وَمَلَائِكَتَكَ وَجَمِيعَ خَلْقِكَ، أَنَّكَ أَنْتَ اللَّهُ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، وَأَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُكَ وَرَسُولُكَ  4 Times(أربع مرات)
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee asbahtu oshhiduk, wa-oshhidu hamalata AAarshik, wamala-ikatak, wajameeAAa khalqik, annaka antal-lahu la ilaha illa ant, wahdaka la shareeka lak, wa-anna Muhammadan AAabduka warasooluk (four times).
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء أربع مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua quatre fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak empat kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua four times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak empat kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua'a cuatro veces

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, what blessing I or any of Your creation have risen upon, is from You alone, without partner, so for You is all praise and unto You all thanks.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ مَا أََمْسَ بِي مِنْ نِعْمَةٍ أَوْ بِأَحَدٍ مِنْ خَلْقِكَ فَمِنْكَ وَحْدَكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ، فَلَكَ الْحَمْدُ وَلَكَ الشُّكْرُ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma ma amsa bee min niAAmatin, aw bi-ahadin min khalqik, faminka wahdaka la shareeka lak, falakal-hamdu walakash-shukr.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, grant my body health, O Allah, grant my hearing health, O Allah, grant my sight health. None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times) O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, grant my body health, O Allah, grant my hearing health, O Allah, grant my sight health. None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times) O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)
duas.id_translation: O Allah, grant my body health, O Allah, grant my hearing health, O Allah, grant my sight health. None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times) O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)

None has the right to be worshipped except You.(three times) O Allah, I take refuge with You from disbelief and poverty, and I take refuge with You from the punishment of the grave. None has the right to be worshipped except You. (three times)
duas.arabic:
اللَّهُمَّ عَافِـني فِي بَدَنِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِـنِي فِي سَمْعِي، اللَّهُمَّ عَافِنِي فِي بَصَرِي، لَا إِلَهَ إلاَّ أَنْتَ.(ثلاثاً 3 Times) 
اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكُفْر، وَالفَقْرِ، وَأَعُوذُبِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ ، لَا إلَهَ إلاَّ أَنْتَ. (ثلاثاً 3 Times).
duas.transliteration:
Allahumma AAafinee fee badanee, allahumma AAafinee fee samAAee, allahumma AAafinee fee basaree, la ilaha illa ant.
Allahumma innee aAAoothu bika minal-kufr, walfaqr, wa-aAAoothu bika min AAathabil-qabr, la ilaha illa ant (three times).
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua'a tres veces

duas.ar_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.fr_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.id_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.en_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.ms_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.es_translation: Allah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne. (seven times morning and evening)
duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ لَآ إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ. (سبع مَرّات حينَ يصْبِح وَيمسي 7 Times)
duas.transliteration: Hasbiyal-lahu la ilaha illa huwa, AAalayhi tawakkalt, wahuwa rabbul-AAarshil-AAatheem
duas.ar_benefits: علّم الله النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) أن يقول هذا الدُعاء. سيتولى الله جميع مسؤولياتك وسيساعدك في التغلب على حُزنك عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء 7 مرات في الصباح وفي المساء. الحديث رواه أبو ذر (رحمه الله).
duas.fr_benefits: Allah enseigna au prophète (SAW) à réciter cette dua. Allah prendra la responsabilité et vous aidera à surmonter votre tristesse si vous récitez cette dua 7 fois le matin et le soir. Hadith narré par Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.id_benefits: Alloh mengajarkan Rasululloh (SAW) untuk membaca doa ini. Alloh akan bertanggung jawab dan menolongmu menghadapi rasa sedih jika kamu membaca doa ini sebanyak 7 kali pada pagi hari dan malam. Hadist ini diriwayatkan oleh Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.en_benefits: Allah taught prophet (SAW) to recite this dua. Allah will take responsibility and would help you overcome your sadness if you recite this dua 7 times in the morning and evening. Hadith narrated by Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.ms_benefits: Allah mengajar Nabi (SAW) untuk membaca doa ini. Allah akan mengambil tanggungjawab dan membantu anda mengalahkan kesedihan anda jika anda membaca doa ini sebanyak 7 kali pada waktu pagi dan petang. Hadith diriwayatkan oleh Abu Dharr (RA).
duas.es_benefits: Dios enseñó al Profeta (SAW) a recitar esta dua. Dios asumirá la responsabilidad y te ayudará a superar tu tristeza si recita esta dua 7 veces por la mañana y por la tarde. Hadiz narrado por Abu-Dhar (que Alá esté complacido con él)

duas.ar_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.fr_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.id_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.en_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.ms_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.es_translation: I take refuge in Allah’s perfect words from the evil He has created. (three times in the evening)
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ. (ثلاث اً إِذا أمسى 3 Times)
duas.transliteration: aAAoothu bikalimatil-lahit-tammati min sharri ma khalaq.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.

O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.

O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in this life and the next. O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being in my religious and worldly affairs, and my family and my wealth. O Allah, veil my weaknesses and set at ease my dismay. O Allah, preserve me from the front and from behind and on my right and on my left and from above, and I take refuge with You lest I be swallowed up by the earth.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي، وَدُنْيَايَ، وَأَهْلِي، وَمَالِي، اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِي، وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِي، اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِيَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah, fid-dunya wal-akhirah, allahumma innee as-alukal-AAafwa walAAafiyah fee deenee, wadunyaya wa-ahlee, wamalee, allahummas-tur AAawratee, wa-amin rawAAatee, allahummah-fathnee min bayni yaday, wamin khalfee, waAAan yameenee, waAAan shimalee, wamin fawqee, wa-aAAoothu biAAathamatika an oghtala min tahtee.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the seen, Creator of the heavens and the Earth, Lord and Sovereign of all things, I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped except You. I take refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil and shirk of the devil, and from committing wrong against my soul or bringing such upon another Muslim.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّماوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِي سُوءاً أَوْ أَجُرَّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma AAalimal-ghaybi washshahadah, fatiras-samawati wal-ard, rabba kulli shayin wamaleekah, ashhadu an la ilaha illa ant, aAAoothu bika min sharri nafsee wamin sharrish-shaytani washirkih, waan aqtarifa AAala nafsee soo-an aw ajurrahu ila muslim.

duas.ar_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.fr_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.id_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.en_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.ms_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.es_translation: In the name of Allah with whose name nothing is harmed on earth nor in the heavens and He is The All-Seeing, The All-Knowing.(three times)
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الَّذِي لَا يَضُرُّ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٌ فِي الَْأرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ. (ثلاثاً 3 Times)
duas.transliteration: Bismil-lahil-lathee la yadurru maAAas-mihi shay-on fil-ardi wala fis-sama-i wahuwas-sameeAAul-AAaleem.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua tres veces

duas.ar_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.id_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.en_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.ms_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.es_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.arabic: رَضِيتُ باللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِيناً، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَى اللَّهُ عَلِيهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيَّاً. ( 3 Times ثلاثاً)
duas.transliteration: Radeetu billahi rabban wabil-islami deenan wabiMuhammadin peace be upon to him nabiyya.
duas.ar_benefits: أجعل من عادتك أن تقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء! قد وعد الله بأن يُسعد يوم القيامة من يقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء.
duas.fr_benefits: Prenez l'habitude de réciter cette dua 3 fois chaque matin ou chaque soir! Allah a promis que, quiconque dit cela trois fois chaque matin ou chaque soir, sera content le jour de la Résurrection.
duas.id_benefits: Biasakanlah untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak 3 kali di pagi dan malam hari!  Alloh berjanji bahwa siapapun yang memanjatkannya sebanyak tiga kali di pagi dan malam hari akan berbahagia di Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.en_benefits: Make it a habit to recite this dua 3 times every morning or evening! Allah has promised that anyone who says this three times every morning or evening will be pleased on the Day of Resurrection.
duas.ms_benefits: Jadikan ia rutin untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali setiap pagi dan petang! Allah telah berjanji bahawa sesiap yang menyebutnya sebanyak tiga kali setiap pagi atau petang akan berasa gembira pada Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Haz un hábito recitar esta dua 3 veces cada mañana o tarde! Alá he prometido que quien diga ésta tres veces cada mañana o tarde serás complacido en el Día de Resurrección

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.id_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.en_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.ms_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.es_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him by the number of His creation and His pleasure, and by the weight of His throne, and the ink of His words. (three times)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ، وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ، وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ . (ثلاثاً 3 Times)
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-lahi wabihamdih, AAadada khalqihi warida nafsih, wazinata AAarshih, wamidada kalimatih.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua three times
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua tres veces

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.id_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.en_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.ms_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.es_translation: How perfect Allah is and I praise Him.(one hundred times)
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ .  100 Times(مائة مرة)
duas.transliteration: Subhanal-lahi wabihamdih.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء مائة مرة في اليوم وسيغفر الله لك ذنوبك ولو كانت مثل زبد البحر.  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم في الصباح وفي المساء، لن يأتي أحداً يوم القيامة أفضل من الذي قالها أو قال أكثر منها.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette Dua cent fois par jour et vous verrez vos péchés pardonnés même s'ils sont comme l'écume de la mer. Le Prophète (SAW) dit:Quiconque dira ce jour le matin et le soir (100 fois), nul ne viendra au Jour de la Résurrection avec quoi que ce soit de mieux, si ce n'est quelqu'un qui a dit la même chose ou même plus.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari dan dosa-dosamu akan diampuni bahkan jika bagaikan buih di lautan. Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Siapapun yang membacanya pada pagi dan malam hari (100 kali), tidak akan datang di Hari Kebangkitan dengan yang lebih baik daripada seseorang yang telah sama-sama memanjatkannya atau bahkan lebih lagi.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this Dua one hundred times a day and you will have your sins forgiven even if they are like the foam of the sea.The Prophet (SAW) said: whoever say this day at morning & evening (100 times), none shall come on the Day of Ressurection with anything better except someonewho has said the same or even more.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari dan dosa anda akan diampunkan walaupun jika ia sebanyak buih di lautan. Nabi (SAW) bersabda: Barangsiapa yang menyebutnya pada waktu pagi dan petang (100 kali), tiada yang akan datang pada Hari Kebangkitan dengan yang lebih baik melainkan mereka yang telah menyebutnya sebanyak jumlah tersebut atau lebih.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta Dua cien veces en un día y tus pecados serán borrados aún si fueran como la espuma del mar. El Profeta (SAW) dijo: quien dice en un día por la mañana & por la tarde (100 veces), nadie vendrá en el Día de Resurrección con algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho excepto quien dice lo mismo o más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.fr_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.id_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.en_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.ms_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.es_translation: O Ever Living, O Self-Subsisting and Supporter of all, by Your mercy I seek assistance, rectify for me all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself, even for the blink of an eye.
duas.arabic: يَاحَيُّ، يَا قَيُّومُ، بِرَحْمَتِكَ أَسْتَغِيثُ، أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ، وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ.
duas.transliteration: Ya hayyu ya qayyoom, birahmatika astagheeth, aslih lee sha/nee kullah, wala takilnee ila nafsee tarfata AAayn.

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.id_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.en_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.ms_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.es_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, and He is over all things omnipotent. (one hundred times)
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ .  100/10 Times(مائة مرة)
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lah, wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shay-in qadeer.
duas.ar_benefits: من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم سيُجزي بأجر تحرير عشرة من العبيد. سيُكتب له مائة حسنة ويُمحى عنه مائة سيئة. وسيكون في عصمة من الشيطان حتى المساء. لن يستطيع أحداً تقديم أفضل من ذلك فيما عدا الشخص الذي قالها أكثر من ذلك.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui récite cela cent fois par jour aura la récompense de libérer dix esclaves. Cent Hasanaat (récompenses) seront écrites pour lui et cent méfaits seront effacés. Il sera protégé de Satan jusqu'au soir. Personne ne pourra rien présenter de mieux que cela, sauf quelqu'un qui a récité plus que cela.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari akan mendapatkan hasanah (pahala) sebesar membebaskan sepuluh budak. Seratus pahala akan dicatat untuknya dan seratus perbuatan buruk akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi dari setan hingga malam hari. Tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat mempersembahkan apapun lebih baik dari ini kecuali seseorang yang membacanya lebih dari ini.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this one hundred times a day will have the reward of freeing ten slaves. One hundred Hasanaat (rewards) will be written for him and one hundred misdeeds will be washed away. He will be shielded from Satan until the evening. No one will be able to present anything better than this except for someone who has recited more than this.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari akan mendapat ganjaran membebaskan sepuluh hamba. Satu ratus Hasanaat (pahala) akan tertulis untuknya dan satu ratus keburukan akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi daripada Syaitan sehingga petang hari. Tiada siapa akan mampu menghadiahkan yang lebih baik daripada ini kecuali seseorang yang membaca lebih darilada ini.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite esta cien veces en un día, tendrá una recompensa equivalente a la de liberar diez esclavos, se le registrarán cien bendiciones (hasanat, buenas obras), y se le borrarán cien malas obras (sai’át), estará protegido de Satanás por eso hasta que la tarde llegue. Nadie puede hacer algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho, excepto quien hace más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: We have reached the evening and at this very time all sovereignty belongs to Allah, Lord of the worlds. O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

O Allah, I ask You for the good of this day, its triumphs and its victories, its light and its blessings and its guidance, and I take refuge in You from the evil of this day and the evil that follows it.

duas.arabic: أَمْسَيْنَا وَأَمْسَى الْمُلْكُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ هَذِهِ اللَّيْلَةَ فَتْحَهَا وَنَصْرَهَا وَنُورَهَا وَبَرَكَتَهَا وَهُدَاهَا وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِيهَا وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهَا.
duas.transliteration: Amsayna wa-amsal-mulku lillahi rabbil-AAalameen, allahumma innee as-aluka khayra hathal-yawm, fat-hahu, wanasrahu, wanoorahu, wabarakatahu, wahudahu, wa-aAAoothu bika min sharri ma feehi, washarri ma baAAdah.

duas.ar_translation:
I ask Allah for forgiveness.(three times)
O Allah, You are As-Salam and from You is all peace, blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honour.’ AS-Salam: The One Who is free from all defects and deficiencies.
duas.fr_translation:
I ask Allah for forgiveness.(three times)
O Allah, You are As-Salam and from You is all peace, blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honour.’ AS-Salam: The One Who is free from all defects and deficiencies.
duas.id_translation:
I ask Allah for forgiveness.(three times)
