duas.arabic:
أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ . الله أكبر (ثَلاثاً 3  Times)
اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلاَمُ، وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالإِكْرَامِ .
duas.transliteration:
Astaghfirul-lah (three times) 
Allahumma antas-salam waminkas-salam, tabarakta ya thal-jalali wal-ikram.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء لطلب المغفرة من الله في أي وقت من اليوم.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua pour demander le pardon d'Allah à tout moment de la journée.
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah doa ini untuk memohon ampunan Alloh kapanpun.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua to ask Allah's forgiveness anytime of the day.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk memohon keampunan Allah pada bila-bila masa.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta súplica para pedir perdón de Alá en cualquier momento del día

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.O Allah, none can prevent what You have willed to bestow and none can bestow what You have willed to prevent, and no wealth or majesty can benefit anyone, as from You is all wealth and majesty.
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.O Allah, none can prevent what You have willed to bestow and none can bestow what You have willed to prevent, and no wealth or majesty can benefit anyone, as from You is all wealth and majesty.

duas.arabic: لَا إلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، اللَّهُمَّ لَا مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَلَا مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ، وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ.
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer, allahumma la maniAAa lima aAAtayt, wala muAAtiya lima manaAAt, wala yanfaAAu thal-jaddi minkal-jad.
duas.ar_benefits: قل هذا عشر مرات بعد صلاة المغرب والفجر. من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم سيُجزى بأجر تحرير عشرة من العبيد. وستكتب له مائة حسنة ويُمحى عنه مائة سيئة. وسيكون في عصمة من الشيطان حتى المساء. لن يستطيع أحداً تقديم أفضل من ذلك فيما عدا الشخص الذي قالها أكثر من ذلك.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez dix fois après les prières du Maghreb et du Fajr. Celui qui récite cela cent fois par jour aura la récompense de libérer dix esclaves. Cent Hasanaat (récompenses) seront écrites pour lui et cent méfaits seront effacés. Il sera protégé de Satan jusqu'au soir. Personne ne pourra rien présenter de mieux que ça, sauf quelqu'un qui a récité plus que ça.
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah sepuluh kali setelah sholat Magrib dan Subuh. Siapapun yang membaca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari akan mendapatkan balasan sebanyak membebaskan sepuluh budak. Seratus hasanah (pahala) akan dicatat untuknya dan seratus perbuatan buruk akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi dari setan hingga malam hari. Tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat mempersembahkan apapun lebih baik dari ini kecuali seseorang yang membacanya lebih dari ini.
duas.en_benefits: Recite ten times after maghrib & fajr prayers. Whoever recites this one hundred times a day will have the reward of freeing ten slaves. One hundred Hasanaat (rewards) will be written for him and one hundred misdeeds will be washed away. He will be shielded from Satan until the evening. No one will be able to present anything better than this except for someone who has recited more than this.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca sepuluh kali selepas solat maghrib dan subuh.Barangsiapa membaca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari akan mendapat ganjaran membebaskan sepuluh hamba. Satu ratus Hasanaat (pahala) akan tertulis untuknya dan satu ratus keburukan akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi daripada Syaitan sehingga petang hari. Tiada siapa akan mampu menghadiahkan yang lebih baik daripada ini kecuali seseorang yang membaca lebih darilada ini.
duas.es_benefits: Recita diez veces después de los rezos de Fajr & Maghrib. Quien recite esta cien veces en un día, tendrá una recompensa equivalente a la de liberar diez esclavos, se le registrarán cien bendiciones (hasanat, buenas obras), y se le borrarán cien malas obras (sai’át), estará protegido de Satanás por eso hasta que la tarde llegue. Nadie puede hacer algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho, excepto quien hace más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is, all praise is for Allah, and Allah is the greatest.’ (thirty-three times) None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is, all praise is for Allah, and Allah is the greatest.’ (thirty-three times) None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent.

duas.arabic:
سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ، وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ. (ثلاثاً وثلاثين Each Tasbee 33 Times)
لَا إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ 1 Time only .
duas.transliteration:
Subhanal-lah walhamdu lillah, wallahu akbar (thirty-three times).
La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer.

duas.ar_translation:
Say : He is Allah,(the) One, Allahus-Samad ( The Self-Sufficient Master, Whom all creatures need, He neither eats nor drinks ). He begots not , nor was He begotten; And there is none co-equal or comparable unto Him.
[Al-Ikhlas]
Say : I seek refuge with ( Allah ) the Lord of the daybreak, From the evil of what He has created; And from the evil of the darkening ( night ) as it comes with its darkness; ( or the moon as it sets or goes away ). And from the evil of the witchcrafts when they blow in the knots, And from the evil of the envier when he envies.
[Al-Falaq]
Say : I seek refuge with (Allah ) the lord of mankind, The king of mankind, The Ilah ( God ) of mankind, From the evil of the whisperer ( devi l who whispers evil in the hearts of men) , who withdraws ( from his whispering in one’s heart after one remembers Allah ), Who whispers in the breasts of mankind , Of jinns and men.
[An-Nas]
After morning and evening prayers, 3 times. After the other prayers 1 time.

duas.arabic:
قُلْ هُوَ اللهُ أَحَدٌ. اللهُ الصَّمَدُ. لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ. وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ.
[ الإِخْـلاصْ ]
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ. مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ. وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ. وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ. وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
[ الفَلَـقْ ]
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ. مَلِكِ النَّاسِ. إِلَهِ النَّاسِ. مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ. الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ. مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
[ الـنّاس ]
(ثلاث مرات بعد صلاتي الفجر والمغرب. ومرة بعد الصلوات الأخرى)
duas.transliteration:
Qul Huwa-llahu ‘Ahad
Allahus-Samad
Lam Yalid Wa Lam Yulad
Walam Yakul-La-Hu-Kufuwan ‘Ahad       
 [Al-Ikhlas]

Qul ‘A’udhu Bi-Rabbil-Falaq
Min Sharri Ma Khalaq
Wa Min Sharri Ghasiqin ‘Idha Waqab
Wa Min Sharri-Naffathati Fil-‘Uqadi
Wa Min Sharri Hasidin ‘Idha Hasad
[Al-Falaq]

Qul ‘A’udhu Bi-Rabbin-Nas
Malikin-Nas
Ilahin-Nas
Min-Sharril-Waswasil-Khan-Nas
Al-Ladhi Yuwas-wisu Fee Sudurin-Nas
Mina Al-Jinnati Wan-Nas
[An-Nas]

duas.ar_translation: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُ لاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ الْحَيُّ الْقَيُّومُ لاَ تَأْخُذُهُ سِنَةٌ وَلاَ نَوْمٌ لَّهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَا فِي الأَرْضِ مَن ذَا الَّذِي يَشْفَعُ عِنْدَهُ إِلاَّ بِإِذْنِهِ يَعْلَمُ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُمْ وَلاَ يُحِيطُونَ بِشَىْءٍ مِّنْ عِلْمِهِ إِلاَّ بِمَا شَاءَ وَسِعَ كُرْسِيُّهُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالأَرْضَ وَلاَ يَؤُودُهُ حِفْظُهُمَا وَهُوَ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu laa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwal-Hayyul-Qayyoom, laa ta'khuthuhu sinatun wa laa nawm, lahu maa fis-samaawaati wa maafil-'ardh, man thal-lathee yashfa'u 'indahu 'illaa bi'ithnih, ya'lamu maa bayna 'aydeehim wa maa khalfahum, wa laa yuheetoona bishay'im-min 'ilmihi 'illaa bimaa shaa'a, wasi'a kursiyyuhus-samaawaati wal'ardh, wa laa ya'ooduhu hifdhuhumaa, wa Huwal-'Aliyyul- 'Adheem.
duas.ar_description: أطلب المُساعدة والحماية من الله بهذا الدُعاء!
duas.fr_description: Cherchez l'aide et la protection d'Allah avec cette Dua!
duas.id_description: Raihlah pertolongan dan perlindungan Alloh dengan doa ini!
duas.en_description: Seek Allah's help and protection with this Dua!
duas.ms_description: Dapatkan pertolongan Allah dengan doa ini!
duas.es_description: ¡Pide la ayuda y protección de Dios con esta Dua!

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, He gives life and causes death and He is over all things omnipotent. (ten times after the maghrib and fajr prayers)
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner, to Him belongs all sovereignty and praise, He gives life and causes death and He is over all things omnipotent. (ten times after the maghrib and fajr prayers)

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحَدْهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ . (عَشْر مَرّات بَعْدَ المَغْرِب وَالصّـبْح )
duas.transliteration: La ilaha illal-lahu wahdahu la shareeka lah, lahul-mulku walahul-hamd, yuhyee wayumeet, wahuwa AAala kulli shayin qadeer.(ten times after the maghrib & fajr prayers)

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge which is beneficial and sustenance which is good, and deeds which are acceptable. (To be said after giving salam for the fajr prayer)
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْماً نَافِعاً وَرِزْقاً طَيِّباً، وَعَمَلاً مُتَقَبَّلاً . (بَعْد السّلامِ من صَلاةِ الفَجْر )
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innee as-aluka AAilman nafiAAan, warizqan tayyiban, waAAamalan mutaqabbalan.(after salam from fajr prayer).

duas.ar_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.fr_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.id_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.en_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.ms_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.es_translation: Indeed, my Lord is the Hearer of supplication. My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.
duas.arabic:
إِنَّ رَبِّي لَسَمِيعُ الدُّعَاءِ 
رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِي مُقِيمَ الصَّلَاةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِي ۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاءِ
duas.transliteration:
Inna Rabbee la samee ud duaa.
Rabbij alnee muqeemas salaati wa min thurriyyatee rabbana wa taqabbal duaa
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء حتى تُقيم الصلاة بإستمرار.  إعتاد النبي إبراهيم (عليه السلام) أن يقول هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Dites cette supplication pour prier régulièrement la Salat. Le prophète Ibrahim (AS) récitait cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini agar dapat melaksanakan sholat dengan teratur. Nabi Ibrahim (AS) biasanya membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Say this supplication to get regular in offering Salah. Prophet Ibrahim (AS) used to recite this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini agar tetap menunaikan solat. Nabi Ibrahim (AS) pernah membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: Di esta súplica para ofrecer Salat de manera regular. El Profeta Ibraham (AS) solía recitar esta dua.
duas.ar_description: هل تواجه صعوبة في الصلاة 5 مرات يومياً؟ أضغط هنا!
duas.fr_description: Vous avez de la difficulté à prier 5 fois par jour? Cliquez ici!
duas.id_description: Kesulitan melaksanakan sholat 5 waktu sehari? Klik disini!
duas.en_description: Having difficulty offering prayers 5 times a day? Click here!
duas.ms_description: Sukar menunaikan solat 5 kali sehari? Klik di sini!
duas.es_description: ¿De tener dificultad en ofrecer las oraciones 5 veces al día? ¡Haz clic aquí!

duas.ar_translation: Allah! There is none worthy of worship but He, the Ever Living, the One Who sustains and protects all that exists. Neither slumber nor sleep overtakes Him. To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Who is he that can intercede with Him except with His Permission? He knows what happens to them in this world, and what will happen to them in the Hereafter. And they will never compass anything of His Knowledge except that which He wills. His Throne extends over the heavens and the earth, and He feels no fatigue in guarding and preserving them. And He is the Most High, the Most Great.

duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا بعد كُل صلاة.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cela après chaque prière.
duas.id_benefits: Baca ini setiap setelah sholat.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this after every prayer.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini setiap kali selepas solat.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta después de cada oración.
duas.ar_description: أطلب المُساعدة والحماية من الله بهذا الدُعاء!

duas.es_description: ¡Pide la ayuda y protección de Dios con esta Dua!

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
duas.fr_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
duas.id_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.
duas.ms_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of the daybreak, from the evil of what He has created, and from the evil of the darkening (night) as it comes with its darkness, and from the evil of those who practice witchcraft when they blow in the knots, and from the evil of the envier when he envies.

duas.arabic:
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ 
 مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ 
وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ 
وَمِنْ شَرِّ
النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ 
 وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
duas.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem. Qul 'a'oothu birabbil-falaq. Min sharri maa khalaq. Wa min sharri ghaasiqin 'ithaa waqab. Wa min sharrin-naffaathaati fil-'uqad. Wa min sharri haasidin 'ithaa hasad
duas.ar_benefits: يقال مرة بعد صلاة الظهر، والعصر، والعشاء.  يقال 3 مرات بعد صلاة الفجر والمغرب.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez une fois après les prières de Dhuhr, Asr et Isha. Récitez trois fois après les prières de Fajr et Maghrib.
duas.id_benefits: Baca satu kali setelah sholat Dzuhur, Ashar, dan Isya.  Baca tiga kali setelah sholat Subuh dan Magrib.
duas.en_benefits: Recite once after Dhuhr, Asr and Isha prayers. Recite thrice after Fajr & Maghrib prayers.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca sekali selepas solat Zohor, Asar dan Isyak. Baca tiga kali selepas solat Subuh dan Maghrib.
duas.es_benefits: Recita una vez después de las oraciones de Dhuhr, Asr y Isha’a.Recita tres veces después de las oraciones de Fajr y Maghrib.

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.fr_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.id_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.ms_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.es_translation: I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind, the King of mankind , the God of mankind , from the evil of the whisperer who withdraws, who whispers in the breasts of mankind, of jinns and men.
duas.arabic:
قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ 
 مَلِكِ النَّاسِ 
إِلَهِ النَّاسِ 
مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ 
الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ 
مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
duas.transliteration: Bismillaahir-Rahmaanir-Raheem . Qul 'a'oothu birabbin-naas . Malikin-naas . 'Ilaahin-naas . Min sharril-waswaasil-khannaas. Allathee yuwaswisu fee sudoorin-naas. Minal-jinnati wannaas
duas.ar_benefits: يقال مرة بعد صلاة الظهر، والعصر، والعشاء.  يقال 3 مرات بعد صلاة الفجر والمغرب.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez une fois après les prières de Dhuhr, Asr et Isha. Récitez trois fois après les prières de Fajr et Maghrib.
duas.id_benefits: Baca satu kali setelah sholat Dzuhur, Ashar, dan Isya.  Baca tiga kali setelah sholat Subuh dan Magrib.
duas.en_benefits: Recite once after Dhuhr, Asr and Isha prayers. Recite thrice after Fajr & Maghrib prayers.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca sekali selepas solat Zohor, Asar dan Isyak. Baca tiga kali selepas solat Subuh dan Maghrib.
duas.es_benefits: Recita una vez después de las oraciones de Dhuhr, Asr y Isha’a. Recita tres veces después de las oraciones de Fajr y Maghrib.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask You for knowledge that is of benefit , a good provision , and deeds that will be accepted.

duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka 'ilman naafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan

duas.ar_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.id_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.

duas.es_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I ask for Your favor.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إَنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka min fadhlika

duas.ar_translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.
duas.id_translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.

duas.es_translation: Allah is very Gracious and Kind to His slaves. He gives provisions to whom He wills. And He is the All-Strong, the All-Mighty.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُ لَطِيفٌ بِعِبَادِهِ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَاءُ ۖ وَهُوَ الْقَوِيُّ الْعَزِيزُ
duas.transliteration: Allahu lateefun biAAibadihiyarzuqu man yashao wahuwa alqawiyyu alAAazeez

duas.ar_translation: O Allah our Lord! Send us from heaven a table set (with viands), that there may be for us - for the first and the last of us - a solemn festival and a sign from thee; and provide for our sustenance, for thou art the best Sustainer (of our needs).

duas.ar_translation: (O my Lord) You are our Protector, so forgive us and have mercy upon us; and You are the best of forgivers. And ordain for us good in this world, and in the Hereafter. Certainly we have turned unto You.

duas.arabic:
أَنْتَ وَلِيُّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا ۖ وَأَنْتَ خَيْرُ الْغَافِرِينَ
وَاكْتُبْ لَنَا فِي هَٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ إِنَّا هُدْنَا إِلَيْكَ
duas.transliteration:
Anta waliyyuna faghfirlana warhamna waanta khayru alghafireen.
Waktub lana fee hathihi ddunya hasanatan wafee al-akhiratiinna hudna ilayk
duas.ar_benefits: قال هذا الدُعاء النبي موسى (عليه السلام).
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua a été demandé par le prophète Musa (AS).

duas.ar_translation:
O Allah! Possessor of the kingdom, You give the kingdom to whom You will, and You take the kingdom from whom You will, and You endue with honour whom You will, and You humiliate whom You will. In Your Hand is the good. Verily, You are Able to do all things.
You make the night to enter into the day, and You make the day to enter into the night (i.e. increase and decrease in the hours of the night and the day during winter and summer), You bring the living out of the dead, and You bring the dead out of the living. And You give wealth and sustenance to whom You will, without limit (measure or account).

O Allah! Possessor of the kingdom, You give the kingdom to whom You will, and You take the kingdom from whom You will, and You endue with honour whom You will, and You humiliate whom You will. In Your Hand is the good. Verily, You are Able to do all things.

duas.arabic:
اللَّهُمَّ مَالِكَ الْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِي الْمُلْكَ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتَنْزِعُ الْمُلْكَ مِمَّنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَنْ تَشَاءُ ۖ بِيَدِكَ الْخَيْرُ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
تُولِجُ اللَّيْلَ فِي النَّهَارِ وَتُولِجُ النَّهَارَ فِي اللَّيْلِ ۖ وَتُخْرِجُ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ وَتُخْرِجُ الْمَيِّتَ مِنَ الْحَيِّ ۖ وَتَرْزُقُ مَنْ تَشَاءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
duas.transliteration:
allahumma malika almulkitu/tee almulka man tashao watanziAAu almulka mimman tashaowatuAAizzu man tashao watuthillu man tashaobiyadika alkhayru innaka AAala kulli shay-in qadeer.
Tooliju allayla fee annahariwatooliju annahara fee allayli watukhriju alhayyamina almayyiti watukhriju almayyita mina alhayyi watarzuquman tashao bighayri hisab.

duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka 'ilman naafi'an, wa rizqan tayyiban, wa 'amalan mutaqabbalan

duas.ar_translation:
My Lord! Bestow Hukman (religious knowledge, right judgement of the affairs and Prophethood) on me, and join me with the righteous.
And grant me an honourable mention in later generations.
And place me among the inheritors of the Garden of Pleasure.
And forgive my father. Indeed, he has been of those astray.
And disgrace me not on the Day when (all the creatures) will be resurrected.
The Day when there will not benefit [anyone] wealth or children,
But only one who comes to Allah with a sound heart.

duas.arabic:
رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
وَاجْعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
وَاجْعَلْنِي مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعِيمِ
وَاغْفِرْ لِأَبِي إِنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الضَّالِّينَ
وَلَا تُخْزِنِي
يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
duas.transliteration:
Rabbi hab lee hukman wa alhiqnee bis saliheen.
Waj'al lee lisana sidqin fil akhireen.
Waj'al nee min warathati jannatin na'eem.
Waghfir li-abee innahu kanamina addalleen.
Wala tukhzinee yawma yub'asoon.
Yawma la yanfa'u malun walaa banoon.
Illa man ata Allah bi qalbin saleem.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I misguide others , or I am misguided by others , lest I cause others to err or I am caused to err , lest I abuse others or be abused, and lest I behave foolishly or meet with the foolishness of others.

duas.arabic: الَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنْ أَضِلَّ، أّوْ أُضَلَّ، أَوْ أَزِلَّ، أَوْ أُزَلَّ، أَوْ أَظْلِمَ، أَوْ أُظْلَمَ، أَوْ أَجْهَلَ، أَوْ يُجْهَلَ عَلَيَّ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika 'an 'adhilla, 'aw 'udhalla, 'aw 'azilla, 'aw 'uzalla, 'aw 'adhlima, 'aw 'udhlama, 'aw 'ajhala 'aw yujhala 'alayya

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Let not our hearts deviate (from the truth) after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from You. Truly, You are the Bestower.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Let not our hearts deviate (from the truth) after You have guided us, and grant us mercy from You. Truly, You are the Bestower.

duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa Laa Tuzigh Quloobanaa Ba’-Da Id’hadaytanaa Wa Hab Lanaa Mil Ladunka Rah’mah Innaka Antal Wahaab
duas.ar_description: تُريد أن تُقوي إيمانك؟ إضغط هنا

duas.es_description: ¿Quieres fortalecer tu fe? Toca aquí

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Forgive us our sins and our transgressions (in keeping our duties to You), establish our feet firmly, and give us victory over the disbelieving folk.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Forgive us our sins and our transgressions (in keeping our duties to You), establish our feet firmly, and give us victory over the disbelieving folk.

duas.transliteration: Rabbanaghfir lanaa d’unoobanaa wa israafanaa fee amrinaa wa thabbit aqdaamanaa wan s’urnaa a’lal qawmil kaafireen

duas.ar_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.fr_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.id_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.en_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.ms_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.es_translation: I am pleased with Allah as a Lord, and Islam as a religion and Muhammad peace be upon to him as a Prophet. (three times)
duas.arabic: رَضِيتُ باللَّهِ رَبًّا، وَبِالْإِسْلَامِ دِيناً، وَبِمُحَمَّدٍ صَلَى اللَّهُ عَلِيهِ وَسَلَّمَ نَبِيَّاً. (ثلاثاً)
duas.transliteration: Radeetu billahi rabban wabil-islami deenan wabiMuhammadin peace be upon to him nabiyya.
duas.ar_benefits: أجعل من عادتك أن تقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء! قد وعد الله بأن يُسعد يوم القيامة من يقول هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات في كل صباح أو مساء.
duas.fr_benefits: Prenez l'habitude de réciter cette dua 3 fois chaque matin ou chaque soir! Allah a promis que, quiconque dit cela trois fois chaque matin ou chaque soir, sera content le jour de la Résurrection.
duas.id_benefits: Biasakanlah untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak 3 kali di pagi dan malam hari!  Alloh berjanji bahwa siapapun yang memanjatkannya sebanyak tiga kali di pagi dan malam hari akan berbahagia di Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.en_benefits: Make it a habit to recite this dua 3 times every morning or evening! Allah has promised that anyone who says this three times every morning or evening will be pleased on the Day of Resurrection.
duas.ms_benefits: Jadikan ia rutin untuk membaca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali setiap pagi dan petang! Allah telah berjanji bahawa sesiap yang menyebutnya sebanyak tiga kali setiap pagi atau petang akan berasa gembira pada Hari Kebangkitan.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Haz un hábito recitar esta dua 3 veces cada mañana o tarde! Alá he prometido que quien diga ésta tres veces cada mañana o tarde serás complacido en el Día de Resurrección

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge in Allah.

duas.id_translation: I seek refuge in Allah.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge in Allah.

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! We believe in what Thou hast revealed, and we follow the Messenger. Then write us down among those who bear witness.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! We believe in what Thou hast revealed, and we follow the Messenger. Then write us down among those who bear witness.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! We believe in what Thou hast revealed, and we follow the Messenger. Then write us down among those who bear witness.

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آمَنَّا بِمَا أَنزَلَتْ وَاتَّبَعْنَا الرَّسُولَ فَاكْتُبْنَا مَعَ الشَّاهِدِينَِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana amanna bima anzalta wattaba 'nar-Rusula fak-tubna ma'ash-Shahideen
duas.ar_benefits: قيل هذا الدُعاء بواسطة رفقاء النبي عيسى (عليه السلام).

duas.es_benefits: Esta dua fue pedida por los compañeros del Profeta Jesús (AS)

duas.id_description: Kamu bisa menjadi muslim yang lebih baik dengan mengklik disini.

duas.ar_translation: Allah burdens not a person beyond his scope. He gets reward for that (good) which he has earned, and he is punished for that (evil) which he has earned. 'Our Lord! Punish us not if we forget or fall into error, our Lord! Lay not on us a burden like that which You did lay on those before us; our Lord! Put not on us a burden greater than we have strength to bear. Pardon us and grant us Forgiveness. Have mercy on us. You are our Maula (Patron, Supporter and Protector, etc.) and give us victory over the disbelieving people.'

duas.arabic: ۭرَبَّنَا لَا تُؤَاخِذْنَآ اِنْ نَّسِيْنَآ اَوْ اَخْطَاْنَا  ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تَحْمِلْ عَلَيْنَآ اِصْرًا كَمَا حَمَلْتَهٗ عَلَي الَّذِيْنَ مِنْ قَبْلِنَا  ۚ رَبَّنَا وَلَا تُحَمِّلْنَا مَا لَا طَاقَةَ لَنَا بِهٖ ۚ وَاعْفُ عَنَّا   ۪ وَاغْفِرْ لَنَا   ۪ وَارْحَمْنَا   ۪ اَنْتَ مَوْلٰىنَا فَانْــصُرْنَا عَلَي الْقَوْمِ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa Laa Too-Akhid’naaa In-Naseenaa Aw Akht’aanaa Rabbanaa wa Laa Tah’mil A’laynaaa Is’ran Kamaa Ha’maltahoo A’lal Lad’eena min Qablinaa Rabbanaa wa Laa Tuh’ammilnaa Maa Laa T’aaqata Lanaa Bih Wa’-Fu A’nnaa Waghfirlanaa Warh’amnaa Anta Mawlaanaa Fans’urnaa A’lal Qawmil Kaafireen
duas.ar_description: صلي حتى يغفر اللهُ لك ويمحو سيئاتك

duas.es_description: Ora para el perdón y barrer tus pecados

duas.ar_translation: Indeed, I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah.
duas.fr_translation: Indeed, I have turned my face toward He who created the heavens and the earth, inclining toward truth, and I am not of those who associate others with Allah.

duas.arabic: إِنِّي وَجَّهْتُ وَجْهِيَ لِلَّذِي فَطَرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ حَنِيفًا ۖ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُشْرِكِينَ
duas.transliteration: Innee wajjahtu wajhiya lillathee fataraassamawati wal-arda haneefanwama ana mina almushrikeen

duas.ar_translation: Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah , Lord of the worlds. He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims.
duas.fr_translation: Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah , Lord of the worlds. He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims.

duas.es_translation: Indeed, my prayer, my rites of sacrifice, my living and my dying are for Allah , Lord of the worlds. He has no partner. And of this I have been commanded, and I am the first of the Muslims.
duas.arabic:
إِنَّ صَلَاتِي وَنُسُكِي وَمَحْيَايَ وَمَمَاتِي لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ ۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا أَوَّلُ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
duas.transliteration:
inna salatee wanusukee wamahyaya wamamatee lillahi rabbil aalameen.
La shareeka lahu wa bithalika omirtu wa ana aw walul muslimeen

duas.ar_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.fr_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.id_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.en_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.ms_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.es_translation: Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous.
duas.arabic: فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ أَنْتَ وَلِيِّي فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ ۖ تَوَفَّنِي مُسْلِمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
duas.transliteration: fatira assamawatiwal-ardi anta waliyyee fee addunyawal-akhirati tawaffanee musliman waalhiqneebissaliheen
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتنعم بالصُحبة الجيدة والصالحة. قال هذا الدُعاء النبي يوسف (عليه السلام).
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua pour une bonne et juste compagnie. Le prophète Yusuf (AS) récitait cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk mendapatkan teman yang baik dan lurus. Nabi Yusuf (AS) pernah memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua for good and righteous company. Prophet Yusuf (AS) recited this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini agar mendapat teman yang baik dan soleh. Nabi Yusuf (AS) membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: Lee esta dua para una compañía buena y recta. El Profeta José (AS) recitó esta dua

duas.transliteration: Rabbana innana amanna faghfir lana dhunuubana wa qinna 'adhaban-Naar

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَسِعْتَ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ رَّحْمَةً وَعِلْمًا فَاغْفِرْ لِلَّذِينَ تَابُوا وَاتَّبَعُوا سَبِيلَكَ وَقِهِمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana wasi'ta kulla sha'ir Rahmatanw wa 'ilman faghfir lilladhina tabu wattaba'u sabilaka waqihim 'adhabal-Jahiim

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! You have not created (all) this without purpose, glory to You! (Exalted be You above all that they associate with You as partners). Give us salvation from the torment of the Fire. *Our Lord! Verily, whom You admit to the Fire, indeed, You have disgraced him, and never will the Zaalimoon (polytheists and wrong-doers) find any helpers. *Our Lord! Verily, we have heard the call of one (Muhammad p.b.u.h.) calling to Faith: 'Believe in your Lord,' and we have believed. *Our Lord! Forgive us our sins and remit from us our evil deeds, and make us die in the state of righteousness along with Al-Abraar (those who are obedient to Allah and follow strictly His Orders). *Our Lord! Grant us what You promised unto us through Your Messengers and disgrace us not on the Day of Resurrection, for You never break (Your) Promise.

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا مَا خَلَقْتَ هٰذَا بَاطِلًا  ۚ سُبْحٰنَكَ فَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ. رَبَّنَآ اِنَّكَ مَنْ تُدْخِلِ النَّارَ فَقَدْ اَخْزَيْتَهٗ ۭ وَمَا لِلظّٰلِمِيْنَ مِنْ اَنْصَارٍ. رَبَّنَآ اِنَّنَا سَمِعْنَا مُنَادِيًا يُّنَادِيْ لِلْاِيْمَانِ اَنْ اٰمِنُوْا بِرَبِّكُمْ فَاٰمَنَّا ۚ  رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوْبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّاٰتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْاَبْرَارِ. رَبَّنَا وَاٰتِنَا مَا وَعَدْتَّنَا عَلٰي رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخْزِنَا يَوْمَ الْقِيٰمَةِ  ۭاِنَّكَ لَا تُخْلِفُ الْمِيْعَادَ.
duas.transliteration: Rabbana ma khalaqta hadha batila Subhanaka faqina 'adhaban-Naar. Rabbana innaka man tudkhilin nara faqad akhzaytah wa ma liDh-dhalimeena min ansar. Rabbanaa Innanaa Sami’-Naa Munaadiyay Yunaadee Lil – Eemaani An Aaminoo Birabbikum Fa- Aamannaa Rabbanaa Faghfir Lanaa D’unoobanaa Wa Kaffir A’nnaaa Sayyi- Aatinaa Wa Tawaffanaa Ma-A’l Abraaar. Rabbanaa Wa Aatinaa Maa Wa-A’ttanaa A’laa Rusulika Wa Laa Tukhzinaa Yawal Qiyaamah Innak Laa Tukhliful Mee’a’ad.
duas.ar_description: تعلم هذا الدُعاء لتنال رحمة الله
duas.fr_description: Apprenez cette dua pour chercher la miséricorde d'Allah
duas.id_description: Pelajari doa ini untuk mendapatkan ampunan Alloh
duas.en_description: Learn this Dua to seek Allah's mercy
duas.ms_description: Pelajari doa ini untuk mendapatkan kasih sayang Allah.
duas.es_description: Aprende esta dua para pedir la misericordia de Alá

duas.ar_translation: O our Lord! Cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me, my parents, and (all) Believers, on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!
duas.fr_translation: O our Lord! Cover (us) with Thy Forgiveness - me, my parents, and (all) Believers, on the Day that the Reckoning will be established!

duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الْحِسَابُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaghfir Lee Wa Liwaalidayya Wa Lil-Mu’mineena Yawma Yaqoomul H’isaab
duas.ar_description: أدعوا أن يغفر الله لأحبائك وللأمة الإسلامية كلها عبر الضغط هنا
duas.fr_description: Priez pour le pardon de vos proches et de toute la Oummah musulmane en cliquant ici.
duas.id_description: Berdoa memohon ampunan bagi orang-orang tersayangmu dan untuk seluruh umat muslim dengan mengklik disini
duas.en_description: Pray for the forgiveness of your loved ones and the entire Muslim Ummah by clicking here
duas.ms_description: Berdoa untuk keampunan insan-insan yang tersayang dan seluruh umat Islam dengan mengklik di sini.
duas.es_description: Reza para el perdón de tus seres queridos y toda la Umma Musulmana a través de pulsar aquí.

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Avert from us the Wrath of Hell, for its Wrath is indeed an affliction grievous,- Evil indeed is it as an abode, and as a place to rest in.

duas.arabic:
رَبَّنَا اصْرِفْ عَنَّا عَذَابَ جَهَنَّمَ ۖ إِنَّ عَذَابَهَا كَانَ غَرَامًا
إِنَّهَا سَاءَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
duas.transliteration:
Rabbanas-rif 'anna 'adhaba jahannama inna 'adhabaha kana gharama 
innaha sa'at musta-qarranw wa muqama
duas.ar_description: أضمن مكان في الجنة عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Sécurisez votre place à Jannah en récitant cette dua
duas.id_description: Amankan tempatmu di Surga dengan membaca doa ini
duas.en_description: Secure a place in Jannah by reciting this Dua
duas.ms_description: Dapatkan tempat di syurga dengan membaca doa ini
duas.es_description: Para lograr un lugar en el paraíso (yanna) recita esta dua.

duas.ar_translation:
Our Lord! And make them enter the 'Adn (Eden) Paradise (everlasting Gardens) which you have promised them, and to the righteous among their fathers, their wives, and their offspring! Verily, You are the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
And save them from (the punishment, because of what they did of) the sins, and whomsoever You save from (the punishment, because of what they did of) the sins (i.e. excuse them) that Day, him verily, You have taken into mercy.' And that is the supreme success.'

Our Lord! And make them enter the 'Adn (Eden) Paradise (everlasting Gardens) which you have promised them, and to the righteous among their fathers, their wives, and their offspring! Verily, You are the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.

duas.arabic:
رَبَّنَا وَأَدْخِلْهُمْ جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ الَّتِي وَعَدتَّهُمْ وَمَن صَلَحَ مِنْ آبَائِهِمْ وَأَزْوَاجِهِمْ وَذُرِّيَّاتِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
وَقِهِمُ السَّيِّئَاتِ ۚ وَمَن تَقِ السَّيِّئَاتِ يَوْمَئِذٍ فَقَدْ رَحِمْتَهُ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana wa adhkhilhum Jannati 'adninil-lati wa'attahum wa man salaha min aba'ihim wa azwajihim wa dhuriyyatihim innaka antal 'Azizul-Hakim, waqihimus sayyi'at wa man taqis-sayyi'ati yawma'idhin faqad rahimatahu wa dhalika huwal fawzul-'Adheem

duas.ar_translation: O my Lord! I seek refuge with You from asking You that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have Mercy on me, I would indeed be one of the losers.
duas.fr_translation: O my Lord! I seek refuge with You from asking You that of which I have no knowledge. And unless You forgive me and have Mercy on me, I would indeed be one of the losers.

duas.arabic: رَبِّ اِنِّىْٓ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ اَنْ اَسْـــَٔـلَكَ مَا لَيْسَ لِيْ بِهٖ عِلْمٌ ۭ وَاِلَّا تَغْفِرْ لِيْ وَتَرْحَمْنِيْٓ اَكُنْ مِّنَ الْخٰسِرِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi Inneee A-o’od’u Bika An As-alaka Maa Laysa Lee Bihee I’lm Wa Illaa Taghfirlee Wa Tarh’amneee Akum Minal Khaasireen
duas.ar_description: طلب المغفرة لذنوبك من الله سبحانه وتعالى

duas.en_description: Seek forgiveness for your sins from Allah SWT
duas.ms_description: Seek forgiveness for your sins from Allah SWT
duas.es_description: Busca el perdón de Dios (Alabado sea) por tus pecados

duas.ar_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.

duas.en_translation: Lord, forgive me. My Lord, forgive me.

duas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.transliteration: Rabbighfir lee, Rabbighfir lee

duas.ar_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.id_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.

duas.es_translation: O Allah forgive me, have mercy on me, guide me, support me, protect me, provide for me and elevate me.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي، وَارْحَمْنِي، وَاهْدِنِي، وَاجْبُرْنِي، وَعَافِنِي، وَارْزُقْنِي، وَارْفَعْنِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee, warhamnee, wahdinee, wajburnee, wa 'aafinee, warzuqnee, warfa'nee

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.

duas.es_translation: O Allah, forgive me all my sins, great and small, the first and the last, those that are apparent and those that are hidden.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي كُلَّهُ، دِقَّهُ وَجِلَّهُ، وَأَوَّلَهُ وَآخِرَهُ وَعَلَانِيَتَهُ وَسِرَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee thanbee kullahu, diqqahu wa jillahu, wa 'awwalahu wa 'aakhirahu wa 'alaaniyata hu wa sirrahu

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek protection in Your pleasure from Your anger, and I seek protection in Your forgiveness from Your punishment. I seek protection in You from You. I cannot count Your praises. You are as You have praised Yourself.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِرِضَاكَ مِنْ سَخَطِكَ، وَبِمُعَافَاتِكَ مَنْ عُقُوبَتِكَ، وَاَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْكَ، لَا أُحصِي ثَنَاءً عَلَيْكَ أَنْتَ كَمَا أَثْنَيْتَ عَلَى نَفْسِكَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu biridhaaka min sakhatika, wa bimu'aafaatika min 'uqoobatika wa 'a'oothu bika minka, laa 'uhsee thanaa'an 'alayka 'Anta kamaa 'athnayta 'alaa nafsika

duas.ar_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to him.
duas.fr_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to him.
duas.id_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to him.
duas.en_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to him.

duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullaah, Astaghfirullaah, Astaghfirullaaha wa 'atoobu 'ilayhi

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.

duas.es_translation: O Allah, I have greatly wronged myself and no one forgives sins but You. So, grant me forgiveness and have mercy on me. Surely, you are Forgiving, Merciful.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي ظُلْماً كَثِيراً، وَلَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، فَاغْفِرْ لِي مَغْفِرَةً مِنْ عِنْدِكَ وَارْحَمْنِي إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee dhalamtu nafsee dhulman katheeran, wa laa yaghfiruth-thunooba 'illaa 'Anta, faghfir lee maghfiratan min 'indika warhamnee 'innaka 'Antal-Ghafoorur-Raheem

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, You are my Lord, none has the right to be worshipped except You, You created me and I am Your servant and I abide to Your covenant and promise as best I can, I take refuge in You from the evil of which I have committed. I acknowledge Your favour upon me and I acknowledge my sin, so forgive me, for verily none can forgive sin except You.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَّا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، خَلَقْتَنِي وَأَنَا عَبْدُكَ، وَأَنَا عَلَى عَهْدِكَ وَوَعْدِكَ مَا اسْتَطَعْتُ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا صَنَعْتُ، أَبُوءُ لَكَ بِنِعْمَتِكَ عَلَيَّ، وَأَبُوءُ بِذَنْبِي فَاغْفِر لِي فَإِنَّهُ لَا يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ.
duas.transliteration: Allahumma anta rabbee la ilaha illa ant, khalaqtanee wa-ana AAabduk, wa-ana AAala AAahdika wawaAAdika mas-tataAAt, aAAoothu bika min sharri ma sanaAAt, aboo-o laka biniAAmatika AAalay, wa-aboo-o bithanbee, faghfir lee fa-innahu la yaghfiruth-thunooba illa ant.
duas.ar_benefits: من قال هذا ليلاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في تلك الليلة وجب عليه دخول الجنة، ومن قال هذا صباحاً وهو مؤمن به ويموت في ذلك اليوم وجب عليه دخول الجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui la récite avec conviction le soir et meurt durant cette nuit-là entrera dans le Paradis, et celui qui la récite avec conviction le matin et meurt durant ce jour-là entrera dans le Paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada malam hari dan meninggal pada malam harinya akan masuk surga, dan siapapun yang membacanya dengan penuh keyakinan pada pagi hari dan meninggal pada siang harinya akan masuk surga.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this with conviction in the evening and dies during that night shall enter Paradise, and whoever recites it with conviction in the morning and dies during that day shall enter Paradise.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini dengan keyakinan pada waktu petang dan meninggal dunia pada waktu malam, akan memasuki syurga, dan barangsiapa yang membacanya dengan keyakinan pada waktu pagi dan meninggal dunia pada siang harinya akan dapat memasuki syurga.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite ésta con convicción por la tarde y muere durante esta noche entrará al Paraíso y quien la recita con convicción por la mañana y muere durante este día entrará al Paraíso.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I ask You by Your mercy, which encompasses all things, that You forgive me.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ  إِنَّـي أَسْـأَلُـكَ بِرَحْمَـتِكَ الّتي وَسِـعَت كُلَّ شيء، أَنْ تَغْـفِرَ لِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka birahmatikal-latee wasi'at kulla shay'in 'an taghfira lee

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.id_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.en_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, forgive me and accept my repentance, You are the Ever-Relenting, the All-Forgiving.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِـرْ لي، وَتُبْ عَلَـيَّ، إِنَّكَ أَنْـتَ التَّـوّابُ الغَـفُورُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbighfir lee wa tub 'alayya 'innaka 'Antat-Tawwaabul-Ghafoor

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! We believe, so forgive us, and have mercy on us, for You are the Best of all who show mercy!
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَآ اٰمَنَّا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا وَارْحَمْنَا وَاَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa Aamannaa Faghfir Lanaa Warh’amnaa Wa Anta Khayrur Raah’imeen
duas.ar_benefits: قال الله – سُبحانه وتعالى – أن المؤمنون سيقولون هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Allah (SWT) a dit que les croyants demanderont cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Alloh SWT berkata bahwa orang-orang yang beriman akan memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Allah SWT said the believers will ask this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Allah SWT berfirman bahawa orang-orang beriman akan memohon doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: Dios (Exaltado sea) dijo que los creyentes pedirán esta dua.
duas.ar_description: هل تريد طلب المغفرة من الله؟ أضغط هنا
duas.fr_description: Voulez-vous demander pardon à Allah? Cliquez ici.
duas.id_description: Ingin memohon ampunan dari Alloh? Klik di sini.
duas.en_description: Want to ask for forgiveness from Allah? Click here.
duas.ms_description: Ingin memohon keampunan dari Allah? Klik di sini.
duas.es_description: ¿Quieres pedir el perdón de Dios? Pulsa aquí

duas.ar_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.fr_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.id_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.en_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.ms_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.es_translation: My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the Best of those who show mercy!
duas.arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ وَارْحَمْ وَاَنْتَ خَيْرُ الرّٰحِمِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbighfir Warh’am Wa Anta Khayrur Raah’imeen
duas.ar_benefits: اقرأ هذا الدُعاء الآن! تعلم النبي – صلى الله عليه وسلم – هذا الدُعاء من الله – سبحانه وتعالى-.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua maintenant! Allah (SWT) a enseigné cette dua au Prophète (SAW).
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sekarang! Alloh SWT mengajarkan doa ini kepada Rasululloh SAW.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua now! Allah SWT taught this dua to the Prophet SAW.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sekarang! Allah SWT mengajar doa ini kepada Nabi SAW.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Leer esta dua ahora! Alá (Exaltado sea) enseñó esta dua al Profeta (SAW).
duas.ar_description: اقرأ هذا الدُعاء لتنال المغفرة من الله (سبحانه وتعالى)
duas.fr_description: Récite cette dua pour demander pardon à Allah (SWT)
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk mendapatkan ampunan dari Alloh SWT
duas.en_description: Recite this dua to seek forgiveness from Allah (SWT)
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk memohon keampunan dari Allah (SWT)
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para pedir el perdón de Dios (Alabado sea)

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! We have wronged our own souls: If thou forgive us not and bestow not upon us Thy Mercy, we shall certainly be lost.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا ظَلَمْنَا أَنفُسَنَا وَإِن لَّمْ تَغْفِرْ لَنَا وَتَرْحَمْنَا لَنَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana zalamna anfusina wa il lam taghfir lana wa tarhamna lana kunan minal-khasireen
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتُكفر عن ذنوبك! طلب النبي آدم وزوجته حواء (عليهما السلام) المغفرة من الله عندما قالوا هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua pour expier vos péchés! Le prophète Adam (AS) et Hawwa (AS) demandèrent pardon à Allah en récitant cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk menghapuskan dosa-dosamu! Nabi Adam (AS) dan Hawa (AS) memohon ampunan Alloh dengan memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua to atone your sins! Prophet Adam (AS) and Hawwa (AS) asked forgiveness from Allah by reciting this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini menebus dosa anda! Nabi Adam (AS) dan Hawa (AS) memohon keampunan daripada Allah dengan membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Lee esta súplica para expiar tus pecados! El Profeta Adán (AS) y Eva (AS) pidieron el perdón de Alá a través de recitar esta dua.
duas.ar_description: اطلب المغفرة مِن الله وقُل هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Cherchez le pardon d'Allah en récitant cette dua
duas.id_description: Temukan ampunan Allah dengan membaca doa ini
duas.en_description: Seek forgiveness from Allah by reciting this dua
duas.ms_description: Mohon keampunan dari Allah dengan membaca doa ini
duas.es_description: Pedir el perdón de Alá a través de recitar esta súplica

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us Mercy from Thyself, and dispose of our affair for us in the right way!
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا مِن لَّدُنكَ رَحْمَةً وَهَيِّئْ لَنَا مِنْ أَمْرِنَا رَشَدًا
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Aatina Mil Ladunka Rah’mataw Wa Hayyi Lanaa Min Amrinaa Rashadaa
duas.ar_benefits: قال أصحاب الكهف هذا الدعاء لله.
duas.fr_benefits: Les compagnons de la grotte ont demandé cette dua à Allah.
duas.id_benefits: Para sahabat (yang dulu berada di gua) memanjatkan doa ini kepada Alloh
duas.en_benefits: The cave companions asked this dua to Allah.
duas.ms_benefits: Sahabat di dalam gua berdoa ini kepada Allah.
duas.es_benefits: Los compañeros de la Cueva rogaron esta dua a Alá
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء بإنتظام لتحصُل على رحمة الله
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua régulièrement pour la miséricorde d'Allah
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini secara rutin agar mendapat rahmat Allah
duas.en_description: Recite this dua regularly for Allah's mercy
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini dengan tetap agar dikasihani Allah
duas.es_description: Recita esta dua regularmente para la misericordia de Dios.

duas.ar_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.fr_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.id_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.en_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.ms_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.es_translation: O my Lord! Forgive me and my brother, and make us enter into Your Mercy, for you are the Most Merciful of those who show mercy.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِأَخِي وَأَدْخِلْنَا فِي رَحْمَتِكَ ۖ وَأَنْتَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee wali akhee wa adkhilna fee rahmatika wa anta arhamur rahimeen
duas.ar_benefits: قال النبي إبراهيم (عليه السلام) هذا الدُعاء لله.
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua a été demandée par le prophète Ibrahim (AS).
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini pernah dipanjatkan oleh Nabi Ibrahim (AS).
duas.en_benefits: This dua was asked by Prophet Ibrahim (AS).
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini diminta oleh Nabi Ibrahim (AS).
duas.es_benefits: Esta dua fue pedida por el Profeta Ibrahim (AS)
duas.ar_description: أطلب المغفرة لأخوتك عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Cherchez le pardon pour vos frères et sœurs bien-aimés en récitant cette dua
duas.id_description: Mohonlah ampunan bagi saucaramu tersayang dengan membaca doa ini
duas.en_description: Seek forgiveness for your beloved siblings by reciting this Dua
duas.ms_description: Mohon keampunan untuk adik-beradik kamu yang disayangi dengan membaca doa ini
duas.es_description: Pide el perdón para tus queridos hermanos a través de recitar esta dua

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.id_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.en_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction.
duas.arabic: رَّبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَلِوَالِدَيَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَيْتِيَ مُؤْمِنًا وَلِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ وَلَا تَزِدِ الظَّالِمِينَ إِلَّا تَبَارًا
duas.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee waliwalidayyawaliman dakhala baytiya mu'minan walil mu'mineena wal mu'minati wala tazidi aththalimeena illatabaran

duas.ar_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.fr_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.id_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.en_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.ms_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.es_translation: I seek the forgiveness of Allah the Mighty, Whom there is none worthy of worship except Him, the Living, the Eternal, and I repent to Him, Allah will forgive him even if he has deserted the army's ranks.
duas.arabic: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللهَ الَّذِي لاَ  إِلَهَ إلاَّ هُوَ الحَيُّ القَيّوُمُ وأَتُوبُ إِلَيهِ
duas.transliteration: Astaghfirullaah alladhee laa ilaaha illaa huwal hayyul qayyoomu wa atoobu ilayhi
duas.ar_benefits: أطلب المغفرة بهذا الدُعاء! قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): سيسامح الله من قال هذا الدُعاء حتى وإن هرب أثناء تقدم الجيش.
duas.fr_benefits: Cherchez le pardon avec cette dua! Le Prophète (SAW) a dit que quiconque récite cette dua sera pardonné par Allah même s'il a fui pendant l'avance d'une armée.
duas.id_benefits: Mohonlah ampunan dengan doa ini! Rasululloh (SAW) berkata bahwa siapapun yang membaca doa ini akan diampuni oleh Alloh bahkan jika dia melarikan diri dari medan perang.
duas.en_benefits: Seek forgiveness with this dua! The Prophet (SAW) said whoever recites this dua will be forgiven by Allah even if he fled during the advance of an army.
duas.ms_benefits: Mohon keampunan dengan doa ini! Nabi (SAW) bersabda barangsiapa membaca doa ini akan diampunkan oleh Allah walaupun dia lari ketika kemaraan tentera.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Pedir el perdón con esta dua! El Profeta (SAW) dijo que quien recite esta dua será perdonado por Alá aún si escapara durante el avance de un ejército.

duas.ar_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.fr_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.id_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.en_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.ms_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.es_translation: (And say O Muhammad SAW to these polytheists:) Such is Allah, my Lord in Whom I put my trust, and to Him I turn in all of my affairs and in repentance.
duas.arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبِّي عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
duas.transliteration: Dhalikumu Allahu rabbee alayhi tawakkaltu wa-ilayhi uneeb

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Accept (this service) from us: For Thou art the All-Hearing, the All-knowing.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا تَقَبَّلْ مِنَّا إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ السَّمِيعُ العَلِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana taqabbal minna innaka antas Sameeaul Aleem

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Make of us Muslims, bowing to Thy (Will), and of our progeny a people Muslim, bowing to Thy (will); and show us our place for the celebration of (due) rites; and turn unto us (in Mercy); for Thou art the Oft-Returning, Most Merciful.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا وَاجْعَلْنَا مُسْلِمَيْنِ لَكَ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِنَا أُمَّةً مُّسْلِمَةً لَّكَ وَأَرِنَا مَنَاسِكَنَا وَتُبْ عَلَيْنَآ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ التَّوَّابُ الرَّحِيمُ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana wa-j'alna Muslimayni laka wa min Dhurriyatina 'Ummatan Muslimatan laka wa 'Arina Manasikana wa tub 'alayna 'innaka 'antat-Tawwabu-Raheem

duas.ar_translation:
So glorify Allah [above all that (evil) they associate with Him (O believers)], when you come up to the evening [i.e. offer the (Maghrib) sunset and ('Isha') night prayers], and when you enter the morning [i.e offer the (Fajr) morning prayer].
And His is all the praises and thanks in the heavens and the earth, and (glorify Him) in the afternoon (i.e. offer 'Asr prayer) and when you come up to the time, when the day begins to decline (i.e offer Zuhr prayer). (Ibn 'Abbas said: 'These are the five compulsory congregational prayers mentioned in the Quran).' 
He brings out the living from the dead, and brings out the dead from the living. And He revives the earth after its death. And thus shall you be brought out (resurrected).
