duas.arabic:
فَسُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ حِينَ تُمْسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصْبِحُونَ
وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَعَشِيًّا وَحِينَ تُظْهِرُونَ
يُخْرِجُ الْحَيَّ مِنَ الْمَيِّتِ وَيُخْرِجُ الْمَيِّتَ مِنَ الْحَيِّ وَيُحْيِي الْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ مَوْتِهَا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ تُخْرَجُونَ
duas.transliteration:
Fasubhana Allahi heenatumsoona waheena tusbihoon.
Walahu alhamdu fee assamawatiwal-ardi waAAashiyyan waheena tuthhiroon.
Yukhriju alhayya mina almayyitiwayukhriju almayyita mina alhayyi wayuhyee al-ardabaAAda mawtiha wakathalika tukhrajoon.

duas.ar_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.fr_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.id_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.en_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.ms_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.es_translation: Glorified is Allah and praised is He. Glorified is Allah the most great.
duas.arabic: سُبْـحَانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ سُبْـحَانَ اللهِ العَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanal-laahi wa bihamdihi, Subhaanal-laahil-'Adheem.
duas.ar_description: عظم الإله الواحد خالق هذا الكون
duas.fr_description: Glorifiez celui qui est le créateur de l'univers
duas.id_description: عظم الإله الواحد خالق هذا الكون
duas.en_description: Glorify the one who is the creator of the universe
duas.ms_description: Agungkan yang mencipta alam ini.
duas.es_description: Glorificar al uno que es el creador del Universo

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to Allah, and praise is to Allah, and there is none worthy of worship but Allah, and Allah is the Most Great.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ، والحَمْدُ للهِ،  وَ لاَ إِلَهَ إلاَّ اللهُ واللهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanallaahi, walhamdu lillaahi, wa laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu, wallaahu 'Akbar.
duas.ar_benefits: هذا الدُعاء قريب جداً من النبي مُحمد (صلى الله عليه وسلم).  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): قول هذا الدُعاء أحب إلي من كل ما طلعت عليه الشمس (بمعنى: العالم كُله).
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua est très proche du Prophète Muhammad (SAW). Le Prophète (SAW) dit:Disant que cette dua m'est plus chère que tout ce sur quoi le soleil s'est levé, c'est-à-dire le monde entier.
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini sangat dekat dengan Nabi Muhammad (SAW). Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Membaca doa ini lebih disukai olehku daripada segala yang disinari oleh matahari (seluruh dunia).
duas.en_benefits: This dua is very close to Prophet Muhammad (SAW). The Prophet (SAW) said: 'Saying this dua is more beloved to me than everything the sun has risen over (i.e the whole world).'
duas.ms_benefits: Nabi (SAW) bersabda: 'Membaca doa ini adalah lebih dicintai olehku berbanding semua yang diterangi cahaya matahari (cth. seluruh dunia).'
duas.es_benefits: Esta dua es más apreciada por el Profeta Muhammad (SAW) El Profeta (SAW) dijo: 'Decir esta súplica es más amado a mí que cualquier cosa por sobre la que haya salido el sol (O sea todo el mundo)'

duas.ar_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.fr_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.id_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.en_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.ms_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.es_translation: How perfect Allah is
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanallah
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء 1000 مرة ليُمحى عنك 1000 خطيئة! قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): هل يستطيع أحداً منكم أن يُمنح ألف حسنة في اليوم؟ سأل أحد الأشخاص من الجمع، كيف يُمكن لأحد منا أن يحصل على ألف حسنة؟، قال: عظّم الله مائة مرة وستُكتب لك ألف حسنة، أو سيمحى عنك ألف خطيئة.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cela 100 fois pour effacer 1000 péchés! Le Prophète (SAW) dit:Est-ce que quelqu'un d'entre vous est incapable de gagner mille Hasanah en un jour? Quelqu'un de son assemblée a demandé: Comment pouvons-nous gagner mille Hasanah: Gloire à Allah cent fois et mille Hasanah seront écrits pour vous, ou mille péchés seront effacés.
duas.id_benefits: Baca sebanyak 100 kali untuk menghapuskan 1000 dosa! Rasululloh (SAW) berkata:  Apakah salah satu darimu mampu mendapatkan seribu hasanah (pahala) dalam satu hari? Seseorang dari kumpulan tersebut bertanya, Bagaimana mungkin salah satu dari kami mendapatkan seribu hasanah Beliau berkata, Muliakanlah Alloh seratus kali dan seribu hasanah akan dicatat untukmu, atau seribu dosa akan dihapuskan.
duas.en_benefits:
Recite this 100 times to wipe away 1000 sins! The Prophet (SAW) said: 'Is anyone of you incapable of earning one thousand Hasanah (rewards) in a day?'
 Someone from his gathering asked, 'How can anyone of us earn a thousand Hasanah':'' He said, 'Glorify Allah a hundred times and a thousand Hasanah will be written for you, or a thousand sins will be wiped away.'
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak 100 kali untuk menghapuskan 1000 dosa!Nabi (SAW) bersabda: 'Adakah sesiapa di antaramu yang tidak mampu mendapatkan seribu Hasanah (pahala) sehari?' Seseorang dalam kumpulan Baginda bertanya, 'Bagaimana sesiapa di antara kita boleh memperolehi seribu Hasanah':'' Baginda berkata, 'Mengagungkan Allah seratus kali dan seribu Hasanah akan tertulis untukmu, atau seribu dosa akan terhapus.'
duas.es_benefits: ¡Recita ésta 100 veces para eliminar 1000 pecados! El Profeta (SAW) dijo: '¿Es cualquier persona de vosotros incapaz de ganar un mil hasanat (recompensas) en un día?'  una persona de su reunión preguntó, ' ¿Cómo puede uno de nosotros ganar mil hasanat ?' Él dijo, 'Glorifica a Alá cien veces y te serán registradas mil hasanat, o serán perdonados mil pecados.'

duas.ar_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.fr_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.id_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.en_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.ms_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.es_translation: There is no might and no power except by Allah.
duas.arabic: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
duas.transliteration: Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah
duas.ar_benefits: يُعتبر هذا الدُعاء واحداً من كنوز الجنة!  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): يا عبد الله بن قيس، أولا أدلك على واحد من كنوز الجنة؟ قُلت، بلى، يا رسول الله. لهذا السبب قال هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua est considérée comme un des trésors de Jannah!
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini dianggap salah satu harta karun surga! Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Oh Abdullah bin Qais, haruskah aku memberitahumu salah satu harta karun surga? Aku berkata, Ya, oh wahai pembawa pesan Allloh, lalu beliau membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: This dua is considered one of the treasures of Jannah! The Prophet (SAW) said: 'O Abdullah bin Qais, should I not inform you to one of the treasures of Paradise?' I said, 'Yes, O Messenger of Allah.' So, he recited this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini dianggap harta karun Jannah!Nabi (SAW) bersabda: 'Wahai Abdullah bin Qais, perlukah aku tidak memberitahumu mengenai satu harta di syurga?' Aku berkata, 'Ya, wahai Pesuruh Allah.' Jadi, dia membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Esta súplica se considera uno de los tesoros del Paraíso (Yanna)! El Profeta (SAW) dijo: ¡Oh! Abdullah bin Qais, ¿Acaso no deseas que te guíe hacia un tesoro de los tesoros del Paraíso? Yo le dije: '¡Claro que sí, oh Mensajero de Alá!' Él recitó esta dua.

duas.ar_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.fr_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.id_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.en_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.ms_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.es_translation: Glorified is Allah the Most Great and praised is He.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ العَظِيمِ وبِحَمْدِهِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanallaahil-'Adheemi wa bihamdihi.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء وأزرع لنفسك الآن شجرة في الجنة!  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): من قال هذا الدُعاء ستُغرس له نخلة في الجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua et sèmez un arbre à Jannah maintenant! Le Prophète (SAW) dit: Celui qui récite cette dua aura un palmier planté pour lui au Paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini dan tanamlah pohon untuk dirimu di surga, sekarang! Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Siapapun yang membaca doa ini akan mendapatkan pohon palem yang tertanam untuknya di surga.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua and sow a tree for yourself in Jannah now! The Prophet (SAW) said: 'Whoever recites this dua will have a palm tree planted for him in the Paradise.'
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini dan semai sebatang pokok untukmu di Jannah sekarang!The Prophet (SAW) said: 'Whoever recites this dua will have a palm tree planted for him in the Paradise.'
duas.es_benefits: ¡Recita esta dua y siembra un árbol para ti mismo en el Paraíso ahora! El Profeta (SAW) dijo: 'Quien recite esta dua será plantado una palmera para él en el Paraíso.'

duas.ar_translation:
He is Allah , other than whom there is no deity, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed. He is the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful.
He is Allah , other than whom there is no deity, the Sovereign, the Pure, the Perfection, the Bestower of Faith, the Overseer, the Exalted in Might, the Compeller, the Superior. Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him.
He is Allah , the Creator, the Inventor, the Fashioner; to Him belong the best names. Whatever is in the heavens and earth is exalting Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.

duas.arabic:
هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ عَالِمُ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ ۖ هُوَ الرَّحْمَٰنُ الرَّحِيمُ
هُوَ اللَّهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْمَلِكُ الْقُدُّوسُ السَّلَامُ الْمُؤْمِنُ الْمُهَيْمِنُ الْعَزِيزُ الْجَبَّارُ الْمُتَكَبِّرُ ۚ سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
هُوَ اللَّهُ الْخَالِقُ الْبَارِئُ الْمُصَوِّرُ ۖ لَهُ الْأَسْمَاءُ الْحُسْنَىٰ ۚ يُسَبِّحُ لَهُ مَا فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
duas.transliteration:
Huwa Allahu allathee lailaha illa huwa AAalimu alghaybi washshahadatihuwa arrahmanu arraheem.
Huwa Allahu allathee lailaha illa huwa almaliku alquddoosu assalamualmu/minu almuhayminu alAAazeezu aljabbaru almutakabbirusubhana Allahi AAamma yushrikoon.
Huwa Allahu alkhaliqu albari-oalmusawwiru lahu al-asmao alhusnayusabbihu lahu ma fee assamawatiwal-ardi wahuwa alAAazeezu alhakeem.

duas.ar_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.fr_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.id_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.en_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.ms_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.es_translation: What Allah willed [has occurred], there is no power except in Allah.
duas.arabic: مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ لَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Ma shaa Allahu la quwwata illabillahi

duas.ar_translation: There is none worth of worship but Allah alone, Who has no partner, His is the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is able to do all things. Glory is to Allah. Praise is to Allah. There is none worth of worship but Allah. Allah is the Most Great. There is no might and no power except by Allah's leave, the Exalted, the Mighty. My Lord, forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: There is none worth of worship but Allah alone, Who has no partner, His is the dominion and to Him belongs all praise, and He is able to do all things. Glory is to Allah. Praise is to Allah. There is none worth of worship but Allah. Allah is the Most Great. There is no might and no power except by Allah's leave, the Exalted, the Mighty. My Lord, forgive me.

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدَ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ. سُبْحَانَ اللهِ، وَالْحَمْدُ للهِ، ولَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ، وَلَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ العَلِيِّ الْعَظيِمِ، ربِّ اغْفِرلِي
duas.transliteration: Laa 'illaha 'illallahu wahdahu la shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer Subhaanallahi, walhamdu lillaahi, wa laa 'ilaha 'illallahu, wallaahu 'akbar, wa laa hawla wa laa Quwwata 'illaa billaahil-'Aliyyil-'Adheem, Rabbighfir lee
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتنال المغفرة الآن! قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم)، سيعفو الله عن الذي يستيقظ ليلاً ويقول هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua pour obtenir le pardon maintenant! Le Prophète (SAW) dit: Celui qui se réveillera la nuit et récitera cette dua sera pardonné.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk mendapatkan ampunan, sekarang! Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Siapapun yang terbangun di malam hari dan membaca doa ini akan diampuni.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua for forgiveness now! The Prophet (SAW) said, 'whoever awakes at night and recites this dua will be forgiven.'
duas.ms_benefits: RBaca doa ini untuk keampunan sekarang!Nabi (SAW) berkata, 'Barangsiapa terjaga pada malam hari dan membaca doa ini akan diampunkan.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Recita esta súplica para pedir el perdón ahora! El Profeta (SAW) dijo: 'Quien se despierte por la noche y recita esta dua le será perdonado'
duas.ar_description: قل هذا الدُعاء لتُبين لله (سبحانه وتعالى) أنك شاكراً لنعمه
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette Dua pour montrer à Allah SWT que vous Lui êtes reconnaissant pour Ses bénédictions.
duas.id_description: Baca doa ini untuk menunjukan kepada Alloh SWT bahwa kamu bersyukur atas segala rahmat-Nya
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to show Allah SWT that you are grateful to Him for His blessings
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk menunjukkan kepada Allah SWT yang kamu bersyukur kepadaNya untuk rahmatnya
duas.es_description: Recita esta Dua para demostrar a Alá (Exaltado sea) que le estás agradecido por Sus bendiciones

duas.ar_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.fr_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.id_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.en_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.ms_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.es_translation: Glory to my Lord the Exalted.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaana Rabbiyal-'Adheem

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You , O Allah , our Lord , and praise is Yours . O Allah , forgive me.

duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّنَا وَبِحَمْدِكَ اللَّهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي
duas.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma Rabbanaa wa bihamdika Allaahum-maghfir lee

duas.ar_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.fr_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.id_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.en_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.

duas.es_translation: Glory (to You) , Most Holy (are You) , Lord of the angels and the Spirit.
duas.arabic: سُبُّوحٌ، قُدُوسٌ، رَبُّ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ
duas.transliteration: Subboohun, Quddoosun, Rabbul-malaa'ikati warrooh

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to You, Master of power, of dominion, of majesty and greatness.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ ذِي الْجَبَرُوتِ، وَالْمَلَكُوتِ، وَالْكِبْرِيَاءِ، وَالْعَظَمَةِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaana thil-jabarooti, walmalakooti, walkibriyaa'i, wal'adhamati

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to my Lord, the Most High.
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّيَ الأَعْلَى
duas.transliteration: Subhaana Rabbiyal-A 'laa

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Able to do all things.
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Able to do all things.
duas.id_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. His is the dominion and His is the praise. He brings life and He causes death, and He is Able to do all things.

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحَدْهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu yuhyee wa yumeetu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay'in Qadeer
duas.ar_benefits: من يقول هذا مائة مرة في اليوم سيُجزي بأجر تحرير عشرة من العبيد. سيُكتب له مائة حسنة ويُمحى عنه مائة سيئة. وسيكون في عصمة من الشيطان حتى المساء. لن يستطيع أحداً تقديم أفضل من ذلك فيما عدا الشخص الذي قالها أكثر من ذلك.
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui récite cela cent fois par jour aura la récompense de libérer dix esclaves. Cent Hasanaat (récompenses) seront écrites pour lui et cent méfaits seront effacés. Il sera protégé de Satan jusqu'au soir. Personne ne pourra rien présenter de mieux que cela, sauf quelqu'un qui a récité plus que cela.
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya sebanyak seratus kali dalam sehari akan mendapatkan hasanah (pahala) sebesar membebaskan sepuluh budak. Seratus pahala akan dicatat untuknya dan seratus perbuatan buruk akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi dari setan hingga malam hari. Tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat mempersembahkan apapun lebih baik dari ini kecuali seseorang yang membacanya lebih dari ini.
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this one hundred times a day will have the reward of freeing ten slaves. One hundred Hasanaat (rewards) will be written for him and one hundred misdeeds will be washed away. He will be shielded from Satan until the evening. No one will be able to present anything better than this except for someone who has recited more than this.
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa ini sebanyak seratus kali sehari akan mendapat ganjaran membebaskan sepuluh hamba. Satu ratus Hasanaat (pahala) akan tertulis untuknya dan satu ratus keburukan akan dihapuskan. Dia akan dilindungi daripada Syaitan sehingga petang hari. Tiada siapa akan mampu menghadiahkan yang lebih baik daripada ini kecuali seseorang yang membaca lebih darilada ini.
duas.es_benefits: Quien recite esta cien veces en un día, tendrá una recompensa equivalente a la de liberar diez esclavos, se le registrarán cien bendiciones (hasanat, buenas obras), y se le borrarán cien malas obras (sai’át), estará protegido de Satanás por eso hasta que la tarde llegue. Nadie puede hacer algo mejor que lo que él ha hecho, excepto quien hace más que eso.

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, He has no partner, His is the dominion and His is the praise and He is Able to do all things. There is no power and no might except by Allah . None has the right to be worshipped but Allah, and we do not worship any other besides Him . His is grace , and His is bounty and to Him belongs the most excellent praise. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah . (We are) sincere in making our religious devotion to Him, even though the disbelievers may dislike it.

duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ، وَلَا نَعْبُدُ إِلَّا إِيَّاهُ، لَه النِّعْمَةُ وَلَهُ الْفَضْلُ وَلَهُ الثَّنَاءُ الْحَسَنُ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ وَلَوْ كَرِهَ الْكَافِرُونَ
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku, wa lahul-hamdu wa Huwa 'alaa kulli shay 'in Qadeer. Laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaahi, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu, wa laa na'budu 'illaa 'iyyaahu, lahun-ni'matu wa lahul-fadhlu wa lahuth-thanaa'ul-hasanu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu mukhliseena lahud-deena wa law karihal-kaafiroon

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to Allah and praise is to Him, by the multitude of His creation, by His Pleasure, by the weight of His Throne, and by the extent of His Words.

duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ، وَرِضَا نَفْسِهِ، وَزِنَةَ عَرْشِهِ وَمِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanallaahi wa bihamdihi 'Adada khalqihi, wa ridhaa nafsihi, wa zinata 'arshihi wa midaada kalimaatihi

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.id_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.en_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.es_translation: Glory is to Allah, praise is to Allah, Allah is the Most Great!
duas.arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللهِ ، والْحَمْدُ للهِ ، وَاللهُ أَكْبَرُ
duas.transliteration: Subhaanallaahi, Walhamdu lillaahi, Wallaahu 'Akbar
duas.ar_benefits: أذكر الله – سبحانه وتعالى – الآن! ابدأ بهذا الذكر السهل! قُل سُبحان الله – 33 مرة، الحمدُلله – 33 مرة، والله أكبر 34 مرة.
duas.fr_benefits: Souviens-toi d'Allah SWT maintenant! Commencez avec ce Dhikr facile! Récitez Subhanallah - 33 fois, Alhamdhulillah - 33 fois et Allahu Akbar 34 fois.
duas.id_benefits: Ingat Alloh SW, sekarang! Mulailah dengan dzikir sederhana ini! Ucapkan Subhanalloh 33 kali, Alhamdulillah 33 kali, dan Allohuakbar 34 kali.
duas.en_benefits: Remember Allah SWT now! Start off with this easy Dhikr! Recite Subhanallah - 33 times, Alhamdhulillah - 33 times and Allahu Akbar 34 times.
duas.ms_benefits: Ingat Allah SWT sekarang! Mulakan dengan zikir mudah ini! Baca Subhanallah - 33 kali, Alhamdhulillah - 33 kali and Allahu Akbar 34 kali.
duas.es_benefits: Recita Subhana-Allah y Alhamdulillah 33 veces y Allahu Akbar 34 veces

duas.ar_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink, sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.
duas.fr_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink, sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.
duas.id_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink, sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.

duas.es_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has provided us with food and with drink, sufficed us and gave us an abode for how many are there with no provision and no home.
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي أَطْعَمَنَا وَسَقَانَا، وَكَفَانَا، وَآوَانَا، فَكَمْ مِمَّنْ لَا كَافِيَ لَهُ وَلَا مُؤْويَ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'at'amanaa wa saqaanaa, wa kafaanaa, wa 'aawaanaa, fakam mimman laa kaafiya lahu wa laa mu'wiya

duas.ar_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.fr_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.id_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.en_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.ms_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.es_translation: Allah be praised with an abundant beautiful blessed praise, a never-ending praise, a praise which we will never bid farewell to and an indispensable praise, He is our Lord.
duas.arabic: الْحَمْـدُ للهِ حَمْـداً كَثـيراً طَيِّـباً مُبـارَكاً فيه، غَيْرَ مَكْفِيٍّ وَلا مُوَدَّعٍ وَلا مُسْتَغْـنىً عَنْـهُ رَبُّـنا
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi hamdan katheeran tayyiban mubarakan feeh, ghayra makfiyyin wala muwaddaAAin, wala mustaghnan AAanhu rabbuna

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims.

duas.ms_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to work righteousness of which You will approve and make righteous for me my offspring. Indeed, I have repented to You, and indeed, I am of the Muslims.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَصْلِحْ لِي فِي ذُرِّيَّتِي ۖ إِنِّي تُبْتُ إِلَيْكَ وَإِنِّي مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi awzi'nee an ashkura ni'mataka allatee anAAamta AAalayya waAAalawalidayya waan aAAmala salihan tardahuwaaslih lee fee thurriyyatee innee tubtuilayka wa-innee mina almuslimeen

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.id_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.en_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, enable me to be grateful for Your favor which You have bestowed upon me and upon my parents and to do righteousness of which You approve. And admit me by Your mercy into [the ranks of] Your righteous servants.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi awziAAnee an ashkura niAAmataka allateeanAAamta AAalayya waAAala walidayya waan aAAmala salihantardahu waadkhilnee birahmatika fee AAibadikaassaliheen
duas.ar_benefits: قال هذا الدُعاء سيدُنا سُليمان (عليه السلام).
duas.fr_benefits: Le prophète Sulaiman (AS) a demandé cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Nabi Sulaiman (AS) pernah memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Prophet Sulaiman (AS) asked this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Nabi Sulaiman (AS) meminta doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: El Profeta Salomón (AS) pidió esta dua

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to Allah. Allah is the Most Great.
duas.arabic:
سُبْحَانَ اللهِ
اللهُ أَكْبرُ
duas.transliteration:
Subhaanallaah
Allaahu 'Akbar

duas.ar_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.fr_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.id_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.en_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.ms_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.es_translation: All praise is to Allah, Just as Allah willed Blessed is Allah
duas.arabic:
الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ مَاشَاء اللَّهُ
تبارک اللهُ
duas.transliteration:
Alhamdhulillahi Masha Allah
Thabarak 'Allah
duas.ar_description: هل سمعت أخبار جيدة؟ أشكر الله بهذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Vous avez entendu une bonne nouvelle? Remerciez Allah avec cette dua
duas.id_description: Mendengar berita baik? Berterimakasih kepada Alloh dengan doa ini
duas.en_description: Heard a good news? Thank Allah with this Dua
duas.ms_description: Dengar berita baik? Berterima kasih kepada Allah dengan doa ini.
duas.es_description: ¿Has escuchado buenas noticias? Agradece a Dios con esta súplica

duas.ar_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.fr_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.id_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.en_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.ms_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.es_translation: Say (O Muhammad SAW): 'O Allah! Creator of the heavens and the earth! All-Knower of the Ghaib (unseen) and the seen. You will judge between your slaves about that wherein they used to differ.'
duas.arabic: قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ أَنتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُوا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
duas.transliteration: Quli allahumma fatira assamawatiwal-ardi AAalima alghaybi washshahadatianta tahkumu bayna AAibadika fee ma kanoofeehi yakhtalifoon
duas.ar_benefits: أتّبع سُنة النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) وقُل هذا الدُعاء عندما تستيقظ لصلاة التهجد. قام الله (سبحانه وتعالى) بتعليم ذلك الدُعاء للنبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم).
duas.fr_benefits: Suivez la Sunnah du Prophète (SAW) et récitez cette dua lorsque vous vous réveillez pour la prière de Tahajjud. Allah (SWT) enseigna cette dua au Prophète (SAW).
duas.id_benefits: Ikuti sunah Rasululloh (SAW) dan baca doa ini ketika terbangun untuk melaksanakan sholat Tahajud. Alloh (SWT) mengajarkan doa ini kepada Rasululloh (SAW).
duas.en_benefits: Follow the Sunnah of the Prophet (SAW) and recite this dua when you wake up for the Tahajjud prayer. Allah (SWT) taught this dua to the Prophet (SAW).
duas.ms_benefits: Ikuti sunnah Nabi (SAW) dan baca doa ini semasa anda bangun untuk solat tahajjud. Allah (SWT) mengajar doa ini kepada Nabi (SAW).
duas.es_benefits: Sigue la Sunna del Profeta (SAW) y recita esta dua cuando te despiertes para la oración de Tahayyud. Alá (SAW) enseñó esta dua al Profeta (SAW).

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave, and I seek refuge in You from the trial of the False Messiah, and I seek refuge in You from the trials of life and death. O Allah, I seek refuge in You from sin and from debt.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْقَبْرِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَسِيحِ الدَّجَّالِ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ فِتْنَةِ الْمَحْيَا وَالْمَمَاتِ. اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ الْمَأْثَمِ وَالْمَغْرَمِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika min 'athaabil-qabri, wa 'a'oothu bika min fitnatil-maseehid-dajjaali, wa 'a'oothu bika min fitnatil-mahyaa walmamaati. Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika minal-ma'thami walmaghrami

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, save me from Your punishment on the Day that You resurrect Your slaves.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma qinee 'athaabaka yawma tab'athu 'ibaadaka

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, Knower of the unseen and the evident , Maker of the heavens and the earth , Lord of everything and its Possessor , I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You . I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his helpers . (I seek refuge in You) from bringing evil upon my soul and from harming any Muslim.

I seek refuge in You from the evil of my soul and from the evil of Satan and his helpers . (I seek refuge in You) from bringing evil upon my soul and from harming any Muslim.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ فَاطِرَ السَّماوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ، رَبَّ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَمَلِيكَهُ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ نَفْسِي، وَمِنْ شَرِّ الشَّيْطَانِ وَشِرْكِهِ، وَأَنْ أَقْتَرِفَ عَلَى نَفْسِي سُوءاً، أَوْ أَجُرَّهُ إِلَى مُسْلِمٍ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'Aalimal-ghaybi wash-shahaadati faatiras-samaawaati wal'ardhi, Rabba kulli shay 'in wa maleekahu, 'ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta, 'a'oothu bika min sham nafsee, wa min sharrish-shaytaani wa shirkihi, wa 'an 'aqtarifa 'alaa nafsee soo'an, 'aw 'ajurrahu 'ilaa Muslimin

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in this world and the next. O Allah, I seek Your forgiveness and Your protection in my religion, in my worldly affairs, in my family and in my wealth. O Allah, conceal my secrets and preserve me from anguish . O Allah , guard me from what is in front of me and behind me , from my left , and from my right , and from above me . I seek refuge in Your Greatness from being struck down from beneath me.

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي الدُّنْيَا وَالْآخِرَةِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ فِي دِينِي وَدُنْيَايَ وَأَهْللِي، وَمَالِي، اللَّهُمَّ اسْتُرْ عَوْرَاتِي، وَآمِنْ رَوْعَاتِي، اللَّهُمَّ احْفَظْنِي مِنْ بَيْنِ يَدَيَّ، وَمِنْ خَلْفِي، وَعَنْ يَمِينِي، وَعَنْ شِمَالِي، وَمِنْ فَوْقِي، وَأَعُوذُ بِعَظَمَتِكَ أَنْ أُغْتَالَ مِنْ تَحْتِي
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'alukal-'afwa wal'aafiyata fid-dunyaa wal'aakhirati, Allaahumma 'innee 'as'alukal-'afwa wal'aafiyata fee deenee wa dunyaaya wa 'ahlee, wa maalee , Allaahum-mastur 'awraatee, wa 'aamin raw'aatee, Allaahum-mahfadhnee min bayni yadayya, wa min khalfee, wa 'an yameenee, wa 'an shimaalee, wa min fawqee, wa 'a'oothu bi'adhamatika 'an 'ughtaala min tahtee

duas.ar_translation:
We have entered a new day and with it all dominion is Allah's. Praise is to Allah. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. To Allah belongs the dominion, and to Him is the praise and He is Able to do all things. My Lord, I ask You for the goodness of this day and of the days that come after it, and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this day and of the days that come after it. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from laziness and helpless old age. My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the punishment of Hell-fire , and from the punishment of the grave.
When you say this in the evening you should say: 'Amsaynaa wa'amsal-mulku lillaah: 'We have ended another day and with it all dominion is Allah's' and
Rabbi 'as'aluka khayra maa fee haathihil-laylati, wa khayra maa ba'dahaa, wa 'a'oothu bika min sharri maa fee haathihil-laylati wa sharri maa ba'dahaa: 'I ask You for the good things of this night and of the nights that come after it and I seek refuge in You from the evil of this night and of the nights that come after it.'

duas.arabic: أَصْبَحْنَا وَأَصْبَحَ الْمُلْكُ للهِ وَالْحَمْدُ للهِ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحَدْهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ، ربِّ أَسْأَلُكَ خَيْرَ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَومِ وَخَيْرَ مَا بَعْدَهُ، وَأَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا فِي هَذَا الْيَومِ وَشَرِّ مَا بَعْدَهُ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْكَسَلِ، وَسُوءِ الكِبَرِ، رَبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنْ عَذَابٍ فِي النَّارِ وَعَذَابٍ فِي الْقَبْرِ
duas.transliteration: Asbahnaa wa 'asbahal-mulku lillaahi walhamdu lillaahi, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu wa Huwa 'alaa kutti shay'in Qadeer. Rabbi 'as'aluka khayra maa fee haathal-yawmi wa khayra maa ba'dahu wa 'a'oothu bika min sharri maa fee haathal-yawmi wa sharri maa ba'dahu, Rabbi 'a'oothu bika minal-kasali, wa soo'il-kibari, Rabbi 'a'oothu bika min 'athaabin fin-naari wa 'athaabin fil-qabri

duas.ar_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.fr_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.id_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.en_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.ms_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.es_translation: Know that Allah is your protector. Excellent is the protector, and Excellent is the helper.
duas.arabic: أَنَّ اللَّهَ مَوْلَاكُمْ ۚ نِعْمَ الْمَوْلَىٰ وَنِعْمَ النَّصِيرُ
duas.transliteration: Anna Allaha mawlakum ni'mal mawla wa ni'man naseer

duas.ar_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.id_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.en_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.es_translation: My Lord! I seek refuge with You from the whisperings (suggestions) of the Shayatin (devils). And I seek refuge with You, My Lord! lest they may attend (or come near) me.
duas.arabic: وَقُلْ رَّبِّ اَعُوْذُ بِكَ مِنْ هَمَزٰتِ الشَّيٰطِيْنِ. وَاَعُوْذُ بِكَ رَبِّ اَنْ يَّحْضُرُوْنِ.
duas.transliteration: Rabbi  ‘a`outhubika min hamazaatish-shayaateeni, wa ‘a`outhu bika rabbi ‘ay-yahdhuroon
duas.ar_benefits: تعلم النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) هذا الدُعاء من الله (سُبحانه وتعالى)
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua a été enseigné par Allah (SWT) au Prophète (SAW)
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini diajarkan oleh Alloh SWT kepada Rasululloh (SAW)
duas.en_benefits: This dau was taught by Allah SWT to Prophet (SAW)
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini diajarkan oleh Allah (SWT) kepada Nabi (SAW).
duas.es_benefits: Esta dua fue enseñada por Alá (Exaltado sea) al Profeta (SAW)
duas.ar_description: تخشى أن تضِل بعيداً عن الصِراط المُستقيم؟  سيُساعدك هذا الدُعاء أن تبقى على الطريق
duas.fr_description: Vous avez peur de vous égarer du droit chemin? Cette dua vous aidera à rester sur la bonne voie
duas.id_description: Takut tersesat dari jalan yang lurus? Doa ini akan membantumu agar tetap berada di jalurmu
duas.en_description: Afraid of going astray from the straight path? This dua will help to keep you on track
duas.ms_description: Takut tersasar dari jalan lurus? Doa ini akan memastikan anda kekal di atas jalan yang benar.
duas.es_description: ¿Tienes miedo por perder el camino recto? Esta dua te ayudará a seguir por buen camino

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.fr_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.id_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.ms_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.es_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
duas.transliteration: A'oothu billaahi minash-Shaytaanir-rajeem
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لكبح غضبك
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour contenir votre colère
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk melawan amarahmu
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to curb your anger
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk mengawal kemarahan kamu.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para frenar tu enfado

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.fr_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.id_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.ms_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.es_translation: I seek refuge in the Perfect Words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
duas.transliteration: A'oothu bikalimaatil-laahit-taammaati min sharri maa khalaqa
duas.ar_benefits: من يقول هذا الدُعاء ثلاث مرات في المساء سيحميه الله من لدغات الحشرات. وعندما تقوله حينما تذهب الى أي مكان سيحميك من جميع المخلوقات الشريرة (الجن– الشيطان).
duas.fr_benefits: Celui qui récite cela trois fois dans la soirée sera protégé des piqûres d'insectes. Réciter cela en voyageant dans n'importe quel endroit vous protégera de tous les êtres mauvais (Jinn/Shaytan).
duas.id_benefits: Siapapun yang membacanya tiga kali pada malam hari akan dilindungi dari sengatan serangga. Membacanya ketika dalam perjalanan akan melindunginya dari segala macam kejahatan (jin/setan).
duas.en_benefits: Whoever recites this three times in the evening will be protected from insect stings. Reciting this when travelling to any places will protect you from all evil beings (Jinn/Shaytan).
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca ini sebanyak tiga kali pada waktu petang akan dilindungi daripada gigitan serangga. Membacanya ketika bermusafir ke mana-mana tempat akan melindungi anda daripada semua kejahatan (Jin/Syaitan).
duas.es_benefits: Quienquiera que recite este tres veces por la tarde estará protegido de las picaduras de insectos. Recitar este cuando viajas a cualquier lugar te protegerá de todos los seres malvados (Yinn / Shaytán).

duas.ar_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.id_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.en_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.es_translation: My Lord! Save me and my family from what they do.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي وَأَهْلِي مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi najjinee waahlee mimma ya'maloon.
duas.ar_benefits: قال هذا الدُعاء سيدُنا لوط (عليه السلام).
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua a été demandée par le Prophète Lut (AS).
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini pernah dipanjatkan oleh Nabi Luth (AS).
duas.en_benefits: This dua was asked by Prophet Lut (AS).
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini diminta oleh Nabi Lut (AS).
duas.es_benefits: Esta dua fue pedida por El Profeta Lot (AS)

duas.ar_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.fr_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.id_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.en_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.ms_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.es_translation: I seek protection for you in the Perfect Words of Allah from every devil and every beast, and from every envious blameworthy eye.
duas.arabic: أُعيـذُكُمـا بِكَلِـماتِ اللهِ التّـامَّة، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْـطانٍ وَهـامَّة، وَمِنْ كُـلِّ عَـيْنٍ لامَّـة
duas.transliteration: U'eethukumaa bikalimaatil-laahit-taammati min kulli shaytaanin wa haammatin, wa min kulli 'aynin laammatin
duas.ar_benefits: أطلب الحماية عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء! روى أبن عباس أن النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) أعتاد أن يطلب الحماية للحسن والحسين بهذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Protégez-vous en récitant cette dua! Ibn'Abbas a raconté que le prophète Mohammed (SAW) avait l'habitude de demander la protection d'Allah pour Al-Hassan et Al-Hussain en récitant cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Mohon perlindungan dengan membaca doa ini! Ibnu Abbas meriwayatkan bahwa Nabi Muhammad (SAW) biasanya memohon perlindungan Alloh bagi Hasan dan Husain dengan membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Seek protection by reciting this dua! Ibn'Abbas related that the Prophet Muhammad (SAW) used to seek Allah's protection for Al-Hassan and Al-Hussain by reciting this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Mohon perlindungan dengan membaca doa ini! Ibn Abbas meriwayatkan bahawa Nabi Muhammad (SAW) pernah memohon perlindungan Allah untuk Al-Hassan dan Al-Hussain dengan membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Buscar la protección a través de recitar esta dua! Ibn'Abbas relató que el Profeta Muhammad (SAW) solía pedir la protección de Alá a Hasan y Al- Husáin por recitar esta dua

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Rescue us from this town whose people are oppressors; and raise for us from You one who will protect, and raise for us from You one who will help.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَخْرِجْنَا مِنْ هَٰذِهِ الْقَرْيَةِ الظَّالِمِ أَهْلُهَا وَاجْعَلْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ وَلِيًّا وَاجْعَلْ لَنَا مِنْ لَدُنْكَ نَصِيرًا
duas.transliteration: rabbana akhrijna min hathihialqaryati aththalimi ahluhawajAAal lana min ladunka waliyyan wajAAallana min ladunka naseera
duas.ar_benefits: قيل هذا الدُعاء بواسطة المُسلمون الأوائل لمدينة مكة عندما كانوا مضطهدين من قبيلة قريش.
duas.fr_benefits: Cette dua a été demandée par les premiers musulmans de la ville de La Mecque lorsque la tribu des Quruaish les a opprimés.
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini dipanjatkan oleh umat muslim di masa yang lalu di kota Mekkah ketika kaum Quraisy menindas mereka.
duas.en_benefits: This dua was asked by the early Muslims of the Makkah city when the Quruaish tribe oppressed them.
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini diminta oleh umat Islam kota Mekah yang terdahulu ketika Bani Quraisy menindas mereka.
duas.es_benefits: Esta dua fue pedida por los musulmanes primeros de la ciudad de la Meca cuando la tribu de Quraish les oprimió

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, You are my strength and You are my support. For Your sake I go forth and for Your sake I advance and for Your sake I fight.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ أَنْتَ عَضُـدي، وَأَنْتَ نَصـيري، بِكَ أَجـولُ وَبِكَ أَصـولُ وَبِكَ أُقـاتِل
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'Anta 'adhudee, wa 'Anta naseeree, bika 'ajoolu, wa bika 'asoolu, wa bika 'uqaatilu

duas.ar_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.fr_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.id_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.en_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.ms_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.es_translation: Allah, Revealer of the Book, Swift to account, defeat the groups (of disbelievers). O Allah, defeat them and shake them.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ  مُنْزِلَ اْلِكتَابِ ، سَرِيْعَ الْحِسَابِ ،اِهْزِمِ الإْحْزَابَ ،اللَّهُمَّ اِهْزِمْهُمْ وَزَلْزِلْهُمْ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma munzilal-kitaabi, saree'al-hisaabi, ihzimil-'ahzaaba, Allaahumma ihzimhum wa zalzilhum
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتحمي نفسك من أعدائك
duas.fr_description: Cherchez l'aide et la protection d'Allah avec cette Dua!
duas.id_description: Baca doa ini untuk melindungi dirimu dari musuh
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to protect yourself from your enemies
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk melindungi dri kamu dari musuh kamu.
duas.es_description: Recita esta dua para protegerte de tus enemigos

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, suffice (i.e. protect) me against them however You wish.
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ اكْفِنِيهِمْ بِماَ شِئْتَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahummak-fineehim bimaa shi'ta

duas.ar_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.fr_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.id_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.en_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.ms_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.es_translation: Upon Allah do we rely. Our Lord, make us not [objects of] trial for the wrongdoing people. And save us by Your mercy from the disbelieving people.
duas.arabic:
عَلَى اللَّهِ تَوَكَّلْنَا رَبَّنَا لَا تَجْعَلْنَا فِتْنَةً لِلْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ 
وَنَجِّنَا بِرَحْمَتِكَ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
duas.transliteration:
Alal Allahi thawakkalna rabbana la taj'alna fitnatal lil-qawmidh-Dhalimeen.
Wa najjina bi-Rahmatika minal qawmil kafireen.
duas.ar_description: أحمي نفسك مِن الطُغاة والعاصين مع هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Protect yourself from the tyrants and people who do wrong with this Dua
duas.id_description: Lindungi dirimu dari orang-orang jahat dengan doa ini
duas.en_description: Protect yourself from the tyrants and people who do wrong with this Dua
duas.ms_description: Lindungi diri kamu dari penzalim dan mereka yang membuat kesalahan dengan doa ini.
duas.es_description: Protege a ti mismo de los tiranos y las personas que hacen mal con esta súplica.

duas.ar_translation:
He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 'My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'
duas.fr_translation:
He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 'My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'
duas.id_translation:
He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 'My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'
duas.en_translation:
He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 'My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'
duas.ms_translation:
He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.
 'My Lord, for the favor You bestowed upon me, I will never be an assistant to the criminals.
My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'

He (Musa) said, 'My Lord, indeed I have wronged myself, so forgive me,' and He forgave him. Indeed, He is the Forgiving, the Merciful.

My Lord, save me from the wrongdoing people.'
duas.arabic:
قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
رَبِّ بِمَا أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنْ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرًا لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ
رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
duas.transliteration:
Qala Rabbi innee thalamtunafsee faghfir lee faghafara lahu innahu huwa alghafooruarraheem
Rabbi bima anAAamtaAAalayya falan akoona thaheeran lilmujrimeen
Rabbi najjinee mina alqawmi aththalimeen

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You lest I associate anything with You knowingly, and I seek Your forgiveness for what I know not.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ  إِنّـي أَعـوذُبِكَ أَنْ أُشْـرِكَ بِكَ وَأَنا أَعْـلَمْ، وَأَسْتَـغْفِرُكَ لِما لا أَعْـلَم
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika 'an 'ushrika bika wa 'anaa 'a'lamu, wa 'astaghfiruka limaa laa 'a'lamu

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Place us not with the people who are Zaalimoon (polytheists and wrong doers).
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Place us not with the people who are Zaalimoon (polytheists and wrong doers).
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Place us not with the people who are Zaalimoon (polytheists and wrong doers).

duas.transliteration: Rabbanaa Laa Taj-a’lnaa Ma – A’l Qawmiz’ Z’aalimeen
duas.ar_description: هل تُريد أن تحيا حياة صالحة؟ أضغط هنا

duas.ms_description: Mahu menjalani hidup sebagai manusia soleh? Klik di sini
duas.es_description: ¿Quieres dirigir una vida recta? Pulsa aquí

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.
duas.id_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.
duas.en_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, then do not place me among the wrongdoing people.

duas.transliteration: Rabbi fala tajAAalnee fee alqawmi aththalimeen
duas.ar_benefits: علّم الله هذا الدُعاء للنبي مُحمد (صلى الله عليه وسلم).
duas.fr_benefits: Allah a enseigné cette dua au prophète (SAW).
duas.id_benefits: Alloh mengajarkan doa ini kepada Rasululloh (SAW).

duas.ms_benefits: Allah mengajarkan doa ini kepada Nabi (SAW).
duas.es_benefits: Alá enseñó esta súplica al Profeta (SAW)

duas.ar_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.fr_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.id_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.en_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.ms_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.es_translation: O my Lord! Make me one who performs As-Salaat (Iqaamat-as-Salaat), and (also) from my offspring, our Lord! And accept my invocation.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ اجْعَلْنِيْ مُقِيْمَ الصَّلٰوةِ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِيْ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلْ دُعَاۗءِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbij-A’lnee Muqeemas’ S’alaati Wa Min D’urrriyyatee Rabbanaa Wa Taqabbal Du-A’aa
duas.ar_description: امنح بعض الدقائق مرة في كُل فترة لتقول هذا الدُعاء للأشخاص الذين ربوك
duas.fr_description: Prenez quelques minutes de temps en temps pour lire cette dua pour les gens qui t'ont élevé
duas.id_description: Luangkan waktumu sekali-kali untuk membaca doa ini bagi orang-orang yang telah membesarkanmu
duas.en_description: Take a few minutes out once in a while to read this dua for the people who raised you up
duas.ms_description: Ambil beberapa minit sekali-sekala untuk membaca doa ini buat mereka yang telah membesarkan anda.
duas.es_description: Tómate unos minutos de vez en cuando para leer esta dua para las personas que te criaron.

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them (parents) as they brought me up [when i was] small.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, have mercy upon them (parents) as they brought me up [when i was] small.

duas.transliteration: Rabbi  irhamhuma kama rabbayani sagheera

duas.ar_translation: O my Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous.
duas.fr_translation: O my Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous.
duas.id_translation: O my Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous.

duas.es_translation: O my Lord! Grant unto us wives and offspring who will be the comfort of our eyes, and give us (the grace) to lead the righteous.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
duas.transliteration: Rabbana Hablana min azwaajina wadhurriy-yatina, qurrata 'ayioni wa-jalna lil-muttaqeena Imaama

duas.ar_translation: O my Lord! Grant me from You, a good offspring. You are indeed the All-Hearer of invocation.
duas.fr_translation: O my Lord! Grant me from You, a good offspring. You are indeed the All-Hearer of invocation.
duas.id_translation: O my Lord! Grant me from You, a good offspring. You are indeed the All-Hearer of invocation.
duas.en_translation: O my Lord! Grant me from You, a good offspring. You are indeed the All-Hearer of invocation.

duas.es_translation: O my Lord! Grant me from You, a good offspring. You are indeed the All-Hearer of invocation.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ ھَبْ لِيْ مِنْ لَّدُنْكَ ذُرِّيَّةً طَيِّبَةً  ۚ اِنَّكَ سَمِيْعُ الدُّعَاۗءِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi Hab Lee Mil Ladunka D’urriyyatan T’ayyibah Innaka Samee-u’d Du’aa
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء إذا كُنت تواجه مشاكل في إنجاب الأطفال!  قال هذا الدُعاء سيدُنا زكريا (عليه السلام)، داعياً الله أن يرزقه بطفل عندما بلغ سن الكبر.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua si vous avez du mal à avoir un enfant! Le prophète Zakaria a récité cette dua, priant Allah de lui accorder un enfant quand il atteindra la vieillesse.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini jika kamu kesulitan mendapatkan keturunan! Nabi Zakaria (AS) memanjatkan doa ini, dan memohon kepada Alloh agar dikaruniai seorang anak ketika beliau berusia lanjut.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua if you are having trouble having a child! Prophet Zakaria (AS) recited this dua, praying to Allah to grant him a child when he attained old age.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini jika anda menghadapi masalah mendapat anak! Nabi Zakaria (AS) membaca doa ini, berdoa kepada Allah agar dikurniakan seorang anak ketika usianya sudah tua.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Lee este dua si tienes problemas para tener un hijo! El profeta Zakaría (AS) recitó este dua, invócandole a Dios que le concediera un hijo cuando alcanzara la vejez.
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء ليرزقك الله بالأطفال
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette Dua pour avoir des enfants
duas.id_description: Baca doa ini agar dikaruniai anak
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to have kids
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk mendapat anak
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para concebir hijos

duas.ar_translation: O My Lord! Leave me not single (childless), though You are the Best of the inheritors.
duas.fr_translation: O My Lord! Leave me not single (childless), though You are the Best of the inheritors.

duas.transliteration: Rabbi Laa Tad’arnee Fardaw wa Anta Khayrul Waaritheen
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء ليرزقك الله بالأطفال
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette Dua pour avoir des enfants

duas.ar_translation:
O Allah, make me healthy in my body. O Allah, preserve for me my hearing. O Allah, preserve for me my sight. There is none worthy of worship but You . 
O Allah , I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave . There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.fr_translation:
O Allah, make me healthy in my body. O Allah, preserve for me my hearing. O Allah, preserve for me my sight. There is none worthy of worship but You . 
O Allah , I seek refuge in You from disbelief and poverty and I seek refuge in You from the punishment of the grave . There is none worthy of worship but You.

duas.arabic:
اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَدَنـي ، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في سَمْـعي ، اللّهُـمَّ عافِـني في بَصَـري ، لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْـتَ.
اللّهُـمَّ إِنّـي أَعـوذُبِكَ مِنَ الْكُـفر ، وَالفَـقْر ، وَأَعـوذُبِكَ مِنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر ، لا إلهَ إلاّ أَنْـتَ
duas.transliteration:
Allaahumma 'aafinee fee badanee, Allaahumma 'aafinee fee sam'ee, Allaahumma 'aafinee fee basaree, laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta.
Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika minal-kufri, walfaqri, wa 'a'oothu bika min 'athaabil-qabri, laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta.
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء 3 مرات.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua trois fois.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua thrice.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali.
duas.es_benefits: Baca doa ini sebanyak tiga kali.
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لحياة آمنة وصحية
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour une vie sûre et saine
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk hidup yang aman dan sehat
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua for a safe and healthy life
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk hidup yang selamat dan sihat.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para una vida segura y saludable.

duas.ar_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.fr_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.id_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.en_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.ms_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.es_translation: Do not worry, it will be a purification (for you), Allah willing.
duas.arabic: لَا بَأْسَ طَهُوْرٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللهُ
duas.transliteration: Laa ba'sa tahoorun 'inshaa'Allaah.
duas.ar_benefits: أعمل صالحاً عندما تقوم بزيارة أقاربك أو أصدقاؤك وتسألهم عن أحوالهم الصحية! عندما يقوم الإنسان بزيارة أخيه المُسلم المريض، فإنه يمشي على طريق من الجنة حتى يجلس، وعندما يجلس فإنه يتستر بثوب الرحمة. إذا أتى في الصباح، يُسبح له سبعون ألفاً من الملائكة حتى المساء، وإذا أتى في المساء، يُسبح له سبعون ألفاً من الملائكة حتى الصباح.
duas.fr_benefits: Faites une bonne action en rendant visite à vos proches/amis qui passent par les épreuves de santé! Quand un homme va rendre visite à son frère musulman malade, il marche le long d'un sentier du Paradis jusqu' à ce qu'il soit assis, et quand il s'assoit, il est vêtu de miséricorde. S'il vient le matin, soixante-dix mille anges prient pour lui jusqu'au soir, et s'il vient le soir, soixante-dix mille anges prient pour lui jusqu'au matin.
duas.id_benefits: Lakukan amalan baik dengan menjenguk saudara/teman yang sedang diuji kesehatannya! Ketika seseorang mengunjungi saudaranya yang sedang sakit, dia bagaikan berjalan menuju surga hingga dia duduk, dan ketika dia duduk, dia diselimuti dengan rahmat, Jika dia datang pada pagi hari, tujuh puluh ribu malaikat berdoa untuknya hingga malam hari, dan jika dia datang pada malam hari, tujuh puluh ribu malaikat berdoa untuknya hingga pagi hari.
duas.en_benefits: Do a good deed by visiting your relatives/friends going through the trials of health! When a man goes to visit his sick Muslim brother, he walks along a path of Paradise until he sits , and when he sits he is cloaked in mercy. If he comes in the morning, seventy thousand angels pray for him until evening, and if he comes in the evening, seventy thousand angels pray for him until morning.
duas.ms_benefits: Lakukan kebaikan dengan menziarahi saudara-mara/rakan-rakan yang melalui ujian kesihatan? Apabila seseorang menziarahi saudara Muslimnya yang sakit, dia berjalan di laluan syurga sehinggalah dia duduk, dan apabila dia duduk, dia diselubungi kasih. Jika dia datang pada waktu pagi, tujuh puluh ribu malaikat mendoakannya sehingga petang, dan jika dia datang pada waktu petang, tujuh puluh ribu malaikat mendoakannya sehingga pagi.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Haz una buena acción visitando a tus familiares / amigos pasando por los problemas de salud! Cuando un hombre va a visitar a su hermano musulmán enfermo, camina por un sendero del Paraíso hasta que se sienta, y cuando se sienta está cubierto de misericordia. Si viene por la mañana, setenta mil ángeles rezan por él hasta la tarde, y si viene por la tarde, setenta mil ángeles rezan por él hasta la mañana.

duas.ar_translation: I ask Allah who is the Lofty and the Lord of the Mighty Throne that He cures you (Prophet Mohammad (SAW.) said that by reciting this dua seven times, the ill person will regain his health and if death occurs then that (death) is a different issue (i.e. death is written it cannot be prevented))

duas.id_translation: I ask Allah who is the Lofty and the Lord of the Mighty Throne that He cures you (Prophet Mohammad (SAW.) said that by reciting this dua seven times, the ill person will regain his health and if death occurs then that (death) is a different issue (i.e. death is written it cannot be prevented))

duas.transliteration: As'alullaahal-'Adheema Rabbal-'Arshil-'Adheemi 'an yashfiyaka.

duas.fr_benefits: Récitez sept fois.
duas.id_benefits: Baca sebanyak tujuh kali.
duas.en_benefits: Recite seven times.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca tujuh kali.
duas.es_benefits: Recitaesta dua siete veces

duas.ar_translation: In the Name of Allah I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against.
duas.fr_translation: In the Name of Allah I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against.
duas.id_translation: In the Name of Allah I seek refuge in Allah and in His Power from the evil of what I find and of what I guard against.
