duas.arabic:
بِسْمِ اللهِ , بِسْمِ اللهِ , بِسْمِ اللهِ
أَعُوذُ باللهِ وَقُدْرَتِهِ مَنْ شَرِّ مَا أَجِدُ وَأُحَاذِرُ
duas.transliteration:
Bismillaah, Bismillaah, Bismillaah
'A'oothu billaahi wa qudratihi min sharri maa 'ajidu wa 'uhaathiru
duas.ar_benefits: تخلص من الآلام عندما تقوم بوضع يدك على منطقة الوجع وقُل بسم الله ثلاث مرات تليها الدُعاء (سبع مرات).
duas.fr_benefits: Soulagez la douleur en plaçant votre main sur la zone à problèmes et en récitant trois fois Bismillah suivi de la dua (sept fois).
duas.id_benefits: Pulihkan rasa sakit dengan menaruh tanganmu pada area yang bermasalah dan ucapkan Bismillah sebanyak tiga kali diikuti dengan doa (sebanyak tujuh kali).
duas.en_benefits: Get relief from pain by placing your hand on the problem area and reciting Bismillah thrice followed by the dua (seven times).
duas.es_benefits: Obtén Alivio del dolor colocando tu mano en la zona del dolor recitando Bismillah tres veces seguido por la súplica (siete veces)
duas.ms_benefits: Dapatkan kelegaan dengan meletakkan tangan di kawasan yang bermasalah dan membaca Bismillah sebanyak tiga kali diikuti dengan doa (tujuh kali)
duas.ar_description: أحصل على الراحة من أي نوع تعب جسدي عندما تقول هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Gagnez le soulagement de n'importe quelle douleur physique avec cette Dua!
duas.id_description: Dapatkan kesembuhan dari segala macam penyakit fisik dengan doa ini!
duas.en_description: Gain relief from any sort of physical pain with this Dua!
duas.ms_description: Perolehi kelegaan dari sebarang kesakitan fizikal dengan doa ini!
duas.es_description: ¡Sentir alivio de cualquier tipo de dolor físico con esta súplica!

duas.ar_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.fr_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.id_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.en_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.ms_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.es_translation: Praise is to Allah Who has spared me what He has afflicted you with, and preferred me greatly above much of what He has created.
duas.arabic: الْحَمْـدُ للهِ الّذي عافاني مِمّا ابْتَـلاكَ بِهِ، وَفَضَّلَـني عَلى كَثيـرٍ مِمَّنْ خَلَـقَ تَفْضـيلا
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahil-lathee 'aafaanee mimmab-talaaka bihi wa fadhdhalanee 'alaa katheerin mimman khalaqa tafdheela

duas.ar_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.fr_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.id_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.en_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.ms_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.es_translation: Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful.
duas.arabic: أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الضُّرُّ وَأَنتَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
duas.transliteration: Annee massaniya addurru waanta arhamuarrahimeen
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء في أوقات المرض! قال هذا الدُعاء سيدُنا أيوب (عليه السلام) عندما كان يعاني من مرض رهيب أنتشر خلال كامل جسده.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua en cas de maladie! Le prophète Ayyob (AS) a récité cette dua quand il souffrait d'une terrible maladie qui s'est répandue sur tout son corps.
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah doa ini ketika sakit! Nabi Ayub (AS) membaca doa ini ketika beliau menderita sakit parah yang menyebar di seluruh tubuhnya.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua in times of sickness! Prophet Ayyob (AS) recited this dua when he was suffering from a terrible disease that spread all over his body.
duas.ms_benefits: Nabi Ayub (AS) membaca doa ini ketika sedang menderita akibat penyakit yang dahsyat yang merebak ke seluruh tubuhnya.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Lee esta súplica en tiempos de enfermedad! El Profeta Ayyub (AS) recitó esta dua cuando él estaba sufriendo una terrible enfermedad que se extendió por todo su cuerpo.

duas.ar_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.fr_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.id_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.en_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.ms_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.es_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Allah is the Most Great. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone. None has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, His is the dominion and His is the praise. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, there is no power and no might but by Allah.
duas.arabic: لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَاللّهُ أَكْبَـر، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ , لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وحْـدَهُ لا شَريكَ لهُ، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ لهُ المُلكُ ولهُ الحَمْد، لا إلهَ إلاّ اللّهُ وَلا حَـوْلَ وَلا قُـوَّةَ إِلاّ بِالله.
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wallaahu 'Akbar, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wa laa hawla wa laa quwwata 'illaa billaah

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.id_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.en_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.es_translation: O Allah, forgive me and have mercy upon me and join me with the highest companions (in Paradise).
duas.arabic: أللّهُـمَّ اغْفِـرْ لي وَارْحَمْـني وَأَلْحِقْـني بِالرَّفـيقِ الأّعْلـى
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lee warhamnee wa 'alhiqnee bir-rafeeqil-'a'laa

duas.ar_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.fr_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.id_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.en_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.ms_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.es_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.arabic: لَآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّا اللّٰه
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu
duas.ar_benefits: تعلم هذا الدُعاء الآن! أن الشخص الذي يقول هذا الدُعاء عندما يحتضر سوف يدخل الجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Apprenez cette Dua maintenant! Une personne qui dit ça en mourant entrera au Paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Pelajari doa ini, sekarang! Orang yang memanjatkannya ketika sakarotul maut akan masuk surga.
duas.en_benefits: Learn this Dua now! A person who says this when dying will enter Paradise.
duas.ms_benefits: Pelajari Doa ini sekarang! Sesiapa yang membacanya ketika hendak meninggal dunia akan memasuki syurga.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Aprende esta dua ahora!  Un hombre que dice esta cuando muera entrará al Paraíso.
duas.ar_description: هل تشعر بعدم الأمان؟ قُل هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_description: Vous vous sentez en danger? Récitez cette dua
duas.id_description: Merasa tidak aman? Bacalah doa ini
duas.en_description: Feeling unsafe? Recite this Dua
duas.ms_description: Rasa tak selamat? Baca doa ini.
duas.es_description: ¿Sientes inseguridad? Recita esta súplica

duas.ar_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.fr_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.id_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.en_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.ms_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.es_translation: I bear witness that none has the right to be worshipped but Allah alone, Who has no partner; and I bear witness that Muhammad is His slave and His Messenger.
duas.arabic: أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، وَأَشْهَدُ أَنَّ مُحَمَّداً عَبْدُهُ وَرَسُولُهُ
duas.transliteration: Ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu wa 'ash-hadu 'anna Muhammadan 'abduhu wa Rasooluhu.

duas.ar_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.fr_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.id_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.en_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.ms_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.es_translation: Oh Muslims residing here, salaams on you, by the will of Allah we will also be coming to you. We seek safety for us and you.
duas.arabic: السَّلَامُ عَلَيْكُمُ أَهْلَ الدِّيَارِ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُسْلِمِينَ وَإِنَّا إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ بِكُمْ لَاحِقُونَ نَسْأَلُ اللَّهَ لَنَا وَلَكُمُ الْعَافِيَةَ
duas.transliteration: Assalaamu 'alaykum 'ahlad-diyaari, minal-mu'mineena walmuslimeena, wa 'innaa 'in shaa' Allaahu bikum laahiqoona [wa yarhamullaahul-mustaqdimeena minnaa walmusta'khireena] 'as'alullaaha lanaa wa lakumul- 'aafiyata.

duas.ar_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.fr_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.id_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.en_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.ms_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.es_translation: It is the Decree of Allah and He does whatever He wills.
duas.arabic: قَدَّرَ اللهُ وَما شـاءَ فَعَـلَ
duas.transliteration: Qadarullaahu wa maa shaa'afa'ala
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتتعافى من إخفاقك
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour vous remettre des échecs
duas.id_description: Baca doa ini untuk memulihkan dirimu dari kegagalan
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to recover yourself from failures
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk memulihkan diri kamu dari kegagalan.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para recuperarte de fracasos

duas.ar_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.fr_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.id_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.en_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.ms_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.es_translation: Indeed we belong to Allah , and indeed to Him we will return.
duas.arabic: إِنَّا لِلّهِ وَإِنَّـا إِلَيْهِ رَاجِعونَ‎
duas.transliteration: Inna lillahi wa inna ilayhi raajioon
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتتعافى من الخسارة
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour vous remettre d'une perte
duas.id_description: Baca doa ini untuk memulihkan dirimu dari kekalahan/kehilangan
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to recover yourself from a loss
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk memulihkan diri kamu dari kehilangan.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para recuperarte de una pérdida

duas.ar_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.fr_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.id_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.en_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.ms_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.es_translation: We are from Allah and unto Him we return. O Allah take me out of my plight and bring to me after it something better.
duas.arabic: إِنّا للهِ وَإِنَا إِلَـيْهِ رَاجِِعُـونَ ، اللهُـمِّ اْجُـرْني فِي مُصِـيبَتي، وَاخْلُـفْ لِي خَيْـراً مِنْـها
duas.transliteration: Innaa lillaahi wa 'innaa 'ilayhi raaji'oon, Allaahumma'-jurni fee museebatee wa 'akhliflee khayran minhaa

duas.ar_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.id_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.en_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.es_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.arabic: حَسْبُـنا اللهُ وَنِعْـمَ الوَكـيل
duas.transliteration: Hasbunallaahu wa ni'amal-wakeel

duas.ar_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.id_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.en_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.es_translation: Allah is sufficient for us and the best of those on whom to depend.
duas.arabic: حَسْبُـنا اللهُ وَنِعْـمَ الوَكـيل
duas.transliteration: Hasbunallaahu wa ni'amal-wakeel

duas.ar_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.fr_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.id_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.en_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.ms_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.es_translation: I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
duas.arabic: إِنَّمَا أَشْكُو بَثِّي وَحُزْنِي إِلَى اللَّهِ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ اللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
duas.transliteration: Innama ashkoo baththee wahuzneeila Allahi waaAAlamu mina Allahi ma lataAAlamoon
duas.ar_benefits: أعتاد سيدُنا يعقوب (عليه السلام) أن يقول هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Le prophète Ya'coob (AS) récitait cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Nabi Yakub (AS) biasa memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Prophet Ya'coob (AS) used to recite this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Nabi Yaakub (AS) pernah membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: El Profeta Ya’qub (AS) solía recitar esta súplica.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in you from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and overpowered by men (i .e . others).
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ إِنِّي أَعْوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الهَـمِّ وَ الْحُـزْنِ، والعًجْـزِ والكَسَلِ والبُخْـلِ والجُـبْنِ، وضَلْـعِ الـدَّيْنِ وغَلَبَـةِ الرِّجال
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'a'oothu bika minal-hammi walhazani, wal'ajzi walkasali, walbukhli waljubni, wa dhala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir-rijaal

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.id_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.en_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.ms_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.es_translation: None has the right to be worshipped but You (O Allah), Glorified (and Exalted) are You. Truly, I have been of the wrong-doers.
duas.arabic: لَّآ اِلٰهَ اِلَّآ اَنْتَ سُبْحٰــنَكَ اِنِّىْ كُنْتُ مِنَ الظّٰلِمِيْنَ
duas.transliteration: Laa Ilaha Illaaa Anta Subh’aanaka Innee Kuntu Minaz” Z’aalimeen
duas.ar_description: تشعُر بفقد الأمل والحُزن؟ لا تقلق، فقط إضغط هُنا
duas.fr_description: Vous vous sentez impuissant et en détresse? Ne vous inquiétez pas, cliquez ici.
duas.id_description: Merasa tidak berdaya dan berada dalam kesulitan? Tak usah khawatir, tekan disini
duas.en_description: Feeling helpless and in distress? Not to worry, just tap here.
duas.ms_description: Rasa tidak berdaya dan sedih? Jangan bimbang, ketik sahaja di sini.
duas.es_description: ¿De sentir incapacidad y disgusto? No te preocupes, sólo toca aquí

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, I hope for Your mercy. Do not leave me to myself even for the blinking of an eye (i.e. a moment). Correct all of my affairs for me. There is none worthy of worship but You.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ رَحْمَتَـكَ أَرْجـوفَلا تَكِلـني إِلى نَفْـسي طَـرْفَةَ عَـيْن، وَأَصْلِـحْ لي شَأْنـي كُلَّـه لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أنْـت
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma rahmataka 'arjoo falaa takilnee 'ilaa nafsee tarfata 'aynin, wa 'aslih lee sha'nee kullahu, laa'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta

duas.ar_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.fr_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.id_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.en_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.ms_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.es_translation: There is none worthy of worship but Allah the Mighty, the Forbearing. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the Magnificent Throne. There is none worthy of worship but Allah, Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, and Lord of the Noble Throne.
duas.arabic: لا إلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ الْعَظـيمُ الْحَلِـيمْ، لا إلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ   رَبُّ العَـرْشِ العَظِيـمِ، لا إلَهَ إلاَّ اللَّهُ  رَبُّ السَّمَـوّاتِ ورّبُّ الأَرْضِ ورَبُّ العَرْشِ الكَـريم
duas.transliteration: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahul-'Adheemul-Haleem, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu Rabbul-'Arshil-'Adheem, laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu Rabbus-samaawaati wa Rabbul-'ardhi wa Rabbul-'Arshil-Kareem

duas.ar_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.fr_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.id_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.en_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.ms_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.es_translation: O Allah! I seek refuge in You from grief and sadness, from weakness and from laziness, from miserliness and from cowardice, from being overcome by debt and from being overpowered by men (other people).
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إنِّي أعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْهَمِّ وَ الْحَزَنِ  وَ الْعَجْزِ وَ الْكَسَلِ  وَ الْبُخْلِ وَ الْجُبْنِ  وَ ضَلَعِ الدِّيْنِ وَ غَلَبَةِ الرِّجَالِ
duas.transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhubika minal hammi wal hazan, wal 'ajzi wal kasal, wal bukhli wal jubn, wa dhala'id-dayni wa ghalabatir rijaal
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتتخلص من نِقاط ضعفك
duas.fr_description: Réciter cette Dua pour se débarrasser de ses faiblesses
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk menyingkirkan kelemahanmu
duas.en_description: Recite this dua to get rid of your weaknesses
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk menghapuskan kelemahan anda
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para librarte de tu debilidad

duas.ar_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.fr_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.id_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.en_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.ms_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.es_translation: Praise is to Allah in all circumstances.
duas.arabic: الْحَمْـدُ للهِ على كُـلِّ حَالٍ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahi 'alaa kulli haal

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! pour out on us patience, and cause us to die as Muslims.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَتَوَفَّنَا مُسْلِمِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Afrigh A’laynaa S’abraw Wa Tawaffanaa Muslimeen
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء عندما تواجه أي صعوبات في الحياة
duas.fr_description: Recite this Dua when going through any difficulty in life
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini ketika menghadapi kesulitan apapun dalam hidup
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua when going through any difficulty in life
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini semasa menghadapi sebarang kesukaran dalam hidup.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica cuando estás pasando cualquier dificultad en la vida.

duas.ar_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.fr_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.id_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.en_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.ms_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.es_translation: My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe.
duas.arabic: رَبِّ احْكُم بِالْحَقِّ ۗ وَرَبُّنَا الرَّحْمَٰنُ الْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbi ohkum bilhaqqi wa rabbuna arrahmanul musta'aanu alaa ma tasifoon
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء في حالة تعرضك للمضايقات في المدرسة أو في مكان العمل أو عندما تخضع لحكم أشخاص مستبدين! قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) هذا الدُعاء عندما قام الكُفار بالسخرية منه وقالوا أشياء فظيعة عنه.
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez cette dua si vous êtes intimidé à l'école ou au travail ou si vous êtes sous le règne des tyrans! Le prophète (SAW) récita cette dua lorsque les mécréants se moquèrent de lui et dirent des choses terribles à son sujet.
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah doa ini jika kamu diganggu di sekolah atau kantor atau jika berada dibawah penguasa yang jahat! Rasululloh (SAW) membaca doa ini ketika orang-orang yang tidak beriman memperoloknya dan mengatakan hal-hal buruk tentangnya.
duas.en_benefits: Read this dua if you are bullied at school or the workplace or are under the rule of tyrants! Prophet (SAW) recited this dua when the disbelievers mocked him and said terrible things about him.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini jika anda dibuli di sekolah atau di tempat kerja atau di bawah pemerintahan yang zalim! Nabi (SAW) membaca doa ini ketika orang kafir mengejek Baginda dan mengucapkan kata-kata yang teruk mengenai Baginda.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Lee esta dua si eres amenazado en la escuela o el lugar de trabajo o estás bajo de la ley de los tiranos! El Profeta (SAW) recitó esta dua cuando los incrédulos se burlaron de él y dijeron terribles cosas sobre él.
duas.ar_description: هل تشعر أنه تم إهانتك؟ قُل هذا الدُعاء لتُجدد ثقتك
duas.fr_description: Vous vous sentez insulté? Récitez cette Dua pour regagner votre confiance
duas.id_description: Merasa terhina? Baca doa ini untuk kembali mendapatkan rasa percaya dirimu
duas.en_description: Feeling insulted? Recite this Dua to regain your confidence
duas.ms_description: Rasa dihina? Baca doa ini untuk mendapatkan kembali keyakinan kamu.
duas.es_description: ¿Te sientes ofendido/a? Recita esta súplica para recuperar tu confianza

duas.ar_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.id_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.en_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.es_translation: Allah is sufficient for me. Laa ilaaha illa Huwa (none has the right to be worshipped but He), in Him I put my trust and He is the Lord of the Mighty Throne.
duas.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللّٰهُ لا إِلَـهَ إِلاَّ هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ
duas.transliteration: H’asbiyallaah Laaa Ilaaha Illaa – Huw A’layhi Tawakkaltu Wa Huwa Rabbul A’rshil A’z’eem
duas.ar_description: تغلب على الصعوبات الآن مع هذا الحل البسيط
duas.fr_description: Surmontez vos obstacles dès maintenant avec cette solution simple
duas.id_description: Atasi rintanganmu sekarang dengan solusi sederhana ini
duas.en_description: Overcome your hurdles now with this simple solution
duas.ms_description: Atasi rintangan anda dengan penyelesaian ringkas ini
duas.es_description: Supera tus obstáculos ahora con esta simple solución.

duas.ar_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.fr_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.id_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.en_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.ms_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.es_translation: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah . Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants.
duas.arabic: وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمْرِي إِلَى اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ بَصِيرٌ بِالْعِبَادِ
duas.transliteration: wa ufawwidhu amree ila Allahi innallaha baseerun bil ibaad

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.id_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.en_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.es_translation: O Allah, do not call me to account for what they say and forgive me for what they have no knowledge of [and make me better than they imagine].
duas.arabic: اللَّهُمّ لاَ تُؤاَخِذْنِي ِبَما يَقُولُونُ ، وَاغْفِرْ لِي مَالا يَعْلَمُونَ وَاجْعَلْنِي خَيْراً مِمَّا َيظُنُّونَ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma laa tu'aakhithnee bimaa yaqooloona, waghfir lee maa laa ya'lamoona [waj'alnee khayram-mimmaa yadhunnoon]

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Bestow on us endurance, make our foothold sure, and give us help against the disbelieving folk.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْراً وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانصُرْنَا عَلَى القَوْمِ الكَافِرِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaaa Afrigh A’laynaa S’abraw Wa Thabbit Aqdamanaa Wan Surnaa A’lal Qawmil Kaafireen

duas.ar_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.fr_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.id_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.en_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.ms_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.es_translation: I seek refuge with Allah against the Satan, the outcast.
duas.arabic: أَعُوذُ بِاللَّهِ مِنَ الشَّيْطانِ الرَّجِيْمِ
duas.transliteration: A'oothu billaahi minash-Shaytaanir-rajeem
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لكبح غضبك
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour contenir votre colère
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk melawan amarahmu
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua to curb your anger
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk mengawal kemarahan kamu.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para frenar tu enfado

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, suffice me with what You have allowed instead of what You have forbidden, and make me independent of all others besides You.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ اكْفِـني بِحَلالِـكَ عَنْ حَـرامِـك، وَأَغْنِـني بِفَضْـلِكِ عَمَّـنْ سِـواك
duas.transliteration: Allaahummak-finee bihalaalika 'an haraamika wa 'aghninee bifadhlika 'amman siwaaka
duas.ar_description: هل تريد المُساعدة في تسوية ديونك؟ أضغط هنا
duas.fr_description: Vous avez besoin d'aide pour régler vos dettes? Cliquez ici
duas.id_description: Memerlukan bantuan untuk menyelesaikan hutang-hutangmu? Klik disini
duas.en_description: Need help in settling your debts? Click here
duas.ms_description: Perlukan bantuan dalam menyelesaikan hutang-hutang kamu? Klik di sini.
duas.es_description: ¿Necesitas una ayuda de pagar tus deudas? Toca aquí

duas.ar_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.fr_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.id_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.en_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.ms_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.es_translation: May Allah bless you in your family and your wealth, surely the reward for a loan is praise and returning (what was borrowed).
duas.arabic: بارَكَ اللهُ لَكَ في أَهْلِكَ وَمالِك، إِنَّما جَـزاءُ السَّلَفِ الْحَمْدُ والأَدَاء
duas.transliteration: Baarakallaahu laka fee 'ahlika wa maalika, 'innamaa jazaa'us-salafil-hamdu wal'adaa'

duas.ar_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.fr_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.id_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.en_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.ms_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.es_translation: Surely, Allah takes what is His, and what He gives is His, and to all things He has appointed a time. So, have patience and be rewarded.
duas.arabic: إِنَّ للهِ ما أَخَذ، وَلَهُ ما أَعْـطـى، وَكُـلُّ شَيءٍ عِنْـدَهُ بِأَجَلٍ مُسَـمَّى.فَلْتَصْـبِر وَلْتَحْـتَسِب
duas.transliteration: Inna lillaahi maa 'akhatha, wa lahu maa 'a'taa, wa kullu shay'in 'indahu bi'ajalin musamman. Faltasbir waltahtasib

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, forgive [name of the person] and elevate his station among those who are guided. Send him along the path of those who came before, and forgive us and him, O Lord of the worlds. Enlarge for him his grave and shed light upon him in it.
duas.arabic: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لِـ-فُلاَنٍ (باسـمه)وَارْفَعْ دَرَجَتََـهُ فِي المَهْـدِيّيـنَ ، وَاخْـلُفْـهُ في عَقِـبِهِ في الغَابِِـرِينَ، وَاغْفِـرْ لَنَا وَلَـهُ يا رَبَّ العـالَمـين، وَافْسَـحْ لَهُ في قَبْـرِهِ وَنَـوِّرْ لَهُ  فِيهِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahummaghfir li (name of the person) warfa' darajatahu fil-mahdiyyeena, wakhlufhu fee 'aqibihi fil-ghaabireena , waghfir-lanaa wa lahu yaa Rabbal-'aalameena, wafsah lahu fee qabrihi wa nawwir lahu feehi

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him and cause his entrance to be wide and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave [and from the punishment of Hell-fire].
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, forgive him and have mercy on him and give him strength and pardon him. Be generous to him and cause his entrance to be wide and wash him with water and snow and hail. Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave [and from the punishment of Hell-fire].

Take him into Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave [and from the punishment of Hell-fire].

Cleanse him of his transgressions as white cloth is cleansed of stains. Give him an abode better than his home, and a family better than his family and a wife better than his wife. Take him into Paradise and protect him from the punishment of the grave [and from the punishment of Hell-fire].
duas.arabic: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـه ، وَعافِهِ وَاعْفُ عَنْـه ، وَأَكْـرِمْ نُزُلَـه ، وَوَسِّـعْ مُدْخَـلَه ، وَاغْسِلْـهُ بِالْمـاءِ وَالثَّـلْجِ وَالْبَـرَدْ ، وَنَقِّـهِ مِنَ الْخطـايا كَما نَـقّيْتَ الـثَّوْبُ الأَبْيَـضُ مِنَ الدَّنَـسْ ، وَأَبْـدِلْهُ داراً خَـيْراً مِنْ دارِه ، وَأَهْلاً خَـيْراً مِنْ أَهْلِـه ، وَزَوْجَـاً خَـيْراً مِنْ زَوْجِه،  وَأَدْخِـلْهُ الْجَـنَّة ، وَأَعِـذْهُ مِنْ عَذابِ القَـبْر وَعَذابِ النّـار
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lahu warhamhu, wa 'aafihi, wa'fu 'anhu, wa 'akrim nuzulahu, wa wassi' mudkhalahu, waghsilhu bilmaa'i waththalji walbaradi, wa naqqihi minal-khataayaa kamaa naqqaytath-thawbal-'abyadha minad-danasi, wa 'abdilhu daaran khayran min daarihi, wa 'ahlan khayran min 'ahlihi, wa zawjan khayran min zawjihi, wa 'adkhilhul-jannata, wa. 'a'ithhu min 'athaabil-qabri[wa 'athaabin-naar]

duas.ar_translation: O Allah forgive our living and our dead, those who are with us and those who are absent, our young and our old, our menfolk and our womenfolk. O Allah, whomever you give life from among us give him life in Islam, and whomever you take way from us take him away in Faith. O Allah, do not forbid us their reward and do not send us astray after them.

O Allah, whomever you give life from among us give him life in Islam, and whomever you take way from us take him away in Faith. O Allah, do not forbid us their reward and do not send us astray after them.

duas.arabic: اللهُـمِّ اغْفِـرْ لِحَيِّـنا وَمَيِّتِـنا وَشـاهِدِنا ، وَغائِبِـنا ، وَصَغيـرِنا وَكَبيـرِنا ، وَذَكَـرِنا وَأُنْثـانا . اللهُـمِّ مَنْ أَحْيَيْـتَهُ مِنّا فَأَحْيِـهِ عَلى الإِسْلام ،وَمَنْ تَوَفَّـيْتََهُ مِنّا فَتَوَفَّـهُ عَلى الإِيـمان ، اللهُـمِّ لا تَحْـرِمْنـا أَجْـرَه ، وَلا تُضِـلَّنا بَعْـدَهُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lihayyinaa, wa mayyitinaa, wa shaahidinaa, wa ghaa'ibinaa, wa sagheerinaa wa kabeerinaa, wa thakarinaa wa 'unthaanaa. Allaahumma man 'ahyaytahu minnaa fa'ahyihi 'alal-'Islaami, wa man tawaffaytahu minnaa fatawaffahu 'alal-'eemaani, Allaahumma laa tahrimnaa 'ajrahu wa laa tudhillanaa ba'dahu

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, surely [name the person] is under Your protection, and in the rope of Your security, so save him from the trial of the grave and from the punishment of the Fire. You fulfill promises and grant rights, so forgive him and have mercy on him. Surely You are Most Forgiving, Most Merciful.

duas.arabic: الَّلهُـمِّ إِنَّ فُلانَ  بْنَ فُلانٍ في ذِمَّـتِك ، وَحَبْـلِ جِـوارِك ، فَقِـهِ مِنْ فِتْـنَةِ الْقَـبْرِ وَعَذابِ النّـار ، وَأَنْتَ أَهْلُ الْوَفـاءِ وَالْـحَقِّ ، فَاغْفِـرْ لَهُ وَارْحَمْـهُ ، إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الغَـفورُ الـرَّحيم
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'inna [name the person] fee thimmatika, wa habli jiwaarika, faqihi min fitnatil-qabri wa 'athaabin-naari, wa 'Anta 'ahlul-wafaa'i walhaqqi. Faghfir lahu warhaw.hu 'innaka 'Antal-Ghafoorur-Raheem

duas.ar_translation: With the Name of Allah and according to the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah
duas.fr_translation: With the Name of Allah and according to the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah
duas.id_translation: With the Name of Allah and according to the Sunnah of the Messenger of Allah

duas.transliteration: Bismillaahi wa 'alaa sunnati Rasoolillaahi

duas.transliteration: Allaahum-maghfir lahu Allaahumma thabbithu

duas.ar_translation: Ever at Your service, O Allah, every at Your service. Ever at Your Service, You have no partner, ever at Your service. Verily all praise, blessings and dominions are Yours. You have no partner.
duas.fr_translation: Ever at Your service, O Allah, every at Your service. Ever at Your Service, You have no partner, ever at Your service. Verily all praise, blessings and dominions are Yours. You have no partner.

duas.ms_translation: Ever at Your service, O Allah, every at Your service. Ever at Your Service, You have no partner, ever at Your service. Verily all praise, blessings and dominions are Yours. You have no partner.
duas.es_translation: Ever at Your service, O Allah, every at Your service. Ever at Your Service, You have no partner, ever at Your service. Verily all praise, blessings and dominions are Yours. You have no partner.
duas.arabic: لَبَّيْكَ اللَّهُمَّ لَبَّيْكَ، لَبَّيْكَ لَا شَرِيكَ لَكَ لَبَّيْكَ، انَّالْحَمْدَ، وَالنِّعْمَةَ، لَكَ وَالْمُلْكَ، لا شَرِيكَ لَكَ
duas.transliteration: Labbayk Allaahumma labbayk, labbayk laa shareeka laka labbayk, 'innal-hamda, wanni'mata, laka walmulk, laa shareeka laka.

duas.ar_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.fr_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.id_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.en_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.ms_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.es_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.arabic: اللهُ أكْبَر
duas.transliteration: Allaahu 'Akbar
duas.ar_benefits: قُم بالتكبير في كُل مرة تمر بها على الحجر الأسود. قام النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) بالطواف وهو راكباً على الجمل. في كُل مرة
duas.fr_benefits: Dites Takbeer chaque fois que vous passez devant la Pierre Noire. Le Prophète (SAW) exécuta At-Tawaaf à dos de chameau. Chaque fois qu'il passait le coin (contenant la Pierre Noire), il le pointait avec quelque chose qu'il tenait et disait Allahu Akbar.
duas.id_benefits: Ucapkan Takbir setiap melewati Hajar Aswad. Rasululloh (SAW) melaksanakan tawaf dengan menunggangi seekor unta. Setiap beliau melewati sudut (tempat Hajar Aswad berada), beliau menunjuknya dengan sesuatu yang sedang beliau pegang dan mengucapkan Allohuakbar.
duas.en_benefits: Say Takbeer every time you pass the Black Stone. The Prophet (SAW) performed At-Tawaaf riding a camel. Every time he passed the corner (containing the Black Stone), he would point to it with something that he was holding and say Allahu Akbar.
duas.ms_benefits: Bertakbir setiap kali melepasi Batu Hitam. Nabi (SAW) bertawaf dengan menaiki unta. Setiap kali Baginda melepasi sudut (yang mengandungi Batu Hitam), Baginda akan menunjuk kepadanya dengan sesuatu yang dipegang oleh Baginda dan menyebut Allahu Akhbar.
duas.es_benefits: Di Takbir cada vez pasando por la Piedra Negra. El Profeta (SAW) realizó el Tawaf montando un camello. Cada vez Él pasaba el rincón (que contiene La Piedra Negra) la señalaba con algo que sostenía y decía Allahu Akbar.

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Grant us good in this world and good in the hereafter, and save us from the punishment of the Fire.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنآ ءَاتِنَا فِى اْلدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَ فى الاخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَ قِنَا عَذَابَ اْلنَّارِ
duas.transliteration: Rabbana aatina fid dunniyya hasanatan wa fil akhirati hasanatan wa qina ‘adhaban nar

duas.ar_translation: I begin with what Allah began with.Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest, Allah is the greatest. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant and single-handedly defeated the allies.

To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant and single-handedly defeated the allies.

To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant and single-handedly defeated the allies.
