To Him belongs all sovereignty and praise and He is over all things omnipotent. None has the right to be worshipped except Allah alone. He fulfilled His promise, aided His Servant and single-handedly defeated the allies.
duas.arabic: أَبْدَأُ بِمَا بَدَأَ اللهُ بِهِ. لَا إِلهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَ اللهُ أَكْـبَر لَا إِلهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ المُلْكُ وَلَهُ الحَمْدُ وهُوَ عَلى كُلِّ شَيءٍ قَديرٌ، لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللهُ وَحْدَهُ أَنْجَزَ وَعْدَهُ، وَنَصَرَ عَبْدَهُ وَهَزَمَ الأَحْزَابَ وَحْدَهُ
duas.transliteration: Abda’u bi maa bada’-allaahu bih allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar, allaahu akbar laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu laa shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu wa huwa ‛alaa kulli shay’in qadeer, laa ilaaha ill-allaahu waḥdahu, anjaza wa‛dahu, wa naṣara ‛abdahu, wa hazam-al-’aḥzaaba waḥdah
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا عند جبل الصفا وجبل المروة. حينما كان يصل النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) جبل الصفا، كان يدعو: إن الصفا والمروة ... ثم يبدأ في صعود جبل الصفا حتى يستطيع رؤية المنزل. ثم يتوجه الى القبلة ويقول هذه الكلمات: لا إله إلا الله، الله أكبر ثم يقول: لا إله إلا الله وحده ... ثم يسأل الله ما يُحب، يُردد هذه العبارات ثلاث مرات. وقد فعل نفس الشئ عند جبل المروة أيضاً.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez ceci au Mont Safa et Mont Marwah. Chaque fois que le Prophète (SAW) s'approchait du Mont Safa, il récitait: Innas-Safaa wal-Marwata... Puis il a commencé à escalader le Mont Safa jusqu' à ce qu'il puisse voir la Maison. Il a ensuite affronté la Qiblah en répétant ces mots: Laa'ilaaha'illallaah, Allaahu'Akbar Puis il a dit: Laa'ilaaha'illallaahu wahdahu... Et alors il demandait à Allah ce qu'il aimait, répétant la même chose comme ceci trois fois. Il a aussi fait ça au Montt Marwah.
duas.id_benefits: Baca ini ketika berada di bukit Safa dan Marwah. Kapanpun Rasululloh (SAW) mencapai bukit Safa, beliau memanjatkan doa: Innas-Safaa wal-Marwata ... Lalu beliau mulai memanjat bukit Safa hingga beliau dapat melihat rumahnya. Beliau lalu menghadap kiblat dan mengulangi kata-kata ini: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaah, Allaahu 'Akbar  Lalu berkata: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu ...  Llau beliau akan memohon kepada alloh apa yang beliau inginkan, mengulanginya sebanyak tiga kali. Beliau melakukannya juga di bukit Marwah.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this at Mount Safa and Mount Marwah. Whenever the Prophet (SAW) approached Mount Safa, he would recite: Innas-Safaa wal-Marwata ... Then he started to climb Mount Safa until he could see the House. He then faced the Qiblah repeating these words: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaah, Allaahu 'Akbar Then he said: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu ... And then he would ask Allah for what he liked, repeating the same thing like this three times. He did this at Mount Marwah as well.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca ini di Bukit Safa dan Bukit Marwah.Bila-bila Nabi (SAW) menghampiri Bukit Safa, Baginda akan membaca: Innas-Safaa wal-Marwata ...Kemudian Baginda mula memanjat Bukit Safa sehingga dapat melihat Rumah. Kemudian Baginda menghadap Kiblat sambil mengulangi ayat ini: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaah, Allaahu 'Akbar Kemudian Baginda berkata: Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaahu wahdahu ... Dan kemudian baginda akan memohon kepada Allah untuk apa yang Baginda mahukan, mengulangi perkars yang sama sebanyak tiga kali. Baginda melakukannya di Bukit Marwah juga.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esto en las colinas de as-Safa y al-Marwa. Cada vez que el Profeta (SAW) se acercaba a la colina de Safa, recitaba: Innas-Safaa wal-Marwata ... Luego comenzó a escalar la colina de Safa hasta que pudo ver la Casa. Luego se enfrentó a la Quibla repitiendo estas palabras: Laa 'ilaaha' illallaah, Allaahu 'Akbar Luego dijo: Laa 'ilaaha' illallaahu wahdahu ...

duas.ar_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.id_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.en_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.es_translation: Allah is the Most Great. Allah is One. There is none worthy of worship but Allah.
duas.arabic:
أَللّهُ أَكْبَرُ
أَللّهُ أَحَدٌ
لاَإِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللهُ
duas.transliteration:
Allaahu 'Akbar
Allaahu 'Ahad
Laa 'ilaaha 'illallaah
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا بمجرد أن تصل الى المشعر الحرام.  ركب النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) جمله، القسواء، حتى وصل الى الأرض المُقدسة (المشعر الحرام). ثم توجه نحو القبلة وتضرع الى الله، وقال هذه الكلمات بإستمرار!
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez ça quand vous atteindrez Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam. Le prophète (SAW) a monté son chameau, Al-Qaswa', jusqu' à ce qu'il atteigne la zone sacrée (Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam). Puis face à la Qiblah il invoqua Allah, et répéta ces paroles à plusieurs reprises.
duas.id_benefits: Bacalah ketika kamu telah mencapai Padang Muzdalifah. Rasululloh (SAW) menunggangi untanya, Al-Qaswa, hingga beliau mencapai tanah haram/terlarang (Padang Muzdalifah). Lalu beliau menghadap kiblat dan memuja Alloh dan berulangkali mengucapkan kata-kata ini!
duas.en_benefits: Recite this once you reach Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam. The Prophet (SAW) rode his camel, Al-Qaswa', until he reached the sacred area (Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam). Then he faced the Qiblah and invoked Allah, and repeatedly said these words!
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini sejurus tiba di Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam. Nabi (SAW) menunggang untanya, Al-Qaswa', sehingga tiba kawasan suci (Al-Mash'ar Al-Haraam). Kemudian Baginda menghadap Kiblat dan berdoa kepada Allah, dan mengulangi kata-kata ini!
duas.es_benefits: Recita esto una vez al llegar a Al-Mash’ar Al Haram. El Profeta (SAW) montó su camello,al-Qaswá', hasta que llegó a la región sagrada (Al-Mash’ar Al Haram). ¡luego orientó hacia la Quibla e invocó a Alá diciendo repetidamente estas palabras!

duas.ar_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.fr_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.id_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.en_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.ms_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.es_translation: Allah is the Most Great!
duas.arabic: اللهُ أكْبَر
duas.transliteration: Allaahu 'Akbar
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء عند رمي الجمرات على الشيطان أثناء الحج! في كل مرة كان النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم يرمي فيها الجمرات، كان يقول الله أكبر. عند الإنتهاء من رمي أول وثاني جمرة، تقدم للأمام، وقف بإتجاه القبلة، ورفع يده وقال هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette Dua quand vous jettez des pierres sur Satan pendant le Hadj! Chaque fois que le Prophète (SAW) jetait de la pierre sur n'importe quel jamaraat, il disait Allahu Akbar. Sur l'achèvement du premier et du deuxième Jamaraat, il avança, se tint face à la Qiblah, leva les mains et fit des duas.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini ketika melempar batu pada setan ketika Haji! Setiap Rasululloh (SAW) melempar batu ke jamarat, beliau mengucapkan Allohuakbar. Setelah menyelesaikan jamarat yang pertama dan kedua, beliau maju ke depan dan menghadap kiblat, mengangkat tangannya dan memanjatkan doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this Dua when throwing stones at Satan during Hajj! Every time the Prophet (SAW) threw stone at any of the jamaraat, he would say Allahu Akbar. On the completion of first & second Jamaraat, he went forward, stood facing the Qiblah, raised his hands and made duas.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini ketika melontar batu ke arah Syaitan semasa menunaikan Haji! Setiap kali Nabi (SAW) melontar batu ke arah jamaraat, Baginda menyebut Allahu Akbar. Ketika selesai Jamaraat yang peetama dan kedua, Baginda ke hadapan, berdiri menghadap Kiblat, mengangkat tangan dan berdoa.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Recita esta dua al tirar piedras a Satanás durante el Hayy! Cada vez que el Profeta (SAW) tiraba piedras a cualquier de los yamaraat, decía Allahu Akbar. Al finalizar el primer & segundo yamarrat, fue hacia delante, se paró frente a la Quibla, levantó sus manos y pidió duas.

duas.ar_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.fr_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.id_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.en_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.ms_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.es_translation: None has the right to be worshiped except Allah, alone, without partner. To Him belongs sovereignty and all praise and He is over all things omnipotent.
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٍ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha ill-allaahu, waḥdahu laa shareeka lah, lahul-mulku wa lahul-ḥamdu, wa huwa ‛alaa kulli shay’in qadeer
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء عند عرفات.  قال النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم): أفضل الدُعاء هو دُعاء يوم عرفات وأفضل ما يُمكن أن يقوله أحد، هو ما قُلته أنا والأنبياء من قبلي
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua à Arafat. Le Prophète (SAW) a dit: La meilleur des duas est la dua du jour de Arafat et le mieux que quiconque puisse dire, c'est ce que moi et les prophètes avant moi avons dit.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini ketika berada di Padang Arafah. Rasululloh (SAW) berkata: Doa terbaik adalah doa pada hari Arafah dan perkataan terbaik yang seseorang dapat katakan adalah yang aku dan Nabi-Nabi sebelumku telah sampaikan.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua at Arafat. The Prophet (SAW) said: The best of duas id the dua on the Day of Arafat and the best that anyone can say is what I and the Prophets before me have said
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini di Arafah Baginda Nabi (SAW) berkata: Doa terbaik adalah doa pad Hari Arafah dan yang terbaik yang boleh disebut oleh sesiapa sahaja adalah apa yang aku dan Nabi-nabi sebelumku pernah menyebutnya Prophets
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta dua en Arafat El Profeta (SAW) dijo: lo mejor de súplicas es la súplica en el Día de Arafat y lo mejor que quienquiera puede decir es lo que yo y las Profetas anteriores habíamos dicho.

duas.ar_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.id_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.en_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.es_translation: Allah is the Most Great. O Allah, bring us the new moon with security and Faith, with peace and in Islam, and in harmony with what our Lord loves and what pleases Him. Our Lord and your Lord is Allah.
duas.arabic: اللهُ أَكْـبَر، اللّهُمَّ أَهِلَّـهُ عَلَيْـنا بِالأمْـنِ وَالإيمـان، والسَّلامَـةِ والإسْلامِ، وَالتَّـوْفيـقِ لِما تُحِـبُّ رَبُّنـا وَتَـرْضَـى، رَبُّنـا وَرَبُّكَ اللهُ
duas.transliteration: Allaahu 'Akbar, Allaahumma 'ahillahu 'alayna bil'amni wal'eemaani, wassalaamati wal-'Islaami, wattawfeeqi limaa tuhibbu Rabbanaa wa tardhaa, Rabbunaa wa Rabbukallaahu.

duas.ar_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.fr_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.id_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.en_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.ms_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.es_translation: With the Name of Allah, Allah is the Most Great! [O Allah, from You and to You.] O Allah, accept it from me.
duas.arabic: بِسْمِ اللهِ واللهُ أَكْبَرُ اللَّهُمَّ مِنْكَ ولَكَ اللَّهُمَّ تَقَبَّلْ مِنِّي
duas.transliteration: Bismillaahi wallaahu 'Akbar [Allaahumma minka wa laka] Allaahumma taqabbal minnee

duas.ar_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.fr_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.id_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.en_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.ms_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.es_translation: O Allah You are The One Who forgives greatly, and loves to forgive, so forgive me
duas.arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ اِنَّكَ عَفُوٌّ ، تُحِبُّ الْعَفْوَ فَاعْفُ عَنِّي
duas.transliteration: Allahumma innaka `afuwwun tuhibbul `afwa fa`fu `annee
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء في ليلة القدر! عائشة، رضي الله عنها قالت:  سألت رسول الله:  يا رسول الله، إذا علمت في أي ليلة تكون ليلة القدر، ماذا يجب أن أقول حينها؟ رد النبي (صلى الله عليه وسلم) وقال هذا الدُعاء.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette Dua durant Laylat al Qadr! Aïcha, qu'Allah l'agrée,dit:J'ai demandé au Messager d'Allah: O Messager d'Allah, si je sais quelle nuit est la nuit de Qadr, que dois-je réciter pendant ? Le prophète (PBUH) récita cette dua.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini ketika Lailatul Qadar! Aisyah, semoga Alloh memberkahinya, berkata: Aku bertanya kepada Rasululloh: 'Wahai Rasululloh, jika aku mengetahui malam Lailatul Qadar, doa apa yang harus aku panjatkan pada malam tersebut? Rasululloh membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this Dua on Laylatul Qadr! Aisha, may Allah be pleased with her, said: I asked the Messenger of Allah: 'O Messenger of Allah, if I know what night is the night of Qadr, what should I say during it?' Prophet (PBUH) recited this dua.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini pada malam Lailatul Qadar! Aisha (r.a), berkata: Aku bertanya kepada Utusan Allah: 'Wahai Utusan Allah, jika aku mengetahui malam yang mana merupakan malam LailatulQadar, apakah yang perlu dikatakan olehku ketika itu?' Nabi (SAW) membaca doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: ¡Recita esta dua en Laylata al-Qadr! 'Aa'ishah (que Allah esté complacido con ella) dijo: yo pregunté al Mensajero de Alá: ‘¡Oh Mensajero de Alá! Si supiera qué la noche es  Laylat al-Qadr ¿qué debo decir durante esta noche?’ El Profeta (que las bendiciones y la paz de Alá sean con él) recitó esta súplica.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, shower upon us abundant rain, beneficial not harmful, swiftly and not delayed.
duas.arabic: اللّهُمَّ اَسْقِـنا غَيْـثاً مُغيـثاً مَريئاً مُريـعاً، نافِعـاً غَيْـرَ ضَّارٌ، عاجِـلاً غَـيْرَ آجِلٍ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'asqinaa ghaythan mugheethan maree'an maree'an, naafi'an ghayradhaarrin, 'aajilan ghayra 'aajilin.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, (bring) beneficial rain clouds.
duas.arabic: اللّهُمَّ صَيِّـباً نافِـعاً
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma sayyiban naafi'an.

duas.ar_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.fr_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.id_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.en_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.ms_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.es_translation: We have been given rain by the grace and mercy of Allah.
duas.arabic: مُطِرْنَا بِفَضْلِ اللهِ وَ رَحْمَتِهِ
duas.transliteration: Mutirnaa bifadhlillaahi wa rahmatihi.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.id_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.en_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.es_translation: O Allah, let it pass us and not fall upon us, but upon the hills and mountains, and the center of the valleys, and upon the forested lands.
duas.arabic: اللّهُمَّ حَوالَيْنا وَلا عَلَيْـنَا، اللّهُمَّ عَلى الآكَـامِ  وَالظِّـرابِ، وَبُطُـونِِ الأوْدِيةِ، وَمَنـابِِتِ الشَّجَـرِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma hawaalaynaa wa laa 'alaynaa. Allaahumma 'alal-'aakaami wadh-dhiraabi, wa butoonil-'awdiyati, wa manaabitish-shajari

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to Him Whom thunder and angels glorify due to fear of Him.
duas.arabic: سُبْـحانَ الّذي يُسَبِّـحُ الـرَّعْدُ بِحَمْـدِهِ، وَالملائِكـةُ مِنْ خيـفَته
duas.transliteration: Subhaanal-lathee yusabbihur-ra'du bihamdihi walmalaa'ikatu min kheefatihi
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا عندما تسمع الرعد. حينما كان يسمع عبد الله بن الزبير الرعد، كان يتوقف عن الحديث ويقول هذا الدُعاء
duas.fr_benefits: Lisez çela quand vous entendez le tonnerre. Chaque fois qu'Abdullah bin Zubair (RA) entendait le tonnerre, il abandonnait toute conversation et disait cette supplication.
duas.id_benefits: Baca ini ketika kamu mendengar guntur. Kapanpun Abdullah bin Zubair (RA) mendengar guntur, beliau akan meninggalkan semua perbincangan dan membaca doa ini.
duas.en_benefits: Read this when you hear thunder. Whenever Abdullah bin Zubair (RA) would hear thunder, he would abandon all conversation and say this supplication.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini ketika mendengar bunyi guruh.Bilamana Abdullah bin Zubair (RA) mendengar bunyi guruh, dia akan mengabaikan semua perbualan dan mengucapkan doa ini.
duas.es_benefits: Lee esto cuando escuchas el trueno Cada vez que Abdullah bin Zubair (RA) escuchaba truenos, abandonaba toda conversación y decía esta súplica.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.fr_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.id_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.en_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.ms_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.es_translation: O Allah , I ask You for the good of it and seek refuge in You against its evil.
duas.arabic: اللّهُـمَّ  إِنَّـي أَسْـأَلُـكَ خَيْـرَها، وَأَعـوذُ بِكَ مِنْ شَـرِّها
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'as'aluka khayrahaa, wa 'a'oothu bika min sharrihaa

duas.ar_reference: سُنة عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم
duas.ar_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.fr_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.id_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.en_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.ms_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.es_translation: May the peace, mercy, and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.arabic: السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته
duas.transliteration: Assalamu ‘alaikum wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh

duas.ar_reference: سُنة عن النبي صلى الله عليه وسلم
duas.ar_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.fr_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.id_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.en_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.ms_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.es_translation: Peace and mercy and blessings of Allah be upon you
duas.arabic: و عليكم السلام والرحمة الله وبركاته
duas.transliteration: Wa’alaikum assalam wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh

duas.ar_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.fr_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.id_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.en_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.ms_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.es_translation: May Allah reward you with good.
duas.arabic: جَزاكَ اللهُ خَـيْراً
duas.transliteration: Jazaakallaahu khayran

duas.ar_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.fr_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.id_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.en_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.ms_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.es_translation: All praise is for Allah.
duas.arabic: اَلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillaahi

duas.ar_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.fr_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.id_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.en_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.ms_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.es_translation: May Allah have mercy upon you
duas.arabic: يَرْحَمُكَ اللَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Yar hamu kal-laahu.

duas.ar_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.fr_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.id_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.en_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.ms_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.es_translation: There is no Lord except Allah. He is One and has no partners. His is the Kingdom and for Him are all praises. He gives life and gives death. He is eternal and everlasting In His control is goodness, and He has power over everything.
duas.arabic: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ وَهُوَ حَيٌّ لَا يَمُوتُ بِيَدِهِ الْخُيْرُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٍ
duas.transliteration: Laa ilaaha illallaahu wahdahu laa shareeka lahu, lahul-mulku wa lahul-hamdu, yuhyee wa yumeetu, wa Huwa hayyun laa yamootu, biyadihil-khayru, wa Huwa alaa kulli shayin Qadeer.

duas.ar_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.fr_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.id_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.en_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.ms_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.es_translation: Glory is to You, O Allah, and praise is to You. I bear witness that there is none worthy of worship but You. I seek Your forgiveness and repent to You.
duas.arabic: سُبْحـانَكَ اللّهُـمَّ وَبِحَمدِك، أَشْهَـدُ أَنْ لا إِلهَ إِلاّ أَنْتَ أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتوبُ إِلَـيْك
duas.transliteration: Subhaanaka Allaahumma wa bihamdika, 'ash-hadu 'an laa 'ilaaha 'illaa 'Anta, 'astaghfiruka wa 'atoobu 'ilayka
duas.ar_benefits: إن الذي يقول هذا الدُعاء بعد قضاء الوقت في جماعة سيغفر له الله عن جميع ذنوبه التى حدثت منه أثناء ذلك الوقت
duas.fr_benefits: Quiconque récite la dua suivante après s'être assis dans un rassemblement sera pardonné pour les torts qu'il aura commis durant ce rassemblement.
duas.id_benefits: Barang siapa yang membaca doa ini setelah duduk di suatu majlis akan dimaafkan segala kesalahannya pada majlis tersebut
duas.en_benefits: Whosoever recites the following dua after sitting in a gathering will be forgiven for whatever wrongs were done by him in that gathering
duas.ms_benefits: Barangsiapa membaca doa berikut selepas duduk dalam pertemuan akan diampunkan untuk apa sahaja kesalahan yang dilakukan olehnya dalam pertemuan itu.
duas.es_benefits: Cualquiera que recite la siguiente súplica después de sentarse en una reunión será perdonado por los errores que haya cometido en esa reunión.

duas.ar_translation: O Allah, I seek the counsel of Your Knowledge, and I seek the help of Your Omnipotence, and I beseech You for Your Magnificent Grace. Surely, You are Capable and I am not. You know and I know not, and You are the Knower of the unseen. O Allah, if You know that this matter [then mention the thing to be decided] is good for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, - [or say: in this life and the afterlife] - then ordain it for me and make it easy for me, then bless me in it. And if You know that this matter is bad for me in my religion and in my life and for my welfare in the life to come, - [or say: in this life and the afterlife] - then distance it from me, and distance me from it, and ordain for me what is good wherever it may be, and help me to be content with it. Whoever seeks the counsel of the Creator will not regret it and whoever seeks the advice of the believers will feel confident about his decisions. Allah said in the Qur'an: 'And consult them in the affair. Then when you have taken a decision, put your trust in Allah.'

duas.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْتَخِيرُكَ بِعِلْمَكَ، وَأَسْتَقْدِرُكَ بِقُدْرَتِكَ، وَأَسْأَلُكَ مِنْ فَضْلِكَ الْعَظِيمِ، فَإِنَّكَ تَقْدِرُ وَلَا أَقْدِرُ، وَتَعْلَمُ، وَلَا أَعْلَمُ، وَأَنْتَ عَلَّامُ الْغُيُوبِ، اللَّهُمَّ إِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ- خَيْرٌ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي- عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ- فَاقْدُرْهُ لِي وَيَسِّرْهُ لِي ثُمَّ بَارِكْ لِي فِيهِ، وَإِنْ كُنْتَ تَعْلَمُ أَنَّ هَذَا الْأَمْرَ شَرٌّ لِي فِي دِينِي وَمَعَاشِي وَعَاقِبَةِ أَمْرِي- عَاجِلِهِ وَآجِلِهِ- فَاصْرِفْهُ عَنِّي وَاصْرِفْنِي عَنْهُ وَاقْدُرْ لِيَ الْخَيْرَ حَيْثُ كَانَ ثُمَّ أَرْضِنِي بِهِ
duas.transliteration: Allaahumma 'innee 'astakheeruka bi'ilmika, wa 'astaqdiruka biqudratika, wa 'as'aluka min fadhtikal-'Adheemi, fa'innaka taqdiru wa laa 'aqdiru, wa ta'lamu, wa laa 'a'lamu, wa 'Anta 'Allaamul-Ghuyoobi, Allaahumma 'in kunta ta'lamu 'anna haathal-'amra-[then mention the thing to be decided] Khayrun lee fee deenee wa ma'aashee wa 'aaqibati 'amree - [or say] 'Aajilihi wa 'aajilihi - Faqdurhu lee wa yassirhu lee thumma baarik lee feehi, wa 'in kunta ta'lamu 'anna haathal-'amra sharrun lee fee deenee wa ma'aashee wa 'aaqibati 'amree - [or say] 'Aajilihi wa 'aajilihi - Fasrifhu 'annee wasrifnee 'anhu waqdur liyal-khayra haythu kaana thumma 'ardhinee bihi
duas.ar_benefits: قُل هذا الدُعاء لتنال توجيه الله قبل إتخاذ القرارات. قُله مرة بعد صلاة الظهر، والعصر، والعشاء وثلاث مرات بعد صلاة الفجر والمغرب.
duas.fr_benefits: Récitez cette dua pour demander conseil à Allah avant de prendre une décision. Récitez la une fois après les prières de Dhuhr, Asr et Isha et trois fois après les prières de Fajr & Maghrib.
duas.id_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk memohon bimbingan Alloh sebelum mengambil keputusan.  Bacalah sekali setelah sholat Dzuhur, Ashar, dan Isya serta tiga kali setelah sholat Subuh dan Magrib.
duas.en_benefits: Recite this dua to seek Allah's guidance before taking a decision. Recite once after Dhuhr, Asr and Isha prayers and thrice after Fajr & Maghrib prayers.
duas.ms_benefits: Baca doa ini untuk memohon bimbingan Allah sebelum membuat keputusan. Baca sekali selepas solat Zohor, Asar dan Isyak dan tiga kali selepas solat Subuh dan Maghrib.
duas.es_benefits: Recita esta súplica para pedir la guía de Alá antes de tomar una decisión. Recita una vez después de las oraciones de Dhuhr, Asr y Isha’a y tres veces después de las oraciones de Fajr & Maghrib.
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء لإتخاذ القرار بسهولة
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua pour prendre une décision facilement
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini untuk kemudahan dalam membuat keputusan
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua for making a decision with ease
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini untuk membuat keputusan dengan senang.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica para hacer una decisión con facilidad

duas.ar_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.fr_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.id_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.en_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.ms_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.es_translation: Our Lord! Decide Thou between us and our people in truth, for Thou art the best to decide.
duas.arabic: رَبَّنَا افْتَحْ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَ قَوْمِنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَأَنتَ خَيْرُ الْفَاتِحِينَ
duas.transliteration: Rabbanaf-tah baynana wa bayna qawmina bil haqqi wa anta Khayrul Fatiheen
duas.ar_description: هل تشعر أنك تعرضت للخيانة؟ قُل هذا الدُعاء لتطلب تحقيق العدالة!
duas.fr_description: Vous vous sentez trahi? Récitez cette dua pour chercher justice!
duas.id_description: Merasa dikhianati? Bacalah doa ini untuk memohon keadilan!
duas.en_description: Feeling betrayed? Recite this Dua to seek justice!
duas.ms_description: Rasa dikhianati? Baca doa ini untuk mendapatkan keadilan!
duas.es_description: ¿Te sientes traicionado? ¡Recita esta súplica para pedir la justicia!

duas.ar_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.fr_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.id_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.en_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.ms_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.es_translation: Praise to Allah , who has guided us to this; and we would never have been guided if Allah had not guided us.
duas.arabic: الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي هَدَانَا لِهَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لِنَهْتَدِيَ لَوْلَا أَنْ هَدَانَا اللَّهُ
duas.transliteration: Alhamdu lillahi allathee hadaana lihatha wama kunna linahtadiya lawlaa an hadaana Allahu
duas.ar_benefits: سيقول الناس في الجنة هذا الدُعاء بعد أن فازوا بالجنة.
duas.fr_benefits: Les gens dans le paradis demanderont cette dua après avoir atteint le paradis.
duas.id_benefits: Orang-orang di surga akan memanjatkan doa ini ketika mereka telah mencapai surga.
duas.en_benefits: The people in paradise will ask this dua after they have attained paradise.
duas.ms_benefits: Manusia di syurga akan meminta doa ini selepas mereka dapat memasuki syurga.
duas.es_benefits: Las personas en el Paraíso pedirán esta dua después de que ellas hayan alcanzado el Paraíso.
duas.ar_description: قُل هذا الدُعاء وأطلب التوجيه من الله طوال حياتك
duas.fr_description: Récitez cette dua et cherchez la direction d'Allah pour l'éternité.
duas.id_description: Bacalah doa ini dan mohon bimbingan Alloh untuk selamanya
duas.en_description: Recite this Dua and seek Allah's guidance for eternity
duas.ms_description: Baca doa ini dan dapatkan bimbingan Allah untuk selama-lamanya.
duas.es_description: Recita esta súplica y pide la guía de Alá para la eternidad

duas.ar_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.fr_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.id_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.en_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.ms_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.es_translation: Allah is the best guardian, and He is the most merciful of the merciful.
duas.arabic: فَاللَّهُ خَيْرٌ حَافِظًا ۖ وَهُوَ أَرْحَمُ الرَّاحِمِينَ
duas.transliteration: fallahu khayrun hafithan wahuwa arhamu arrahimeen
duas.ar_benefits: قام سيدُنا يعقوب (عليه السلام) بقراءة هذا الدُعاء.  قُل هذا الدُعاء لتنال الهداية من الله سبحانه وتعالى
duas.fr_benefits: Ce dua a été demandé par le prophète Ya'coob (AS). Récitez cette dua pour demander conseil à Allah SWT
duas.id_benefits: Doa ini dipanjatkan oleh Nabi Yakub (AS). Baca doa ini untuk memohon bimbingan Alloh SWT
duas.en_benefits: This dua was asked by Prophet Ya'coob (AS). Recite this dua to seek guidance from Allah SWT.
duas.ms_benefits: Doa ini dimint oleh Nabi Yaakub (AS). Baca doa ini untuk memohon bimbingan dari Allah SWT
duas.es_benefits: Esta súplica fue pedida por el Profeta Ya’qub (AS). Recita esta súplica para pedir la guía de Alá (Exaltado sea)
